 270+ 0000              CopyPosToXX15Macro: MACRO   prefix1?
 271+ 0000 ~
 272+ 0000 ~            prefix1?_CopyPosToXX15:    ld hl,prefix1?_Bnkxhi
 273+ 0000 ~                                       ld de,prefix1?_BnkXScaled
 274+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 275+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 276+ 0000 ~                                       inc hl ; skip to y high
 277+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 278+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 279+ 0000 ~                                       inc hl ; skip to z hig
 280+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 281+ 0000 ~                                       ldi
 282+ 0000 ~                                       ret
 283+ 0000                                  ENDM
 284+ 0000
 285+ 0000              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18Macro:  MACRO    prefix1?
 286+ 0000 ~            prefix1?_CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:
 287+ 0000 ~            prefix1?_CopyResultToDrawCam:    ld      hl, prefix1?_XX12
 288+ 0000 ~                                             ld      de, prefix1?_XX18
 289+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; X12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev
 290+ 0000 ~                                             inc de ; skip to XX18+2 as it will be on XX18+1
 291+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; XX12+1 => XX18+2
 292+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; XX12+2 => XX18+3 Set XX12+1 => XX18+2
 293+ 0000 ~                                             inc de ; skip to XX18+5 as it will be on XX18+4
 294+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; XX12+3 => XX18+5
 295+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; XX12+4 => XX18+6 Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev
 296+ 0000 ~                                             inc de ; skip to XX18+8 as it will be on XX18+7
 297+ 0000 ~                                             ldi    ; XX12+5 => XX18+8
 298+ 0000 ~                                             ret
 299+ 0000                                          ENDM
 300+ 0000
 301+ 0000              CopyXX12toXX15Macro:        MACRO    prefix1?
 302+ 0000 ~            prefix1?_CopyXX12toXX15:         ld      hl, prefix1?_BnkXX12xLo
 303+ 0000 ~                                             ld      de, prefix1?_XX18
 304+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xlo
 305+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xsg
 306+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xlo
 307+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xsg
 308+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xlo
 309+ 0000 ~                                             ldi      ; xsg
 310+ 0000 ~                                             ret
 311+ 0000                                          ENDM
 312+ 0000
 313+ 0000              InitialiseUniverseObjMacro: MACRO   prefix1?
 314+ 0000 ~            prefix1?_InitRotMat:    ld      hl, 0
 315+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatSidevY),hl       ; set the zeroes
 316+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatSidevZ),hl       ; set the zeroes
 317+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatRoofvX),hl       ; set the zeroes
 318+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatRoofvZ),hl       ; set the zeroes
 319+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatNosevX),hl       ; set the zeroes
 320+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatNosevY),hl       ; set the zeroes
 321+ 0000 ~            ; Optimised as already have 0 in l
 322+ 0000 ~                                    ld      h, $60	             				; 96 in hi byte
 323+ 0000 ~                                    ;ld      hl,1
 324+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatSidevX),hl
 325+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatRoofvY),hl
 326+ 0000 ~            ; Optimised as already have 0 in l
 327+ 0000 ~                                    ld      h, $E0					            ; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
 328+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (prefix1?_BnKrotmatNosevZ),hl
 329+ 0000 ~                                    ret
 330+ 0000                                          ENDM
 331+ 0000

   1+ 0000              ; limited to 255 character length
   2+ 0000              CountLengthHL:          MACRO   Limiter
   3+ 0000 ~                                    ld      de,hl
   4+ 0000 ~                                    ld      bc,Limiter
   5+ 0000 ~                                    xor     a
   6+ 0000 ~                                    cpir
   7+ 0000 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
   8+ 0000 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
   9+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,l
  10+ 0000 ~                                    ret
  11+ 0000                                      ENDM

  13+ 0000              IncMemMaxN:             MACRO   mem, maxvalue
  14+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(mem)
  15+ 0000 ~                                    cp      maxvalue
  16+ 0000 ~                                    jr      c,.IncMaxed
  17+ 0000 ~                                    inc     a
  18+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (mem),a
  19+ 0000 ~            .IncMaxed:
  20+ 0000                                      ENDM
  21+ 0000
  22+ 0000              IncMemMaxNCycle:        MACRO   mem, cyclevalue
  23+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(mem)
  24+ 0000 ~                                    inc     a
  25+ 0000 ~                                    cp      cyclevalue
  26+ 0000 ~                                    jr      c,.IncMaxed
  27+ 0000 ~                                    xor     a
  28+ 0000 ~            .IncMaxed:              ld      (mem),a
  29+ 0000                                      ENDM

  32+ 0000              HalfLengthHL:           MACRO
  33+ 0000 ~                                    ld      b,0
  34+ 0000 ~            .CountLenLoop:          ld      a,(hl)
  35+ 0000 ~                                    cp      0
  36+ 0000 ~                                    jr      z,.DoneCount
  37+ 0000 ~                                    inc     b
  38+ 0000 ~                                    inc     hl
  39+ 0000 ~                                    jr      .CountLenLoop
  40+ 0000 ~            .DoneCount:             ld      a,32
  41+ 0000 ~                                    sub     b
  42+ 0000 ~                                    sra     a
  43+ 0000                                      ENDM

 142+ 0000
 143+ 0000              ; Will check to see if bit 2 is set, if it is clear, then friendly hence z is set
 144+ 0000              ;                                    if hit is set then hostile hence z is not set
 145+ 0000              IsShipHostile:          MACRO
 146+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
 147+ 0000 ~                                    and     ShipIsHostile
 148+ 0000                                      ENDM
 149+ 0000
 150+ 0000              ; Will check to see if bit 2 is set, if it is clear, then friendly hence z is set
 151+ 0000              ;                                    if hit is set then hostile hence z is not set
 152+ 0000              IsShipFriendly:         MACRO
 153+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
 154+ 0000 ~                                    and     ShipNotHostile                  ; mask so we only have hostile bit
 155+ 0000                                      ENDM
 156+ 0000
 157+ 0000              ; Will check to see if bit 5 is set, if clear, then not exploding z clear
 158+ 0000              ;                                    if set    then exploding     z set
 159+ 0000              IsShipExploding:        MACRO
 160+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)
 161+ 0000 ~                                    and     ShipExploding
 162+ 0000                                      ENDM
 163+ 0000
 164+ 0000              IsAIEnabled:            MACRO
 165+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl, UBnkaiatkecm
 166+ 0000 ~                                    bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,(hl)
 167+ 0000                                      ENDM

 292+ 0000              DrainSystem:            MACRO   SystemMem, DrainMem
 293+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(DrainMem)
 294+ 0000 ~                                    ld      b,a
 295+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(SystemMem)
 296+ 0000 ~                                    sub     a,b
 297+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (SystemMem),a
 298+ 0000 ~                                    jr      c,.ZeroSystem
 299+ 0000 ~                                    jp      .ExitPoint
 300+ 0000 ~            .ZeroSystem:            ZeroA
 301+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (SystemMem),a
 302+ 0000 ~            .ExitPoint
 303+ 0000                                      ENDM
 304+ 0000
 305+ 0000              BoostSystem:            MACRO   SystemMem, BoostMem
 306+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(BoostMem)
 307+ 0000 ~                                    ld      b,a
 308+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(SystemMem)
 309+ 0000 ~                                    add     b
 310+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (SystemMem),a
 311+ 0000 ~                                    jr      c, .MaxSystem
 312+ 0000 ~                                    jp      .ExitPoint
 313+ 0000 ~            .MaxSystem:             ld      a,255
 314+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (SystemMem),a
 315+ 0000 ~            .ExitPoint
 316+ 0000                                      ENDM

 318+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER HasEngineSoundChanged:  MACRO
 319+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ld      a,(EngineSoundChanged)
 320+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         and     a
 321+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ENDM
 322+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER
 323+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER ClearEngineSoundChanged:MACRO
 324+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         xor      a
 325+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ld      (EngineSoundChanged),a
 326+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER                         ENDM
 327+ 0000              ;DEFUNCT DONE IN INTERRUPT HANDLER

# file opened: ../../Variables/UniverseSlot_macros.asm
   1+ 0000
   2+ 0000              AddJunkCount:           MACRO
   3+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,JunkCount
   4+ 0000 ~                                    inc     (hl)
   5+ 0000                                      ENDM
   6+ 0000
   7+ 0000              SubJunkCount:           MACRO
   8+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,JunkCount
   9+ 0000 ~                                    dec     (hl)
  10+ 0000                                      ENDM
  11+ 0000
  12+ 0000              ClearJunkCount:         MACRO
  13+ 0000 ~                                    ZeroA
  14+ 0000 ~                                    ld      (JunkCount),a
  15+ 0000                                      ENDM
  16+ 0000
  17+ 0000              AddCop:                 MACRO
  18+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,CopCount
  19+ 0000 ~                                    inc     (hl)
  20+ 0000                                      ENDM
  21+ 0000
  22+ 0000              SubCop:                 MACRO
  23+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,CopCount
  24+ 0000 ~                                    dec     (hl)
  25+ 0000                                      ENDM
  26+ 0000
  27+ 0000              AddPirateCount:         MACRO
  28+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,PirateCount
  29+ 0000 ~                                    inc     (hl)
  30+ 0000                                      ENDM
  31+ 0000
  32+ 0000              SubPirateCount:         MACRO
  33+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,PirateCount
  34+ 0000 ~                                    inc     (hl)
  35+ 0000                                      ENDM
  36+ 0000
  37+ 0000              AreCopsPresent:         MACRO
  38+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(CopCount)
  39+ 0000 ~                                    and     a
  40+ 0000                                      ENDM
  41+ 0000
  42+ 0000              ; Class == shiptype
  43+ 0000              SetSlotAToUnivClass:    MACRO
  44+ 0000 ~                                    ex      af,af'
  45+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(ShipTypeAddr)
  46+ 0000 ~                                    ld      b,a
  47+ 0000 ~                                    ex      af,af'
  48+ 0000 ~                                    call    SetSlotAToClassB
  49+ 0000                                      ENDM
  50+ 0000
  51+ 0000              TestRoomForJunk:        MACRO   Target
  52+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,3
  53+ 0000 ~                                    JumpIfMemTrue  SpaceStationSafeZone, .DoTest
  54+ 0000 ~                                    add     a,2
  55+ 0000 ~            .DoTest                 JumpIfALTMemusng    JunkCount, Target
  56+ 0000                                      ENDM
  57+ 0000
  58+ 0000              JumpIfSpaceStation:     MACRO   Target
  59+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,UniverseSlotType
  60+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
  61+ 0000 ~                                    cp      ShipTypeStation
  62+ 0000                                      ENDM
  63+ 0000
  64+ 0000              ClearSlotMem:           MACRO   mem
  65+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(mem)
  66+ 0000 ~                                    call    ClearSlotA
  67+ 0000                                      ENDM
  68+ 0000
  69+ 0000              IsSlotEmpty:            MACRO
  70+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  71+ 0000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  72+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
  73+ 0000 ~                                    cp      0
  74+ 0000                                      ENDM
  75+ 0000
  76+ 0000              IsSlotMissile:          MACRO
  77+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,UniverseSlotType
  78+ 0000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  79+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
  80+ 0000 ~                                    cp      ShipTypeMissile
  81+ 0000                                      ENDM
  82+ 0000
  83+ 0000
  84+ 0000              ; Checks if slot is empty else A = ship type
  85+ 0000              ReturnIfSlotAEmpty:     MACRO
  86+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  87+ 0000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  88+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
  89+ 0000 ~                                    inc     a
  90+ 0000 ~                                    ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
  91+ 0000 ~                                    dec     a           ; get original value back for later
  92+ 0000                                      ENDM
  93+ 0000
  94+ 0000              JumpIfSlotAEmpty:       MACRO   Target
  95+ 0000 ~                                    ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  96+ 0000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  97+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
  98+ 0000 ~                                    inc     a
  99+ 0000 ~                                    jp      z,Target    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 100+ 0000 ~                                    dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 101+ 0000                                      ENDM
 102+ 0000
 103+ 0000              JumpIfSlotHLEmpty:      MACRO   Target
 104+ 0000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 105+ 0000 ~                                    and     a
 106+ 0000 ~                                    jr      nz,Target
 107+ 0000                                      ENDM

 261  6086 ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0

 334  6150 C9                                   ret
 335  6151
 336  6151              PressedRollPlus:        MMUSelectUniverseN 0
 336  6151 ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
 337  6155 3E 3C                                ld      a,60
 338  6157 32 07 66                             ld      (JSTX),a
 339  615A CD 6B 61                             call    draw_front_calc_alpha
 340  615D C9                                   ret
 341  615E
 342  615E              PressedRollMinus:       MMUSelectUniverseN 0
 342  615E ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
 343  6162 3E C4                                ld      a,-60
 344  6164 32 07 66                             ld      (JSTX),a
 345  6167 CD 6B 61                             call    draw_front_calc_alpha
 346  616A C9                                   ret
 347  616B
 348  616B 47           draw_front_calc_alpha:  ld      b,a
 349  616C E6 80                                and     $80
 350  616E 32 0B 66                             ld      (ALP2),a                            ; set sign
 351  6171 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; save sign
 352  6172 EE 80                                xor     $80
 353  6174 32 0C 66                             ld      (ALP2FLIP),a                        ; and oppsite sign
 354  6177 3A 07 66                             ld      a,(JSTX)
 355  617A ED 27 80                             test    $80
 356  617D 28 02                                jr      z,  .PositiveRoll
 357  617F ED 44        .NegativeRoll:          neg
 358  6181 CB 3F        .PositiveRoll           srl     a                                   ; divide sign by 4
 359  6183 CB 3F                                srl     a
 360  6185 FE 08                                cp      8
 361  6187 38 02                                jr      c,.NotIncreasedDamp                 ; if a < 8 divide by 2 again
 362  6189 CB 3F        .IncreasedDamp          srl     a
 363  618B 32 0A 66     .NotIncreasedDamp:      ld      (ALP1),a
 364  618E B1                                   or      c
 365  618F 32 09 66                             ld      (ALPHA),a                           ; a = signed bit alph1
 366  6192 C9                                   ret
 367  6193
 368  6193              ; Do the same for pitch
 369  6193 47           draw_front_calc_beta:   ld      b,a
 370  6194 E6 80                                and     $80
 371  6196 32 FF 65                             ld      (BET2),a                            ; set sign
 372  6199 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; save sign
 373  619A EE 80                                xor     $80
 374  619C 32 00 66                             ld      (BET2FLIP),a                        ; and oppsite sign
 375  619F 3A FD 65                             ld      a,(JSTY)
 376  61A2 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 377  61A5 28 02                                jr      z,  .PositivePitch
 378  61A7 ED 44        .NegativePitch:         neg
 379  61A9 CB 3F        .PositivePitch:         srl     a                                   ; divide sign by 4
 380  61AB CB 3F                                srl     a
 381  61AD FE 08                                cp      8
 382  61AF 38 02                                jr      c,.NotIncreasedDamp                 ; if a < 8 divide by 2 again
 383  61B1 CB 3F        .IncreasedDamp          srl     a
 384  61B3 32 FE 65     .NotIncreasedDamp:      ld      (BET1),a
 385  61B6 B1                                   or      c
 386  61B7 32 FC 65                             ld      (BETA),a                            ; a = signed bit bet1
 387  61BA C9                                   ret
 388  61BB
 389  61BB              ;..Update Universe Objects.........................................................................................................
 390  61BB              ;..................................................................................................................................
 391  61BB              ;                           DEFINE ROTATIONDEBUG 1
 392  61BB              ;                           DEFINE CLIPDEBUG 1
 393  61BB 00           CurrentShipUniv:        DB      0
 394  61BC              ;..................................................................................................................................
 395  61BC              ; if ship is destroyed or exploding then z flag is clear, else z flag is set
 396  61BC              ;..................................................................................................................................
 397  61BC              ; Replacement for MVEIT routine
 398  61BC AF           UpdateUniverseObjects:  xor     a
 399  61BD 32 B5 68                             ld      (SelectedUniverseSlot),a
 400  61C0 CD A0 6A                             call    GetTypeAtSlotA
 401  61C3 AF                                   xor     a
 402  61C4                                      MMUSelectUniverseA                                      ; and we apply roll and pitch
 402  61C4 C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 402  61C6 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 403  61C9 CD EF 61     .ProperUpdate:          call    ApplyMyRollAndPitchTest
 404  61CC              ;call    ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit                             ; todo , make all 4 of these 1 call
 405  61CC 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 406  61CF FE 00                                cp      0
 407  61D1 CD FB D5                             call    ApplyShipRollAndPitch
 408  61D4 CD 41 D7                             call    ApplyShipSpeed
 409  61D7 CD 92 C6                             call    UpdateSpeedAndPitch                             ; update based on rates of speed roll and pitch accelleration/decelleration
 410  61DA 3E 00        .TotalDampen:           ld      a,0
 411  61DC 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ; no pitch
 412  61DF 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 413  61E2 32 07 66                             ld      (JSTX),a
 414  61E5 32 FD 65                             ld      (JSTY),a
 415  61E8 CD 6B 61                             call    draw_front_calc_alpha
 416  61EB CD 93 61                             call    draw_front_calc_beta
 417  61EE C9                                   ret
 418  61EF              ;..................................................................................................................................
 419  61EF              ApplyMyRollAndPitchTest:;break
 420  61EF 3A 09 66                             ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
 421  61F2 A7           .CheckForRoll:          and		a
 422  61F3 C4 52 62     						call	nz,Test_Roll
 423  61F6 3A FC 65     .CheckForPitch:			ld		a,(BETA)
 424  61F9 A7           						and		a
 425  61FA C4 B8 62     						call	nz,Test_Pitch
 426  61FD C9                                   ret
 427  61FE 3A EA 66     .ApplySpeed:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
 428  6201 A7                                   and     a
 429  6202 CA 1D 62                             jp      z,.ApplyOrientation
 430  6205              						;ReturnIfAIsZero
 431  6205 0E 00                                ld      c,0                         ;
 432  6207 67           						ld      h,a                         ;
 433  6208 06 80        						ld      b,$80                       ;
 434  620A ED 5B 27 C0  						ld      de,(UBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
 435  620E 3A 26 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 436  6211 6F           						ld      l,a                         ; .
 437  6212 CD 14 01     						call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
 438  6215 ED 53 27 C0  						ld      (UBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
 439  6219 7D           						ld      a,l
 440  621A 32 26 C0     						ld      (UBnKzlo),a                ;
 441  621D 3A 09 66     .ApplyOrientation:      ld      a,(ALPHA)
 442  6220 21 FC 65                             ld      hl,BETA
 443  6223 B6                                   or      (hl)
 444  6224 C8                                   ret     z
 445  6225 DD 21 29 C0                          ld      ix,UBnkrotmatSidevX
 446  6229 CD BA 02                             call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
 447  622C DD 21 2F C0                          ld      ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
 448  6230 CD BA 02                             call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
 449  6233 DD 21 35 C0                          ld      ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 450  6237 CD BA 02                             call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
 451  623A C9                                   ret
 452  623B
 453  623B              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 454  623B              ; Planet version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 455  623B              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
 456  623B 00 00 00 00  TestAlphaMulX            DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 457  623F 00 00 00 00  TestAlphaMulY            DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 458  6243 00 00 00 00  TestAlphaMulZ            DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 459  6247 00 00 00 00  TestBetaMulZ             DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 460  624B 00 00 00 00  TestBetaMulY             DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 461  624F 00 00 00     TestK2                   DS 3
 462  6252
 463  6252 3A 09 66     Test_Roll:				ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 464  6255 E6 7F        						and 	$7F
 465  6257 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
 466  6258 3A 23 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 467  625B 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
 468  625C 2A 24 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
 469  625F CD 9B 6C     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 470  6262 7D           						ld		a,l
 471  6263 32 3F 62     						ld		(TestAlphaMulY),a			; save result
 472  6266 ED 53 40 62  						ld		(TestAlphaMulY+1),de		; save result
 473  626A 3A 09 66     						ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 474  626D E6 7F        						and 	$7F
 475  626F 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
 476  6270 3A 20 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 477  6273 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
 478  6274 2A 21 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKxhi)               ; .
 479  6277 CD 9B 6C     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 480  627A 7D           						ld		a,l
 481  627B 32 3B 62     						ld		(TestAlphaMulX),a			; save result
 482  627E ED 53 3C 62  						ld		(TestAlphaMulX+1),de		; save result
 483  6282 3A 09 66     						ld		a,(ALPHA)
 484  6285 E6 80        						and		$80
 485  6287 CA A1 62     						jp		z,.RollingRight
 486  628A DD 21 20 C0  .RollingLeft:			ld		ix,UBnKxlo
 487  628E FD 21 3F 62  						ld		iy,TestAlphaMulY
 488  6292 CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 489  6295 DD 21 23 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKylo
 490  6299 FD 21 3B 62  						ld		iy,TestAlphaMulX
 491  629D CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 492  62A0 C9           						ret
 493  62A1 DD 21 20 C0  .RollingRight:			ld		ix,UBnKxlo
 494  62A5 FD 21 3F 62  						ld		iy,TestAlphaMulY
 495  62A9 CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 496  62AC DD 21 23 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKylo
 497  62B0 FD 21 3B 62  						ld		iy,TestAlphaMulX
 498  62B4 CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 499  62B7 C9           						ret
 500  62B8
 501  62B8 3A FC 65     Test_Pitch:				ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 502  62BB E6 7F        						and 	$7F
 503  62BD 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
 504  62BE 3A 23 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 505  62C1 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
 506  62C2 2A 24 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
 507  62C5 CD 9B 6C     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 508  62C8 7D           						ld		a,l
 509  62C9 32 4B 62     						ld		(TestBetaMulY),a			; save result
 510  62CC ED 53 4C 62  						ld		(TestBetaMulY+1),de		; save result
 511  62D0 3A FC 65     						ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
 512  62D3 E6 7F        						and 	$7F
 513  62D5 57           						ld      d,a                         ; .
 514  62D6 3A 26 C0     						ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 515  62D9 5F           						ld      e,a                         ; .
 516  62DA 2A 27 C0     						ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)               ; .
 517  62DD CD 9B 6C     						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 518  62E0 7D           						ld		a,l
 519  62E1 32 47 62     						ld		(TestBetaMulZ),a			; save result
 520  62E4 ED 53 48 62  						ld		(TestBetaMulZ+1),de		; save result
 521  62E8 3A FC 65     						ld		a,(BETA)
 522  62EB E6 80        						and		$80
 523  62ED CA 07 63     						jp		z,.Climbing
 524  62F0 DD 21 23 C0  .Diving:				ld		ix,UBnKylo
 525  62F4 FD 21 47 62  						ld		iy,TestBetaMulZ
 526  62F8 CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 527  62FB DD 21 26 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 528  62FF FD 21 4B 62  						ld		iy,TestBetaMulY
 529  6303 CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 530  6306 C9           						ret
 531  6307 DD 21 23 C0  .Climbing:		     	ld		ix,UBnKylo
 532  630B FD 21 47 62  						ld		iy,TestBetaMulZ
 533  630F CD CD 00     						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 534  6312 DD 21 26 C0  						ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 535  6316 FD 21 4B 62  						ld		iy,TestBetaMulY
 536  631A CD 90 00     						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed

 625  63E6 32 EA 66                             ld      (DELTA),a
 626  63E9 21 04 00                             ld      hl,4
 627  63EC 22 EB 66                             ld      (DELTA4),hl
 628  63EF C9                                   ret
 629  63F0
 630  63F0                          DISPLAY "../../Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
 631  63F0                          include "../../Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 63F0              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 63F0              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 63F0              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 63F0              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 63F0 ED 4B A6 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 63F4 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 63F5 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 63F6 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 63F7 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 63F8 A8                   xor     b
  11+ 63F9 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 63FB DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 63FD 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 63FE E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 6400 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 6401 E5           		push	hl
  17+ 6402 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 6404 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 6405 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 6406 CD 01 6C     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 6409 22 C2 65     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 640C DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 640E 32 C9 65     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 6411 E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 6412              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 6412 ED 4B A8 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 6416 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 6417 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 6418 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 6419 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 641A 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 641B A8                   xor     b
  33+ 641C E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 641E DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 6420 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 6421 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 6423 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 6424 E5           		push	hl
  39+ 6425 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 6427 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 6428 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 6429 CD 01 6C     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 642C 22 C4 65     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 642F DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 6431 32 C8 65     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 6434 E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 6435              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 6435 ED 4B AA C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 6439 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 643A 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 643B 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 643C 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 643D 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 643E A8                   xor     b
  55+ 643F E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 6441 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 6443 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 6444 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 6446 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 6447 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 6449 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 644A 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 644B CD 01 6C     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 644E 22 C6 65     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 6451 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 6453 32 CA 65     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 6456              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 6456 2A C2 65     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 6459 ED 5B C4 65  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 645D ED 4B C8 65  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 6461              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 6461 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 6462 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 6463 AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 6464 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 6465 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 6466 CD 33 00     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 6469 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 646A 3A CA 65     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 646D 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 646E ED 5B C6 65  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 6472 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 6473 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 6475 CD 33 00     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 6478 C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 6479              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 6479
  88+ 6479              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 6479              ;...X cell
  90+ 6479 21 79 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 647C CD F0 63             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 647F 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 6480 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 6481 B0           		or		b
  95+ 6482 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 6485 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 6486 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 6489              ;...Y cell
  99+ 6489 21 81 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 100+ 648C CD F0 63             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 101+ 648F 47           		ld		b,a
 102+ 6490 7C           		ld		a,h
 103+ 6491              ;		ld		a,l
 104+ 6491 B0           		or		b
 105+ 6492 32 AF C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 106+ 6495 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 107+ 6496 32 AE C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 6499              ;...Z cell
 109+ 6499 21 89 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 110+ 649C CD F0 63             call    XX12ProcessOneRow

 112+ 64A0 7C                   ld		a,h
 113+ 64A1              ;		ld		a,l
 114+ 64A1 B0           		or		b

 117+ 64A6 32 B0 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for

 119+ 64AA

 124+ 64B0 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 125+ 64B1 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 126+ 64B2 B0           		or		b

 135+ 64C2              ;		ld		a,l
 136+ 64C2 B0           		or		b

 152+ 64DB              XX12EquNodeDotXX16:					         		; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high

 158+ 64E3 B0           		or		b

 634  6548                          DISPLAY "../../Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
 635  6548                          include "../../Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 6548              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 6548                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 6548 ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 6548 ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 6548 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
   6+ 6548 ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		e,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value              ;
   7+ 6548 ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
   8+ 6548 ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
   9+ 6548 ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  10+ 6548 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  11+ 6548 ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  12+ 6548 ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 6548 ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  14+ 6548 ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  15+ 6548 ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  16+ 6548 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  17+ 6548 ~                                    pop		hl
  18+ 6548 ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  19+ 6548 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  20+ 6548 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  21+ 6548 ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  22+ 6548 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  23+ 6548 ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  24+ 6548 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  25+ 6548 ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  26+ 6548 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 6548 ~                                    ret
  28+ 6548                      ELSE
  29+ 6548 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  30+ 654A 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  31+ 654C 21 61 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  32+ 654F 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  33+ 6550 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
  34+ 6551 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
  35+ 6552 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  36+ 6553 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  37+ 6554 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  38+ 6556 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  39+ 6558                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  39+ 6558 CB 23       >			   sla e
  39+ 655A CB 12       >			   rl  d
  40+ 655C 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  41+ 655D C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  42+ 655E E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  43+ 655F CD 81 70                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  44+ 6562 E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ 6563 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  46+ 6564 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  47+ 6565 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  48+ 6566                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  49+ 6566                                  ;    and     $80
  50+ 6566 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  51+ 6568 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  52+ 6569 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  53+ 656A 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  54+ 656B 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  55+ 656D C9                                   ret
  56+ 656E                      ENDIF
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm

   1+ 65CB              ;Contants
   2+ 65CB
   3+ 65CB              SignMask8Bit		equ %01111111
   4+ 65CB              SignMask16Bit		equ %0111111111111111
   5+ 65CB              SignOnly8Bit		equ $80
   6+ 65CB              SignOnly16Bit		equ $8000

 202+ 65CB              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
 203+ 65CB              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
 204+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.
 205+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  3 is #ESC  Escape capsule
 206+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  4 is #PLT  Plate, alloys

 208+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  6 is       Boulder
 209+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  7 is #AST  Asteroid
 210+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  8 is #SPL  Splinter, rock.
 211+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  9 is #SHU  Shuttle
 212+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
 213+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa
 214+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 12 is       Python
 215+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 13 is       Last of three traders
 216+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 14 is #ANA  Anaconda
 217+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 15 is #WRM  Worm with Anaconda
 218+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 16 is #COP  Viper
 219+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 17 is       First pirate
 220+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 18 is
 221+ 65CB              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 19 is #KRA  Krait small pirate

 235+ 65CB              ;;;;			\ NEWB examples
 236+ 65CB              ;;;;\ 21			EQUB &21    \ 0010 0001    9 Shuttle has no escape pod, inno, trader.
 237+ 65CB              ;;;;\ 61			EQUB &61    \ 0110 0001   10 Tansporter no escape pod, Cop, inno, trader.
 238+ 65CB              ;;;;\ A0			EQUB &A0    \ 1010 0000   11 Cobra has Escape pod, inno, not a trader.
 239+ 65CB              ;;;;\ C2			EQUB &C2    \ 1100 0010   16 Viper has Escape pod, Cop, hunter.
 240+ 65CB              ;;;;\ 8C			EQUB &8C    \ 1000 1100   19 Krait pirate has escape pod, is pirate and angry.

   5+ 65CB 00 00 00...  failureDiag DS  10              ; 10 bytes to log data before a failure
   6+ 65D5
   7+ 65D5              LogFailure:     MACRO messageAddress
   8+ 65D5 ~                            ld      hl,messageAddress
   9+ 65D5 ~                            ld      de,failureDiag
  10+ 65D5 ~                            ld      bc,10
  11+ 65D5 ~                            ldir
  12+ 65D5                              ENDM

 171+ 66FE                                                          ;      1 1  Front view , i.e. $03
 172+ 66FE                                                          ;      1 0  Aft View          $02
 173+ 66FE                                                          ;      0 1  Left View         $01
 174+ 66FE                                                          ;      0 0  Right view        $00
 175+ 66FE              											; Bit 0 Set  Data On System
 176+ 66FE              											; 0  Space View (Not a menu)

 178+ 66FF 00           XX13                    DB  0               ;   89
 179+ 6700 00           TYPE					DB	0				; 8C used for ship type in drawing
 180+ 6701              ;Docked flag = 00 = in free space
 181+ 6701              ;              FF = Docked
 182+ 6701              ;              FE = transition
 183+ 6701              ;              FD = Setup open space and transition to not docked
 184+ 6701              ;              FC = Hyperspace manimation
 185+ 6701              ;              FB = Hyperspace complete

# file opened: ../../Variables/UniverseSlotRoutines.asm
   1+ 69EF              ; Note this code is core code and can not be in a memory bank unless do explosion code is changed too
   2+ 69EF AF           ClearSlotCount:         xor     a
   3+ 69F0 21 C4 68                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
   4+ 69F3 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseSlotListSize ; prbably not needed + UniverseSlotTypeSize
   5+ 69F5 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
   6+ 69F6 23                                   inc     hl
   7+ 69F7 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   8+ 69F9 C9                                   ret
   9+ 69FA
  10+ 69FA              ; Initialises all types to a count of 1 where there is an occupied universe slot
  11+ 69FA              ; this needs expanding to cater for a missing type, find type and increment count (use cpir?)

# file opened: ../../Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 6AC6              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 6AC6              doRND2:
   3+ 6AC6 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 6AC7              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 6AC7              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 6AC7              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 6AC7              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 6AC7 3A E5 65                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 6ACA CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 6ACC 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 6ACD 21 E7 65     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 6AD0 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 6AD1 32 E5 65     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 6AD4 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 6AD5 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 6AD6 32 E7 65                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 6AD9 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 6ADA 3A E6 65                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 6ADD 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 6ADE 21 E8 65     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 6AE1 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 6AE2 32 E6 65                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 6AE5 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 6AE6 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 6AE7 32 E8 65                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 6AEA 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 6AEB                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 6AEB C9                                   ret

   1+ 6B10              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ 6B10 2A F1 66                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ 6B13 3A F0 66                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ 6B16 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 6B18 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 6B1B 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 6B1C                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 6B1C CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 6B1E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 6B20 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 6B22 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 6B24 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 6B25 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 6B26 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 6B27              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ 6B27 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ 6B29 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ 6B2B CB 20                                sla b
  15+ 6B2D 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ 6B2F 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ 6B31 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 6B32 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 6B34 C9                                   ret
  20+ 6B35
  21+ 6B35              ; FMLTU - A = A * Q / 256
  22+ 6B35 57           AequAmulQdiv256usgn:    ld      d,a
  23+ 6B36 3A F0 66                             ld      a,(varQ)
  24+ 6B39 5F                                   ld      e,a
  25+ 6B3A              asm_defmutl:
  26+ 6B3A              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
  27+ 6B3A ED 30        AequDmulEdiv256usgn:    mul     de
  28+ 6B3C 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  29+ 6B3D C9                                   ret
  30+ 6B3E
  31+ 6B3E
  32+ 6B3E              ; muliptiply S7d ny S7e signed
  33+ 6B3E              ; used A and B registers
  34+ 6B3E              ; result in DE
  35+ 6B3E 7A           mulDbyESigned:          ld      a,d
  36+ 6B3F AB                                   xor     e
  37+ 6B40 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  38+ 6B42 47                                   ld      b,a
  39+ 6B43 7A                                   ld      a,d
  40+ 6B44 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  41+ 6B46 57                                   ld      d,a
  42+ 6B47 7B                                   ld      a,e
  43+ 6B48 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 6B4A 5F                                   ld      e,a
  45+ 6B4B ED 30                                mul     de
  46+ 6B4D 7A                                   ld      a,d
  47+ 6B4E B0                                   or      b
  48+ 6B4F 57                                   ld      d,a
  49+ 6B50 C9                                   ret
  50+ 6B51
  51+ 6B51
  52+ 6B51
  53+ 6B51              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  54+ 6B51 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  55+ 6B51 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  56+ 6B51 ~                                    ld      e,a
  57+ 6B51 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  58+ 6B51 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  59+ 6B51 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  60+ 6B51 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  61+ 6B51 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  62+ 6B51 ~                                    ld      d,a
  63+ 6B51 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  64+ 6B51 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  65+ 6B51 ~                                    ld      e,a
  66+ 6B51 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  67+ 6B51 ~                                    ld      a,d
  68+ 6B51 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  69+ 6B51 ~                                    ld      d,a
  70+ 6B51                                      ENDM
  71+ 6B51

  75+ 6B51              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  75+ 6B51 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d

  88+ 6B90                                      ClearCarryFlag
