 668  6E18                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 6E18              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 6E18              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 6E18                      ; Input:
   4+ 6E18                      ;       HL = value
   5+ 6E18                      ; Output:
   6+ 6E18                      ;       HL = -value
   7+ 6E18                      ; Destroys:
   8+ 6E18                      ;       AF
   9+ 6E18                      ;
  10+ 6E18              negate16:
  11+ 6E18 AF           negate16hl:         xor 	a
  12+ 6E19 95                               sub 	l
  13+ 6E1A 6F                               ld 		l,a
  14+ 6E1B 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  15+ 6E1C 94                               sub 	h
  16+ 6E1D 67                               ld 		h,a
  17+ 6E1E C9                               ret
  18+ 6E1F
  19+ 6E1F AF           negate16de:         xor 	a
  20+ 6E20 93                               sub 	e
  21+ 6E21 5F                               ld 		e,a
  22+ 6E22 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  23+ 6E23 92                               sub 	d
  24+ 6E24 57                               ld 		d,a
  25+ 6E25 C9                               ret
  26+ 6E26
  27+ 6E26 AF           negate16bc:         xor 	a
  28+ 6E27 91                               sub 	c
  29+ 6E28 4F                               ld 		c,a
  30+ 6E29 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  31+ 6E2A 90                               sub 	b
  32+ 6E2B 47                               ld 		b,a
  33+ 6E2C C9                               ret
  34+ 6E2D
# file closed: ../../Maths/negate16.asm
 669  6E2D                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 6E2D              ;   K(3 2 1 0)           The result of the division
   2+ 6E2D              ;   X                    X is preserved
   3+ 6E2D
   4+ 6E2D              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) where zsign hi lo is in DE with zsign leading hi
   5+ 6E2D 00 00 00 00  varQRS                 DS      4
   6+ 6E31 00 00 00     varAPP                  DS     3
   7+ 6E34
   8+ 6E34                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  neds rewrite of whoel DIDV3B2"
   9+ 6E34              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO OF WHOLE DIVD3B2
  10+ 6E34              ;; NEEDS REWRITE TODO
  11+ 6E34
  12+ 6E34              ; b = varR, c= varQ
  13+ 6E34              Requ256mulAdivQ_6502:
  14+ 6E34 CB 27        .LL31_6502:             sla     a                       ; ASL A                   \ Shift A to the left
  15+ 6E36 DA 4B 6E                             jp      c,.LL29_6502             ; BCS LL29               \ If bit 7 of A was set, then jump straight to the subtraction
  16+ 6E39                                      FlipCarryFlag                   ;                          If A < N, then C flag is set.
  16+ 6E39 3F          >                        ccf
  17+ 6E3A                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502 ; CMP Q              \ If A < Q, skip the following subtraction
  17+ 6E3A B9          >                        cp      c
  17+ 6E3B DA 40 6E    >                        jp		c, .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502
  18+ 6E3E                                                                      ; BCC P%+4
  19+ 6E3E 91                                   sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  20+ 6E3F                                      ClearCarryFlag
  20+ 6E3F B7          >                        or a
  21+ 6E40              .LL31_SKIPSUB_6502:     FlipCarryFlag
  21+ 6E40 3F          >                        ccf
  22+ 6E41 CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  23+ 6E43 DA 34 6E                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  24+ 6E46 78                                   ld      a,b
  25+ 6E47 32 86 EF                             ld      (Rvar),a
  26+ 6E4A C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ R left with remainder of division
  27+ 6E4B 91           .LL29_6502:             sub     c                       ; SBC Q                  \ A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  28+ 6E4C                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; SEC                    \ Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  28+ 6E4C 37          >                        scf
  29+ 6E4D CB 10                                rl      b                       ; ROL R                  \ Rotate the counter in R to the left, and catch the result bit into bit 0 (which will be a 0 if we didn't do the subtraction, or 1 if we did)
  30+ 6E4F DA 34 6E                             jp      c, .LL31_6502            ; BCS LL31               \ If we still have set bits in R, loop back to LL31 to do the next iteration of 7
  31+ 6E52 78                                   ld      a,b                     ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine with R containing the
  32+ 6E53 32 86 EF                             ld      (Rvar),a                ; .
  33+ 6E56 C9                                   ret                             ; .                      \ remainder of the division
  34+ 6E57 3E FF        .LL2_6502:              ld      a,$FF                   ; LDA #255               \ The division is very close to 1, so return the closest
  35+ 6E59 32 F1 66                             ld      (varR),a                ; STA R                  \ possible answer to 256, i.e. R = 255
  36+ 6E5C 47                                   ld      b,a                     ; as we are using b as varR
  37+ 6E5D                                      SetCarryFlag                    ; we failed so need carry flag set
  37+ 6E5D 37          >                        scf
  38+ 6E5E C9                                   ret                             ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
  39+ 6E5F
  40+ 6E5F
  41+ 6E5F 00           DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG:       DB      0
  42+ 6E60
  43+ 6E60 7B           DIV3B2DE:               ld      a,e                         ; load QRS with Z sign hi lo
  44+ 6E61 32 2F 6E                             ld      (varQRS+2),a
  45+ 6E64 7A                                   ld      a,d
  46+ 6E65 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  47+ 6E67 32 2E 6E                             ld      (varQRS+1),a
  48+ 6E6A 7A                                   ld      a,d
  49+ 6E6B E6 80                                and     $80
  50+ 6E6D 32 2D 6E                             ld      (varQRS),a
  51+ 6E70 C3 76 6E                             jp      DVID3B
  52+ 6E73              ; Calculate K(3 2 1 0) = (A P+1 P) / (z_sign z_hi z_lo) = A P[1 0 ] / (SRQ)
  53+ 6E73              ; We don't use zlo and assume its already loaded into SRQ
  54+ 6E73 32 F2 65     DVID3B2:                ld      (varP+2),a                  ;STA P+2                \ Set P+2 = A
  55+ 6E76                                                                          ; LDA INWK+6             \ Set Q = z_lo
  56+ 6E76                                                                          ; STA Q
  57+ 6E76                                                                          ; LDA INWK+7             \ Set R = z_hi
  58+ 6E76                                                                          ; STA R
  59+ 6E76                                                                          ; LDA INWK+8             \ Set S = z_sign
  60+ 6E76                                                                          ; STA S
  61+ 6E76              ;  Given the above assignments, we now want to calculate K(3 2 1 0) = P(2 1 0) / (S R Q)
  62+ 6E76 3A F0 65     DVID3B:                 ld      a,(varP)                    ; LDA P                 \ Make sure P(2 1 0) is at least 1
  63+ 6E79 F6 01                                or      1                           ; ORA #1
  64+ 6E7B 32 F0 65                             ld      (varP),a                    ; STA P
  65+ 6E7E              ;--- t = sign of P2 xor S (i.e. sign of result) ------------;
  66+ 6E7E 3A F2 65                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set T to the sign of P+2 * S (i.e. the sign of the
  67+ 6E81 21 F2 66                             ld      hl, varS                    ; EOR S                  \ result) and store it in T
  68+ 6E84 AE                                   xor     (hl)
  69+ 6E85 E6 80                                and     $80                         ; AND #%10000000
  70+ 6E87 32 0C 67                             ld      (varT),a                    ; STA T
  71+ 6E8A              ;--- New bit added to aviod a divde by 0 -------------------;
  72+ 6E8A 3A F0 66     .CheckQRSAtLeast1:      ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
  73+ 6E8D 21 F1 66                             ld      hl,varR                     ;
  74+ 6E90 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ;
  75+ 6E91 C2 99 6E                             jp      nz,.DVL9Prep                ;
  76+ 6E94 3E 01                                ld      a,1                         ;
  77+ 6E96 32 F0 66                             ld      (varQ),a                    ;
  78+ 6E99              ; A P(1) P(0) = ABS P(2 1 0)
  79+ 6E99 06 00        .DVL9Prep:              ld      b,0                         ; LDY #0                 \ Set Y = 0 to store the scale factor (use b as Y)
  80+ 6E9B 3A F2 65                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Clear the sign bit of P+2, so the division can be done
  81+ 6E9E E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111         \ with positive numbers and we'll set the correct sign below, once all the maths is done
  82+ 6EA0              ; We now shift (A P+1 P) left until A >= 64, counting the number of shifts in Y. This makes the top part of the division as large as possible, thus retaining as
  83+ 6EA0              ; much accuracy as we can.  When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the number of places in Y, and in the correct direction
  84+ 6EA0                                      DISPLAY "TODO DVL9 and DVL6 move P and QRS into registers for faster shift"
  85+ 6EA0              ;-- while A < 64 shift A P(1) P(0) -------------------------;
  86+ 6EA0 FE 40        .DVL9:                  cp      64                          ; CMP #64                \ If A >= 64, jump down to DV14
  87+ 6EA2 D2 B3 6E                             jp      nc, .DV14                   ; BCS DV14
  88+ 6EA5 21 F0 65                             ld      hl,varP                     ; ASL P                  \ Shift (A P+1 P) to the left
  89+ 6EA8 CB 26                                sla     (hl)
  90+ 6EAA 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL P+1
  91+ 6EAB CB 16                                rl      (hl)
  92+ 6EAD CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
  93+ 6EAF 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
  94+ 6EB0 C3 A0 6E                             jp      .DVL9                       ; BNE DVL9               \ Loop up to DVL9 (this BNE is effectively a JMP, as Y will never be zero)
  95+ 6EB3              ; If we get here, A >= 64 and contains the highest byte of the numerator, scaled up by the number of left shifts in Y (b in our code)
  96+ 6EB3 32 F2 65     .DV14:                  ld      (varP+2),a                  ; Store A in P+2, so we now have the scaled value of the numerator in P(2 1 0)
  97+ 6EB6 3A F2 66                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; LDA S                  \ Set A = |S|
  98+ 6EB9 E6 7F                                and     $7F                         ; AND #%01111111
  99+ 6EBB                                      ;nop                                ;  BMI DV9               \ If bit 7 of A is set, jump down to DV9 (which can never happen)
 100+ 6EBB              ; We now shift (S R Q) left until bit 7 of S is set, reducing Y by the number of shifts. This makes the bottom part of the division as large as possible, thus
 101+ 6EBB              ; retaining as much accuracy as we can. When we come to return the final result, we shift the result by the total number of places in Y, and in the correct
 102+ 6EBB              ; direction, to give us the correct result
 103+ 6EBB              ; We set A to |S| above, so the following actually shifts (A R Q)
 104+ 6EBB 05           .DVL6:                  dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y (b)
 105+ 6EBC 21 F0 66                             ld      hl,varQ                     ; ASL Q                  \ Shift (A R Q) to the left
 106+ 6EBF CB 26                                sla     (hl)                        ; .
 107+ 6EC1 21 F1 66                             ld      hl,varR                     ; ROL R
 108+ 6EC4 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 109+ 6EC6 CB 17                                rl      a                           ; ROL A
 110+ 6EC8 F2 BB 6E                             jp      p,.DVL6                     ; BPL DVL6               \ Loop up to DVL6 to do another shift, until bit 7 of A is set and we can't shift left any further
 111+ 6ECB              ; We have now shifted both the numerator and denominator left as far as they will go, keeping a tally of the overall scale factor of the various shifts in Y. We
 112+ 6ECB              ; can now divide just the two highest bytes to get our result
 113+ 6ECB 32 F0 66     .DV9:                   ld      (varQ),a                    ; STA Q                  \ Set Q = A, the highest byte of the denominator
 114+ 6ECE 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; for Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 as it uses c as Q
 115+ 6ECF 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; preserve shift register in DEVD3B_SHIFT_REG
 116+ 6ED0 32 5F 6E                             ld      (DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG),a
 117+ 6ED3              ; Note in Requ256mulAdivQ_6502 we use B as R Var for shift register
 118+ 6ED3 06 FE                                ld      b,254                       ; LDA #254               \ Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can pass this to
 119+ 6ED5 32 F1 66                             ld      (varR),a                    ; STA R                  \ LL31 to act as the bit counter in the division
 120+ 6ED8 3A F2 65                             ld      a,(varP+2)                  ; LDA P+2                \ Set A to the highest byte of the numerator
 121+ 6EDB CD 34 6E                             call    Requ256mulAdivQ_6502        ; JSR LL31               \ Call LL31 to calculate: R = 256 * A / Q which means result is in b
 122+ 6EDE              ; The result of our division is now in R, so we just need to shift it back by the scale factor in Y
 123+ 6EDE                                      ZeroA                               ; LDA #0                \ Set K(3 2 1) = 0 to hold the result (we populate K)
 123+ 6EDE AF          >                        xor a
 124+ 6EDF 32 04 67                             ld      (varK+1),a                  ; STA K+1               \ next)
 125+ 6EE2 32 05 67                             ld      (varK+2),a                  ; STA K+2
 126+ 6EE5 32 06 67                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 127+ 6EE8 3A 5F 6E                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)        ; TYA                   \ If Y (shift counter in b) is positive, jump to DV12
 128+ 6EEB B7                                   or      a                           ; .                      we want to check the sign or if its zero
 129+ 6EEC CA 17 6F                             jp      z,.DV13                     ; Optimisation to save a second jump from DV12 to DV13
 130+ 6EEF F2 22 6F                             jp      p,.DV12                     ; BPL DV12
 131+ 6EF2              ; If we get here then Y is negative, so we need to shift the result R to the left by Y places, and then set the correct sign for the result
 132+ 6EF2                                      DISPLAY "TODO check oprimisation here for var r  in b"
 133+ 6EF2 48                                   ld      c,b
 134+ 6EF3 3A 5F 6E                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 135+ 6EF6 47                                   ld      b,a
 136+ 6EF7 79                                   ld      a,c
 137+ 6EF8                                      ; OPTIM ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 138+ 6EF8 CB 27        .DVL8:                  sla     a                           ; ASL A                  \ Shift (K+3 K+2 K+1 A) left
 139+ 6EFA 21 04 67                             ld      hl,varK+1                   ; ROL K+1
 140+ 6EFD CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 141+ 6EFF 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+2
 142+ 6F00 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 143+ 6F02 23                                   inc     hl                          ; ROL K+3
 144+ 6F03 CB 16                                rl      (hl)                        ; .
 145+ 6F05 04                                   inc     b                           ; INY                    \ Increment the scale factor in Y
 146+ 6F06 C2 F8 6E                             jp      nz,.DVL8                    ; BNE DVL8               \ Loop back to DVL8 until we have shifted left by Y places
 147+ 6F09 32 03 67                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 148+ 6F0C 3A 06 67                             ld      a,(varK+3)                  ; LDA K+3                \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 149+ 6F0F 21 0C 67                             ld      hl,varT                     ; ORA T                  \ correct sign for the result
 150+ 6F12 B6                                   or      (hl)                        ; .
 151+ 6F13 32 06 67                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3
 152+ 6F16 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 153+ 6F17              ; If we get here then Y is zero, so we don't need to shift the result R, we just need to set the correct sign for the result
 154+ 6F17 78           .DV13:                  ld      a,b; varR)                  ; LDA R                  \ Store R in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 155+ 6F18 32 03 67                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K
 156+ 6F1B 3A 0C 67                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 157+ 6F1E 32 06 67                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 158+ 6F21 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 159+ 6F22              ; if we get here U is positive but still could be zero, now this is handled in DV9
 160+ 6F22              .DV12:                  ; nop                               ; BEQ DV13               \ We jumped here having set A to the scale factor in Y, so this jumps up to DV13 if Y = 0
 161+ 6F22              ; If we get here then Y is positive and non-zero, so we need to shift the result R to the right by Y places and then set the correct sign for the result. We also
 162+ 6F22              ; know that K(3 2 1) will stay 0, as we are shifting the lowest byte to the right, so no set bits will make their way into the top three bytes
 163+ 6F22                                      ;ld      a,(varR)                    ; LDA R                  \ Set A = R
 164+ 6F22 48                                   ld      c,b
 165+ 6F23 3A 5F 6E                             ld      a,(DIVD3B_SHIFT_REG)
 166+ 6F26 47                                   ld      b,a
 167+ 6F27 79                                   ld      a,c
 168+ 6F28 CB 3F        .DVL10:                 srl     a                           ; LSR A                  \ Shift A right
 169+ 6F2A 05                                   dec     b                           ; DEY                    \ Decrement the scale factor in Y
 170+ 6F2B C2 28 6F                             jp      nz,.DVL10                   ; BNE DVL10              \ Loop back to DVL10 until we have shifted right by Y places
 171+ 6F2E 32 03 67                             ld      (varK),a                    ; STA K                  \ Store the shifted A in K so the result is now in K(3 2 1 0)
 172+ 6F31 3A 0C 67                             ld      a,(varT)                    ; LDA T                  \ Set K+3 to the sign in T, which we set above to the
 173+ 6F34 32 06 67                             ld      (varK+3),a                  ; STA K+3                \ correct sign for the result
 174+ 6F37 C9                                   ret                                 ; RTS                    \ Return from the subroutine
 175+ 6F38              ;
 176+ 6F38              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
 177+ 6F38              ;   Loop:   A << 2
 178+ 6F38              ;           if carry was 0
 179+ 6F38              ;               if a >= D
 180+ 6F38              ;                   A = A - D
 181+ 6F38              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
 182+ 6F38              ;           else
 183+ 6F38
 184+ 6F38              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
 185+ 6F38              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
 186+ 6F38              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
 187+ 6F38              ;
 188+ 6F38              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 189+ 6F38              ;
 190+ 6F38              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
 191+ 6F38              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
 192+ 6F38
 193+ 6F38 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 194+ 6F39 3A F0 66                             ld      a,(varQ)
 195+ 6F3C 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
 196+ 6F3D 3A F0 65                             ld      a,(varP)
 197+ 6F40 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 198+ 6F41                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 199+ 6F41 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 200+ 6F42 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 201+ 6F43 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 202+ 6F45 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
 203+ 6F46 A7                                   and     a                       ;
 204+ 6F47 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
 205+ 6F49 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 206+ 6F4A A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 207+ 6F4B E6 80                                and     $80
 208+ 6F4D 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 209+ 6F4E 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 210+ 6F50 06 10                                ld      b,16
 211+ 6F52                                      ShiftDELeft1
 211+ 6F52 CB 23       >			   sla e
 211+ 6F54 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 212+ 6F56 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 213+ 6F58 CB 39                                srl     c
 214+ 6F5A CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 215+ 6F5C                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 215+ 6F5C B9          >                        cp      c
 215+ 6F5D DA 63 6F    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 216+ 6F60                                      ClearCarryFlag
 216+ 6F60 B7          >                        or a
 217+ 6F61 99                                   sbc     c
 218+ 6F62                                      ClearCarryFlag
 218+ 6F62 B7          >                        or a
 219+ 6F63 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 220+ 6F64 CB 13                                rl      e
 221+ 6F66 CB 12                                rl      d
 222+ 6F68 05                                   dec     b
 223+ 6F69 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 224+ 6F6B 7B                                   ld      a,e
 225+ 6F6C B5                                   or      l
 226+ 6F6D 42                                   ld      b,d
 227+ 6F6E C9                                   ret
 228+ 6F6F              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 228+ 6F6F AF          >                        xor a
 229+ 6F70 47                                   ld      b,a
 230+ 6F71 C9                                   ret
 231+ 6F72 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
 232+ 6F74 47                                   ld      b,a
 233+ 6F75 C9                                   ret
 234+ 6F76
 235+ 6F76 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
 236+ 6F77 3A F0 66                             ld      a,(varQ)
 237+ 6F7A 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
 238+ 6F7C 3A F0 65                             ld      a,(varP)
 239+ 6F7F 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
 240+ 6F80                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
 241+ 6F80 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
 242+ 6F81 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
 243+ 6F82 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
 244+ 6F84 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
 245+ 6F85 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
 246+ 6F86 E6 80                                and     $80
 247+ 6F88 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
 248+ 6F89 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 249+ 6F8B 06 10                                ld      b,16
 250+ 6F8D                                      ShiftDELeft1
 250+ 6F8D CB 23       >			   sla e
 250+ 6F8F CB 12       >			   rl  d
 251+ 6F91 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
 252+ 6F93 CB 39                                srl     c
 253+ 6F95 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
 254+ 6F97                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
 254+ 6F97 B9          >                        cp      c
 254+ 6F98 DA 9E 6F    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
 255+ 6F9B                                      ClearCarryFlag
 255+ 6F9B B7          >                        or a
 256+ 6F9C 99                                   sbc     c
 257+ 6F9D                                      ClearCarryFlag
 257+ 6F9D B7          >                        or a
 258+ 6F9E 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
 259+ 6F9F CB 13                                rl      e
 260+ 6FA1 CB 12                                rl      d
 261+ 6FA3 05                                   dec     b
 262+ 6FA4 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
 263+ 6FA6 7B                                   ld      a,e
 264+ 6FA7 B5                                   or      l
 265+ 6FA8 42                                   ld      b,d
 266+ 6FA9 C9                                   ret
 267+ 6FAA              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
 267+ 6FAA AF          >                        xor a
 268+ 6FAB 47                                   ld      b,a
 269+ 6FAC C9                                   ret
 270+ 6FAD
 271+ 6FAD 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 272+ 6FAE 15                                   dec     d
 273+ 6FAF 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 274+ 6FB1 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 275+ 6FB3 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 276+ 6FB5 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 277+ 6FB6 B3                                   or      e
 278+ 6FB7 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 279+ 6FB9 14                                   inc     d
 280+ 6FBA 15                                   dec     d
 281+ 6FBB CD 0D 71                             call    BC_Div_DE
 282+ 6FBE                                      ZeroA
 282+ 6FBE AF          >                        xor a
 283+ 6FBF EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 284+ 6FC0 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 285+ 6FC2 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 286+ 6FC3 C9                                   ret
 287+ 6FC4 AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 288+ 6FC5 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 289+ 6FC6 67                                   ld      h,a
 290+ 6FC7 6F                                   ld      l,a
 291+ 6FC8 C9                                   ret
 292+ 6FC9 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 293+ 6FCB 67                                   ld      h,a
 294+ 6FCC 6F                                   ld      l,a
 295+ 6FCD                                      SetCarryFlag
 295+ 6FCD 37          >                        scf
 296+ 6FCE C9                                   ret
 297+ 6FCF
 298+ 6FCF              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 299+ 6FCF                          IFDEF HLEquAmul256DivD_Used
 300+ 6FCF ~            HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 301+ 6FCF ~                                    sla		a							;
 302+ 6FCF ~                                    ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 303+ 6FCF ~            .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 304+ 6FCF ~                                    jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 305+ 6FCF ~                                    cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 306+ 6FCF ~                                    jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 307+ 6FCF ~            .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 308+ 6FCF ~                                    sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 309+ 6FCF ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 310+ 6FCF ~            .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 311+ 6FCF ~                                    rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 312+ 6FCF ~                                    djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 313+ 6FCF ~            .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 314+ 6FCF ~                                    jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 315+ 6FCF ~                                    ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 316+ 6FCF ~            .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 317+ 6FCF ~                                    ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 318+ 6FCF ~            .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 319+ 6FCF ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 320+ 6FCF ~                                    cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 321+ 6FCF ~                                    jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 322+ 6FCF ~                                    sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 323+ 6FCF ~            .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 324+ 6FCF ~                                    rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 325+ 6FCF ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 326+ 6FCF ~                                    ret
 327+ 6FCF ~            .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 328+ 6FCF ~                                    SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 329+ 6FCF ~                                    rl      l                           ;
 330+ 6FCF ~                                    jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 331+ 6FCF ~                                    ret
 332+ 6FCF ~            .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 333+ 6FCF ~                                    ret
 334+ 6FCF                          ENDIF
 335+ 6FCF
 336+ 6FCF BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 337+ 6FD0 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 338+ 6FD2 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 339+ 6FD4 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 340+ 6FD6 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 341+ 6FD8 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 342+ 6FDA                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 342+ 6FDA BA          >                        cp      d
 342+ 6FDB DA E0 6F    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 343+ 6FDE 92                                   sub     d
 344+ 6FDF                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 344+ 6FDF B7          >                        or a
 345+ 6FE0              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 345+ 6FE0 3F          >                        ccf
 346+ 6FE1 CB 13                                rl      e
 347+ 6FE3 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 348+ 6FE5 7B                                   ld      a,e
 349+ 6FE6 C9                                   ret
 350+ 6FE7 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 351+ 6FE8                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 351+ 6FE8 37          >                        scf
 352+ 6FE9 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 353+ 6FEB 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 354+ 6FED 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 355+ 6FEE C9                                   ret
 356+ 6FEF 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 357+ 6FF1 C9                                   ret
 358+ 6FF2 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 359+ 6FF4 C9                                   ret
 360+ 6FF5
 361+ 6FF5              ; Divide 8-bit values
 362+ 6FF5              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 363+ 6FF5              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 364+ 6FF5              ;
 365+ 6FF5              ;;;Div8:
 366+ 6FF5              ;;;    xor a
 367+ 6FF5              ;;;    ld b,8
 368+ 6FF5              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 369+ 6FF5              ;;;    rl e
 370+ 6FF5              ;;;    rla
 371+ 6FF5              ;;;    sub c
 372+ 6FF5              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 373+ 6FF5              ;;;    add a,c
 374+ 6FF5              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 375+ 6FF5              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 376+ 6FF5              ;;;    ld b,a0
 377+ 6FF5              ;;;    ld a,e
 378+ 6FF5              ;;;    rla
 379+ 6FF5              ;;;    cpl
 380+ 6FF5              ;;;    ret
 381+ 6FF5
 382+ 6FF5              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 383+ 6FF5              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 384+ 6FF5              ;;         A is a copy of E
 385+ 6FF5              ;;         HL is the remainder
 386+ 6FF5              ;;         BC is not changed
 387+ 6FF5              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 388+ 6FF5              ;140 bytes
 389+ 6FF5              ;145cc
 390+ 6FF5
 391+ 6FF5              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 392+ 6FF5 ~                                rla
 393+ 6FF5 ~                                adc     hl,hl
 394+ 6FF5 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 395+ 6FF5 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 396+ 6FF5 ~                                add     hl,bc
 397+ 6FF5                                  ENDM
 398+ 6FF5
 399+ 6FF5 AF           DEequDEDivBC:       xor a
 400+ 6FF6 ED 62                            sbc hl,hl
 401+ 6FF8 7A                               ld a,d
 402+ 6FF9                                  MacroDEDivBC
 402+ 6FF9 17          >                    rla
 402+ 6FFA ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 402+ 6FFC ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 402+ 6FFE 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 402+ 7000 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 403+ 7001                                  MacroDEDivBC
 403+ 7001 17          >                    rla
 403+ 7002 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 403+ 7004 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 403+ 7006 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 403+ 7008 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 404+ 7009                                  MacroDEDivBC
 404+ 7009 17          >                    rla
 404+ 700A ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 404+ 700C ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 404+ 700E 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 404+ 7010 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 405+ 7011                                  MacroDEDivBC
 405+ 7011 17          >                    rla
 405+ 7012 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 405+ 7014 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 405+ 7016 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 405+ 7018 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 406+ 7019                                  MacroDEDivBC
 406+ 7019 17          >                    rla

 427+ 7081              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 428+ 7081              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 429+ 7081              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 430+ 7081              ; Our use
 431+ 7081              ; BC = A0
 432+ 7081              ; DE = 0C
 433+ 7081              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 434+ 7081              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 434+ 7081 B9          >                        cp     c
 434+ 7082 D2 AD 70    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 435+ 7085 47                                   ld      b,a
 436+ 7086 59                                   ld      e,c
 437+ 7087 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 438+ 7089 16 00                                ld      d,0
 439+ 708B C3 98 70                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 440+ 708E 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 441+ 708F 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 442+ 7091 21 F0 66                             ld      hl,varQ
 443+ 7094 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 444+ 7095 16 00                                ld      d,0
 445+ 7097 5F                                   ld      e,a
 446+ 7098              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 447+ 7098 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 448+ 709B 78                                   ld      a,b
 449+ 709C 06 10                                ld      b,16
 450+ 709E CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 451+ 70A0 17                                   rla			; ...
 452+ 70A1 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 453+ 70A3 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 454+ 70A5 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 455+ 70A7 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 456+ 70A8 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 457+ 70A9 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 458+ 70AB 47                                   ld   b,a
 459+ 70AC C9                                   ret
 460+ 70AD 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 461+ 70B0 C9                                   ret
 462+ 70B1              ; switch to logarithm version
 463+ 70B1              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 464+ 70B1 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 465+ 70B3 AF                                   xor a
 466+ 70B4 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 467+ 70B6 17                                   rla
 468+ 70B7 BA                                   cp d
 469+ 70B8 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 469+ 70BA
 470+ 70BA 0C                                   inc c
 471+ 70BB 92                                   sub d
 472+ 70BC 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 473+ 70BE C9                                   ret
 474+ 70BF              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 475+ 70BF 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 476+ 70C1 AF                                   xor a
 477+ 70C2 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 478+ 70C4 CB 14                                rl	h
 479+ 70C6              ;    add hl,hl
 480+ 70C6 17                                   rla
 481+ 70C7 B9                                   cp c
 482+ 70C8 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 483+ 70CA 2C                                   inc l
 484+ 70CB 91                                   sub c
 485+ 70CC 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 486+ 70CE C9                                   ret
 487+ 70CF              ;
 488+ 70CF              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 489+ 70CF              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 490+ 70CF              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 491+ 70CF              ;
 492+ 70CF              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 493+ 70CF ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 494+ 70CF ~                                    rla				; ...
 495+ 70CF ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 496+ 70CF ~                                    jr	1F
 497+ 70CF ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 498+ 70CF ~            1:
 499+ 70CF ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 500+ 70CF                                      ENDM
 501+ 70CF
 502+ 70CF              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 503+ 70CF ~                                    rl  e
 504+ 70CF ~                                    rla
 505+ 70CF ~                                    sub c
 506+ 70CF ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 507+ 70CF ~                                    add a,c
 508+ 70CF ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 509+ 70CF                                      ENDM
 510+ 70CF
 511+ 70CF              ; Switch to a logarithm version
 512+ 70CF              ; Divide E by divider C Out: A = result, B = rest
 513+ 70CF              E_Div_C:                ZeroA
 513+ 70CF AF          >                        xor a
 514+ 70D0                                      EDivC_Iteration

 528+ 710D
 529+ 710D              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO
 530+ 710D ~                                    rla
 531+ 710D ~                                    adc	    hl,hl
 532+ 710D ~                                    add	    hl,de
 533+ 710D ~                                    jr	    c,1F
 534+ 710D ~                                    sbc	    hl,de
 535+ 710D ~            1:
 536+ 710D                                      ENDM
 537+ 710D
 538+ 710D
 539+ 710D              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 540+ 710D              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 541+ 710D              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 542+ 710D              ;min: 738cc
 543+ 710D              ;max: 898cc
 544+ 710D              ;avg: 818cc
 545+ 710D              ;144 bytes
 546+ 710D AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 547+ 710E 67                                   ld h,a
 548+ 710F 6F                                   ld l,a
 549+ 7110 93                                   sub e
 550+ 7111 5F                                   ld e,a
 551+ 7112 9F                                   sbc a,a
 552+ 7113 92                                   sub d
 553+ 7114 57                                   ld d,a
 554+ 7115 78                                   ld a,b
 555+ 7116                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration

 555+ 7117 ED 6A       >                        adc	    hl,hl
 555+ 7119 19          >                        add	    hl,de
 555+ 711A 38 02       >                        jr	    c,1F
 555+ 711C ED 52       >                        sbc	    hl,de
 555+ 711E             >1:

 574+ 7199 17                                   rla
 575+ 719A 4F                                   ld c,a
 576+ 719B C9                                   ret
 577+ 719C 78           Floor_DivQSigned:       ld      a,b             ; save resultant sign
 578+ 719D AA                                   xor     d               ;
 579+ 719E E6 80                                and     $80             ;
 580+ 71A0 DD 67                                ld      ixh,a           ;
 581+ 71A2 78                                   ld      a,b
 582+ 71A3 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 583+ 71A5 47                                   ld      b,a
 584+ 71A6 7A                                   ld      a,d
 585+ 71A7 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 586+ 71A9 57                                   ld      d,a
 587+ 71AA CD B2 71                             call    Floor_DivQ
 588+ 71AD 78                                   ld      a,b
 589+ 71AE DD B4                                or      ixh
 590+ 71B0 47                                   ld      b,a
 591+ 71B1 C9                                   ret
 592+ 71B2
 593+ 71B2
 594+ 71B2
 595+ 71B2              ; BC = BC / DE
 596+ 71B2              ; HL = BC % DE
 597+ 71B2              ; if HL > 0 BC -= 1
 598+ 71B2 78           Floor_DivQ:             ld      a,b
 599+ 71B3 B1                                   or      c
 600+ 71B4 28 26                                jr      z, .divide0By   ; if bc is zero just return as result will be zero
 601+ 71B6 7A                                   ld      a,d
 602+ 71B7 B3                                   or      e
 603+ 71B8 28 26                                jr      z, .divideBy0
 604+ 71BA D5                                   push    de
 605+ 71BB CD 0D 71     .DoDivide:              call    BC_Div_DE       ; bc(q0) = bc / de , hl(r0) = bc %de
 606+ 71BE D1                                   pop     de              ; get divisor back to test
 607+ 71BF CB 7A                                bit     7,d             ; if divisor <0 or = 0 goto else branch
 608+ 71C1 C2 D1 71                             jp      nz,.deLTE0
 609+ 71C4 7A                                   ld      a,d
 610+ 71C5 B3                                   or      e
 611+ 71C6 CA D1 71                             jp      z,.deLTE0
 612+ 71C9 CB 7C        .deGT0:                 bit     7,h             ; if remainder >=0 return with no adjustment
 613+ 71CB C8                                   ret     z               ; if remainder was not negative then all done
 614+ 71CC 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 615+ 71CD                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 615+ 71CD B7          >                        or a
 616+ 71CE ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 617+ 71D0 C9                                   ret
 618+ 71D1 CB 7C        .deLTE0:                bit     7,h             ; if remainder <= 0 retun with no adjustment
 619+ 71D3 C8                                   ret     z               ; (return if negative)
 620+ 71D4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 621+ 71D5 B5                                   or      l               ; (return if zero)
 622+ 71D6 C8                                   ret     z
 623+ 71D7 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 624+ 71D8                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 624+ 71D8 B7          >                        or a
 625+ 71D9 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 626+ 71DB C9                                   ret
 627+ 71DC 21 00 00     .divide0By:             ld      hl,0            ; hl = 0, bc is already 0
 628+ 71DF C9                                   ret
 629+ 71E0 21 00 00     .divideBy0:             ld      hl,0
 630+ 71E3 01 01 00                             ld      bc,1
 631+ 71E6 C9                                   ret
 632+ 71E7
 633+ 71E7
 634+ 71E7              L_DIV_0_ITERATION:      MACRO
 635+ 71E7 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 636+ 71E7 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 637+ 71E7 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 638+ 71E7 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 639+ 71E7 ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 640+ 71E7 ~                                    jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 641+ 71E7 ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 642+ 71E7 ~            .skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 643+ 71E7 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 644+ 71E7 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 645+ 71E7 ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 646+ 71E7 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 647+ 71E7 ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 648+ 71E7 ~                                    jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 649+ 71E7 ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 650+ 71E7 ~            .skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 651+ 71E7                                      ENDM
 652+ 71E7
 653+ 71E7              ; HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 654+ 71E7 21 00 00     l_div_0:                ld      hl,0            ;clear remainder
 655+ 71EA                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 655+ 71EA CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 655+ 71EE EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 655+ 71EF CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 655+ 71F3 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 655+ 71F4 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 655+ 71F7 D2 FB 71    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 655+ 71FA 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 655+ 71FB 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 655+ 71FC CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 655+ 7200 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 655+ 7201 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 655+ 7205 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 655+ 7206 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 655+ 7209 D2 0D 72    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 655+ 720C 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 655+ 720D 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 656+ 720E                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 656+ 720E CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 656+ 7212 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 656+ 7213 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 656+ 7217 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 656+ 7218 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 656+ 721B D2 1F 72    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 656+ 721E 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 656+ 721F 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 656+ 7220 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 656+ 7224 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 656+ 7225 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 656+ 7229 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 656+ 722A B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 656+ 722D D2 31 72    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 656+ 7230 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 656+ 7231 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 657+ 7232                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 657+ 7232 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 657+ 7236 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 657+ 7237 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 657+ 723B EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 657+ 723C B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 657+ 723F D2 43 72    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 657+ 7242 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 657+ 7243 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 657+ 7244 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 657+ 7248 EB          >                        ex      de,hl

 657+ 724D EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 657+ 724E B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 657+ 7251 D2 55 72    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 657+ 7254 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 657+ 7255 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 658+ 7256                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 658+ 7256 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry

 658+ 725F EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 658+ 7260 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 658+ 7263 D2 67 72    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 658+ 7266 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor

 658+ 7278 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 658+ 7279 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry

 659+ 7287 D2 8B 72    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 659+ 728A 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 659+ 728B 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 659+ 728C CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry

 660+ 72AF 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 660+ 72B0 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry

 660+ 72C0 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 660+ 72C1 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry

 661+ 72D2 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor

 661+ 72D4 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry

 661+ 72E1 D2 E5 72    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 661+ 72E4 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 661+ 72E5 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 662+ 72E6                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 662+ 72E6 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 662+ 72EA EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 662+ 72EB CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry

 662+ 72F3 D2 F7 72    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 662+ 72F6 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 662+ 72F7 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 662+ 72F8 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 662+ 72FC EB          >                        ex      de,hl

 662+ 7309 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 663+ 730A CB 13 CB 12                          rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 664+ 730E EB                                   ex      de,hl           ;dividend<>remainder

 666+ 7310
 667+ 7310
 668+ 7310
 669+ 7310
 670+ 7310 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 671+ 7313              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 671+ 7313 CB 25       >			   sla l
 671+ 7315 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 672+ 7317 7C                                   ld      a,h
 673+ 7318 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 674+ 731A                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 674+ 731A B9          >                        cp      c
 674+ 731B DA 26 73    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 675+ 731E 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 676+ 731F 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 677+ 7320 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 678+ 7321 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 679+ 7322 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 680+ 7324 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 681+ 7325 3F                                   ccf
 682+ 7326              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 682+ 7326 CB 13       >               rl  e
 682+ 7328 CB 12       >               rl  d
 683+ 732A 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 684+ 732C EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 685+ 732D C9                                   ret
 686+ 732E
 687+ 732E
 688+ 732E AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 689+ 732F 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 690+ 7331 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 691+ 7332 17                                   rla
 692+ 7333 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 693+ 7335 B9                                   cp	c
 694+ 7336 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 695+ 7338 91                                   sub	c
 696+ 7339 2C                                   inc	l
 697+ 733A 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 698+ 733C C9                                   ret
 699+ 733D              ;l_div, signed division
 700+ 733D              ; comes in with DE and HL
 701+ 733D              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 702+ 733D 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 703+ 733E 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 704+ 733F C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 705+ 7340 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 706+ 7341 7A                                   ld      a,d
 707+ 7342 B7                                   or      a
 708+ 7343 F2 4C 73                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 709+ 7346              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 709+ 7346 AF          >					xor 	a
 709+ 7347 93          >                    sub 	e
 709+ 7348 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 709+ 7349 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 709+ 734A 92          >                    sub 	d
 709+ 734B 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 710+ 734C 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 711+ 734D B7                                   or      a
 712+ 734E F2 57 73                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 713+ 7351                                      macronegate16bc
 713+ 7351 AF          >					xor 	a
 713+ 7352 91          >                    sub 	c
 713+ 7353 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 713+ 7354 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 713+ 7355 90          >                    sub 	b
 713+ 7356 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 714+ 7357 CD E7 71     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 715+ 735A                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 716+ 735A C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 717+ 735B 78                                   ld      a,b
 718+ 735C A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 719+ 735D F2 66 73                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 720+ 7360                                      macronegate16hl
 720+ 7360 AF          >					xor 	a
 720+ 7361 95          >					sub 	l
 720+ 7362 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 720+ 7363 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 720+ 7364 94          >					sub 	h
 720+ 7365 67          >					ld 		h,a
 721+ 7366 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 722+ 7367 B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 723+ 7368 F0                                   ret     p
 724+ 7369                                      macronegate16de
 724+ 7369 AF          >					xor 	a
 724+ 736A 93          >                    sub 	e
 724+ 736B 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 724+ 736C 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 724+ 736D 92          >                    sub 	d
 724+ 736E 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 725+ 736F C9                                   ret
 726+ 7370
# file closed: ../../Maths/asm_divide.asm
 670  7370                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 7370              asm_tis2:
   2+ 7370              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 7370              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 7370 F5           	push af
   5+ 7371 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 7373 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 7374 3A F0 66     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 7377 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 7378 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 7379 BB           	cp e
  11+ 737A 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 737C 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 737E ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 7380 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 7381 3A F0 66     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 7384 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 7385 CD BF 70     	call asm_div16
  18+ 7388 F1           	pop af
  19+ 7389 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 738B B5           	or l
  21+ 738C C9           	ret
  22+ 738D              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 738D F1           	pop af
  24+ 738E E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 7390 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 7392 C9           	ret
  27+ 7393
  28+ 7393
  29+ 7393              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 7393              squareregfx:
  31+ 7393 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 7396 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 7397 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 7398 ED 30        	mul
  35+ 739A EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 739B              squareregfy:
  37+ 739B 3A A8 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 739E 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 739F 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 73A0 ED 30        	mul
  41+ 73A2 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 73A3              squareregfz:
  43+ 73A3 3A AA C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 73A6 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 73A7 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 73A8 ED 30        	mul
  47+ 73AA 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 73AB EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 73AC              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 73AC CD 36 6D     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 73AF E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 73B0 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 73B1 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 73B2              normfx:
  55+ 73B2 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 73B5 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 73B6 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 73B7 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 73B8 CD 70 73     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 73BB 32 A6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 73BE              normfy:
  62+ 73BE 3A A8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 73C1 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 73C2 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 73C3 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 73C4 CD 70 73     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 73C7 32 A8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 73CA              normfz:
  69+ 73CA 3A AA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 73CD E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 73CE 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 73CF 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 73D0 CD 70 73     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 73D3 32 AA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 73D6              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 73D6 C9           	ret
  77+ 73D7
# file closed: ../../Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 671  73D7                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 73D7              ; Input:
   2+ 73D7              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 73D7              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 73D7              ; Output:
   5+ 73D7              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 73D7              ;
   7+ 73D7              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 73D7              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 73D7              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 73D7              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 73D7              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 73D7              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 73D7              ;
  14+ 73D7
  15+ 73D7
  16+ 73D7 E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 73D8 A7                               and     a
  18+ 73D9 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 73DB ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 73DD E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 73DE C9                               ret
  22+ 73DF
  23+ 73DF E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 73E0 A7                               and     a
  25+ 73E1 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 73E3 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 73E5 E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 73E6 C9                               ret
  29+ 73E7
  30+ 73E7
  31+ 73E7              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 73E7              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 73E7 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 73E8 AA                               xor d
  35+ 73E9 FA F3 73                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 73EC ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 73EE 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 73F0 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 73F1                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 73F1 37          >                        scf
  40+ 73F2 C9                               ret
  41+ 73F3 CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 73F5 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 73F7              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 73F7 B7          >                        or a
  44+ 73F8 C9                               ret
  45+ 73F9 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 73FA                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 73FA B7          >                        or a
  47+ 73FB C9                               ret
  48+ 73FC              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 73FC 37          >                        scf
  49+ 73FD C9                               ret
  50+ 73FE
  51+ 73FE              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 73FE 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 73FF BA                               cp  d
  54+ 7400 C0                               ret nz
  55+ 7401 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 7402 BB                               cp  e
  57+ 7403 C9                               ret
  58+ 7404
  59+ 7404
  60+ 7404
  61+ 7404 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 7405 A8                               xor b
  63+ 7406 FA 0F 74                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 7409 ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 740B 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 740D              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 740D 37          >                        scf
  67+ 740E C9                               ret
  68+ 740F CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 7411 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 7413              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 7413 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 7414 C9                               ret
  72+ 7415
  73+ 7415              CompareHLDESigned:
  74+ 7415 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  75+ 7416 A7                               and     a
  76+ 7417 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 7419 E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 741A C9                               ret
  79+ 741B              CompareHLBCSigned:
  80+ 741B E5           CompareHLBC:        push    hl
  81+ 741C A7                               and     a
  82+ 741D ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 741F E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 7420 C9                               ret
  85+ 7421
  86+ 7421              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 7421              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 7421
  89+ 7421 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 7423 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 7424 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 7426 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 7427 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 7428 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 742A 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 742B A7                               and     a
  97+ 742C ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  98+ 742E D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  99+ 7430 C9                               ret
