 672  7431                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 7431              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 7431              ; Tested and works with signed numbers
   3+ 7431 DD 7E 01     NormaliseIXVector:      ld		a,(ix+1)			; Vector X high
   4+ 7434 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = abs X high
   5+ 7436 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; hl = abs X ^ 2
   6+ 7437 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
   7+ 7438 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
   8+ 743A EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
   9+ 743B DD 7E 03                             ld		a,(ix+3)			; vector = Y high
  10+ 743E E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  11+ 7440 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; de = abs Y ^ 2
  12+ 7441 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  13+ 7442 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
  14+ 7444 19                                   add     hl,de               ; hl = x^2 + y ^2
  15+ 7445 DD 7E 05                             ld		a,(ix+5)			; vector = Z high
  16+ 7448 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; unsigned
  17+ 744A 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; de = abs Z ^ 2
  18+ 744B 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
  19+ 744C ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
  20+ 744E 19                                   add     hl,de               ; de = x^2 + y ^2 + z ^ 2
  21+ 744F EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  22+ 7450 CD 36 6D     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt de
  23+ 7453 DD 7E 01     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(ix+1)
  24+ 7456 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  25+ 7457 CD 91 76                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8    ; does not use HL so we can retain it
  26+ 745A 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  27+ 745B 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  28+ 745D DD 71 00 DD                          ld		(ix+0),bc           ; .
  28+ 7461 70 01
  29+ 7463 DD 7E 03     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(ix+3)
  30+ 7466 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  31+ 7467 CD 91 76                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  32+ 746A 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  33+ 746B 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  34+ 746D DD 71 02 DD                          ld		(ix+2),bc           ; .
  34+ 7471 70 03
  35+ 7473 DD 7E 05     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(ix+5)
  36+ 7476 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  37+ 7477 CD 91 76                             call	AequAdivDmul96Q8 	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  38+ 747A 47                                   ld		b,a				    ; Sort out restoring sign bit
  39+ 747B 0E 00                                ld      c,0                 ; .
  40+ 747D DD 71 04 DD                          ld		(ix+4),bc           ; .
  40+ 7481 70 05
  41+ 7483 C9                                   ret
  42+ 7484
  43+ 7484              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  44+ 7484 3A A6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
  45+ 7487 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  46+ 7489 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
  47+ 748B              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  47+ 748B 5F          >			ld	e,a
  47+ 748C 57          >			ld  d,a
  47+ 748D ED 30       >			mul
  48+ 748F 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  49+ 7490 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  50+ 7491 3A A7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  51+ 7494 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  52+ 7496 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  53+ 7498                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  53+ 7498 5F          >			ld	e,a
  53+ 7499 57          >			ld  d,a
  53+ 749A ED 30       >			mul
  54+ 749C 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  55+ 749D 3A A8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  56+ 74A0 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  57+ 74A2 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  58+ 74A4                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  58+ 74A4 5F          >			ld	e,a
  58+ 74A5 57          >			ld  d,a
  58+ 74A6 ED 30       >			mul
  59+ 74A8 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  60+ 74A9 EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  61+ 74AA CD 36 6D     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  62+ 74AD 3A A6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  63+ 74B0 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ 74B2 4F                                   ld		c,a
  65+ 74B3 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ 74B4 CD 47 76                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ 74B7 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  68+ 74B8 DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  69+ 74BA E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  70+ 74BC B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  71+ 74BD 32 A6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  72+ 74C0 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  73+ 74C3 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  74+ 74C5 4F                                   ld		c,a
  75+ 74C6 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  76+ 74C7 CD 47 76                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  77+ 74CA 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  78+ 74CB DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  79+ 74CD E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  80+ 74CF B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  81+ 74D0 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  82+ 74D3 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  83+ 74D6 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  84+ 74D8 4F                                   ld		c,a
  85+ 74D9 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  86+ 74DA CD 47 76                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  87+ 74DD 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  88+ 74DE FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  89+ 74E0 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  90+ 74E2 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  91+ 74E3 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  92+ 74E6 C9                                   ret
  93+ 74E7
  94+ 74E7              ; Normalise vector
  95+ 74E7              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  96+ 74E7              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  97+ 74E7              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  98+ 74E7              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  99+ 74E7
# file closed: ../../Maths/normalise96.asm
 673  74E7                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 74E7              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 74E7              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 74E7              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 74E7              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 74E7              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 74E7              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 74E7              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 74E7 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 74EA CD 00 75     	call	Num1
  10+ 74ED 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 74F0 CD 00 75     	call	Num1
  12+ 74F3 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 74F6 CD 00 75     	call	Num1
  14+ 74F9 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 74FB CD 00 75     	call	Num1
  16+ 74FE 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 7500              Num1:
  18+ 7500 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 7502              .Num2:
  20+ 7502 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 7503 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 7504 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 7506 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 7508 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 7509 13           	inc	de
  26+ 750A C9           	ret
  27+ 750B
  28+ 750B              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 750B 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 750D 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 750E C3 E7 74     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 7511
  33+ 7511              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 7511 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 7513 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 7514 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 7517 CD 27 75     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 751A 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 751C CD 00 75     	call	Num1
  40+ 751F 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 7521                                  DISPLAY "TODO:  optimise "
  42+ 7521 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  43+ 7522 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  44+ 7523 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  45+ 7525 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  46+ 7527              .NumLeadBlank1:
  47+ 7527 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  48+ 7529              .NumLeadBlank2:
  49+ 7529 3C           	inc	a
  50+ 752A 09           	add	hl,bc
  51+ 752B 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  52+ 752D FE 30        	cp	'0'
  53+ 752F 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  54+ 7531              .Blank:
  55+ 7531 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  56+ 7533              .DontBlank:
  57+ 7533 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  58+ 7535 12           	ld	(de),a
  59+ 7536 13           	inc	de
  60+ 7537 C9           	ret
  61+ 7538
  62+ 7538              DispQtyAtoDE:
  63+ 7538 FE 00        	cp	0
  64+ 753A 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  65+ 753C 26 00        	ld h,0
  66+ 753E 6F           	ld l,a
  67+ 753F 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  68+ 7542 CD 4E 75     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  69+ 7545 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  70+ 7547 CD 4E 75     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  71+ 754A 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  72+ 754C 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  73+ 754E              .NumLeadBlank1:
  74+ 754E 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  75+ 7550              .NumLeadBlank2:
  76+ 7550 3C           	inc	a
  77+ 7551 09           	add	hl,bc
  78+ 7552 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  79+ 7554 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  80+ 7556 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  81+ 7558              .Blank:
  82+ 7558 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  83+ 755A              .DontBlank:
  84+ 755A ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  85+ 755C 12           	ld	(de),a
  86+ 755D 13           	inc	de
  87+ 755E C9           	ret
  88+ 755F              .NoStock:
  89+ 755F 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  90+ 7561 12           	ld	(de),a
  91+ 7562 13           	inc	de
  92+ 7563 12           	ld	(de),a
  93+ 7564 13           	inc	de
  94+ 7565 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  95+ 7567 12           	ld	(de),a
  96+ 7568 13           	inc de
  97+ 7569 C9           	ret

 100+ 756A              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 101+ 756A              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 102+ 756A              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 103+ 756A              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX

 121+ 75B5 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'

 130+ 75CC 2A 94 75                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)

 132+ 75D1 22 94 75                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl

 134+ 75D6 0C                                   inc c
 135+ 75D7 3C                                   inc a

 137+ 75DA DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)

 674  7612                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm" ; AequAdivDmul96
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 7612              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 7612 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 7613 D2 2E 76    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 7616 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 7618 CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 761A                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 761A BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 761B DA 31 76    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 761E 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 761F 37                                   scf
   7+ 7620 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 7622 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 7624 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 7625 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 7627 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 7629 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 762A CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 762C 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 762D C9                                   ret
  16+ 762E 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 7630 C9                                   ret
  18+ 7631 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 7632 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 7634 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 7636 C3 24 76                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 7639
  23+ 7639
  24+ 7639              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 7639              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 7639              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 7639 CB 7F        	bit			        7,a
  28+ 763B 28 04        	jr			        z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 763D ED 44        	neg			        							; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 763F CB FF        	set			        7,a
  31+ 7641              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 7641              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 7641              TIS2:
  34+ 7641 4F                                   ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 7642 3A F0 66                             ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 7645 57                                   ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 7646 79                                   ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 7647 4F           AequAdivDmul967Bit:     ld          c,a
  39+ 7648 7A                                   ld          a,d
  40+ 7649 CB 27                                sla         a       ; wipe sign bit
  41+ 764B C8                                   ret         z       ; quick exit if dividing 0 as a will have the result of 0
  42+ 764C 30 10                                jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 764E B7           .ScaleDown:             or          a       ; clear carry bit
  44+ 764F CB 3A                                srl         d       ; d >> 1 to get back to 7 bit value
  45+ 7651 79                                   ld          a,c
  46+ 7652 E6 7F                                and         SignMask8Bit
  47+ 7654 CB 3F                                srl         a
  48+ 7656 47                                   ld          b,a
  49+ 7657 79                                   ld          a,c
  50+ 7658 E6 80                                and         $80
  51+ 765A B0                                   or          b
  52+ 765B C3 5F 76                             jp          AequAdivDmul96
  53+ 765E 79           .OKToDivide:            ld          a,c
  54+ 765F 4F           AequAdivDmul96:         ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  55+ 7660 E6 7F                                and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  56+ 7662                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  56+ 7662 BA          >                        cp     d
  56+ 7663 D2 83 76    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  57+ 7666 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  58+ 7668              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  59+ 7668 CB 27                                sla			a
  60+ 766A                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  60+ 766A BA          >                        cp      d
  60+ 766B DA 89 76    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  61+ 766E 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  62+ 766F 37                                   scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  63+ 7670 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  64+ 7672 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  65+ 7674 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  66+ 7675 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
  67+ 7677 CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
  68+ 7679 47                                   ld			b,a							; .
  69+ 767A CB 3F                                srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  70+ 767C 80                                   add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  71+ 767D 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  72+ 767E 79                                   ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  73+ 767F E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  74+ 7681 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  75+ 7682 C9                                   ret
  76+ 7683              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  77+ 7683 79           .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,c
  78+ 7684 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  79+ 7686 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  80+ 7688 C9                                   ret
  81+ 7689              .TIS2SkipSub:           ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  81+ 7689 B7          >                        or a
  82+ 768A CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  83+ 768C 38 DA                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  84+ 768E C3 74 76                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  85+ 7691
  86+ 7691
  87+ 7691
  88+ 7691              ; as per AequAdivDmul967Bit but Q is an 8 bit unsigned
  89+ 7691              ; a = a(S7)/Q(8u)*96
  90+ 7691 4F           AequAdivDmul96Q8:       ld          c,a                         ; c = a
  91+ 7692 7A           .CheckDivide0:          ld          a,d                         ; check if its a / 0
  92+ 7693 A7                                   and         a                           ; .
  93+ 7694 CA BB 76                             jp          z,.TIS2AccGTEQ              ; .
  94+ 7697 79           .NotDivide0:            ld          a,c                         ; get back value of A
  95+ 7698 E6 7F                                and         SignMask8Bit                ; and make it abs, so a = abs(a) c = original a
  96+ 769A                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  96+ 769A BA          >                        cp     d
  96+ 769B D2 BB 76    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  97+ 769E 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  98+ 76A0              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  99+ 76A0 CB 27                                sla			a
 100+ 76A2                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
 100+ 76A2 BA          >                        cp      d
 100+ 76A3 DA C1 76    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
 101+ 76A6 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
 102+ 76A7 37                                   scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
 103+ 76A8 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 104+ 76AA 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 105+ 76AC 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
 106+ 76AD CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
 107+ 76AF CB 3F                                srl			a							; .
 108+ 76B1 47                                   ld			b,a							; .
 109+ 76B2 CB 3F                                srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
 110+ 76B4 80                                   add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
 111+ 76B5 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
 112+ 76B6 79                                   ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
 113+ 76B7 E6 80                                and			SignOnly8Bit    			; recover sign only
 114+ 76B9 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
 115+ 76BA C9                                   ret
 116+ 76BB              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
 117+ 76BB 79           .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,c
 118+ 76BC E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
 119+ 76BE F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
 120+ 76C0 C9                                   ret
 121+ 76C1              .TIS2SkipSub:           ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
 121+ 76C1 B7          >                        or a
 122+ 76C2 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 123+ 76C4 38 DA                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 124+ 76C6 C3 AC 76                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
 125+ 76C9
 126+ 76C9
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 675  76C9                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ 76C9              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 76C9              fmltu:
   3+ 76C9 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 76CA 3A F0 66                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 76CD 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 76CE ED 30                                mul
   7+ 76D0 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 76D1 C9                                   ret
   9+ 76D2
  10+ 76D2 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 76D3 ED 30                                mul
  12+ 76D5 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 76D6 C9                                   ret
  14+ 76D7
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 676  76D7                  ;INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
 677  76D7                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 76D7              APequQmulA:
   2+ 76D7              asm_mult1:
   3+ 76D7              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 76D7 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 76D9 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 76DB 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 76DC 3A F0 66     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 76DF 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 76E0 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 76E2 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 76E4 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 76E5 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 76E7 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 76E8 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 76E9 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 76EB 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 76EC 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 76ED E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 76EF 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 76F0 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 76F2 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 76F3 32 F0 65     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 76F6 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 76F7 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 76F8 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 76F9 C9           	ret
  27+ 76FA              .mul0:
  28+ 76FA AF           	xor	a
  29+ 76FB 32 F0 65     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 76FE 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 76FF 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 7700 C9           	ret
  33+ 7701
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 678  7701                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 7701              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 7701              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 7701              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 7701              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 7701              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 7701              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 7701              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 7701              LL38:
   9+ 7701              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 7701              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 7701              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 7701              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 7701              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 7701              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 7701              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 7701              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 7701              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 7701              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 7701              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 7701              ;	ret
  21+ 7701              ; calculation table
  22+ 7701              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 7701              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 7701              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 7701              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 7701              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 7701              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 7701              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 7701              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 7701              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 7701
  32+ 7701              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 7701              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 7701              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 7701              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 7701
  37+ 7701
  38+ 7701              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 7701 21 F2 66     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 7704 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 7705 FA 10 77     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 7708 3A F0 66     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 770B 21 F1 66     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 770E 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 770F C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 7710              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 7710 3A F1 66     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 7713 21 F0 66     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 7716              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 7716              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 7716 B7          >                        or a
  51+ 7717 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 7718 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 771A              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 771A              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 771A              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 771A C9           	ret
  57+ 771B              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 771B FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 771D 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 771F ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 7721 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 7722 3A F2 66     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 7725 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 7727 32 F2 66     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 772A 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 772B                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 772B B7          >                        or a
  67+ 772C C9           	ret
  68+ 772D              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 772D 32 F2 66         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 7730                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 7730 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 7731 C9               ret
  72+ 7732              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 7732              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 7732              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 7732              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 7732              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 7732              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 7732              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 7732              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 7732              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 7732              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 7732              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 7732              ;--	ret
  84+ 7732
  85+ 7732              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 7732              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 7732              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 7732              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 7732              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 7732              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 7732              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 7732              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 7732              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 7732              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 7732              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 7732              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 7732              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 7732              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 7732              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 7732              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 7732              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 7732              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 7732              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 7732              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 7732              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 7732              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 7732              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 7732              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 7732              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 7732              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 7732              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 7732              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 7732              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 7732              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 7732              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 7732              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 7732              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 7732              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 7732              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 7732              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 7732              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 7732              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 7732              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 7732              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 7732
 142+ 7732
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
 679  7732                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ 7732              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 7732              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 7732              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 7732              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 7732              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 7732              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 7732              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 7732              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 7732              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 7732              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 7732              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ 7732              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ 7732              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ 7732              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ 7732              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ 7732              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ 7732              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ 7732              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 7732              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 7732              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 7732              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 7732              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ 7732              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ 7732              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ 7732              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ 7732              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ 7732              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ 7732              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ 7732              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ 7732              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ 7732              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ 7732              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ 7732              ;;;	ret
  34+ 7732              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ 7732              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ 7732              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ 7732              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ 7732              ;;;	ret
  39+ 7732
  40+ 7732              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 7732 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 7733 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 7734 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 7736              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 7736 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 7737 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 7738 C8             ret z
  48+ 7739 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 773C 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 773E              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 773E ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 7740 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 7741 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 7743 C9             ret
  55+ 7744
  56+ 7744              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 7744              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 7744              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 7744              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 7744 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 7746 AF                   xor a
  62+ 7747              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 7747 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 7748 17                   rla
  65+ 7749 B9                   cp c
  66+ 774A 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 774C 91                   sub c
  68+ 774D 2C                   inc l
  69+ 774E              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 774E 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 7750 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 7751 32 F1 66             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 7754 C9                   ret
  74+ 7755
  75+ 7755
  76+ 7755
  77+ 7755              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 7755              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 7755              BFRDIV:
  80+ 7755 F5           		push	af
  81+ 7756 3A F0 66     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 7759 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 775A F1           		pop		af
  84+ 775B FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 775D CA 74 77     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 7760              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 7760 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 7762 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 7763              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 7763 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 7765 AF           		xor a
  92+ 7766              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 7766 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 7767 17           		rla
  95+ 7768 B9           		cp c
  96+ 7769 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 776B 2C           		inc l
  98+ 776C 91           		sub c
  99+ 776D              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 776D 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 776F 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 7770 32 F1 66     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 7773 C9           		ret
 104+ 7774              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 7774 32 F1 66     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 7777 C9           		ret
 107+ 7778              ;	push	af
 108+ 7778              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 7778              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 7778              ;	pop		af
 111+ 7778              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 7778              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 7778              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 7778              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 7778              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 7778              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 7778              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 7778              ;	sla		a
 119+ 7778              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 7778              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 7778              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 7778              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 7778              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 7778              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 7778              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 7778              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 7778              ;	scf
 128+ 7778              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 7778              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 7778              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 7778              ;LL2:
 132+ 7778              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 7778              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 7778              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 7778              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 7778              ;	ret
 137+ 7778
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 680  7778                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 7778              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 7778              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 7778              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 7778 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 7779 3A F0 66     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 777C FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 777E 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 7780 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 7781 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 7783 AF               xor a
  11+ 7784              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 7784 CB 21            sla c
  13+ 7786 17               rla
  14+ 7787 BA               cp d
  15+ 7788 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 778A 0C               inc c
  17+ 778B 92               sub d
  18+ 778C              LL64:
  19+ 778C 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 778E 32 EF 66     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 7791 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 7792 32 F1 66     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 7795 C9               ret
  24+ 7796              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 7796 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 7798 32 F1 66     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 779B 32 EF 66     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 779E C9           	ret
  29+ 779F
# file closed: ../../Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
 681  779F                  INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm"
# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm
   1+ 779F              asm_mult12:
   2+ 779F              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 779F              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 779F CD D7 76     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 77A2 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 77A3 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 77A4 32 F2 66     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 77A7 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 77A8 32 F1 66     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 77AB 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ 77AC C9           	ret
  12+ 77AD

# file opened: ../../Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
   1+ 783D              ;rotmap0xLo: DB	0				; INWK +9
   2+ 783D              ;rotmap0xHi: DB	0				; INWK +10

  28+ 783D
  29+ 783D                  IFDEF USE_NORMALISE_IX
  30+ 783D
  31+ 783D              ; d = vector 1 e = vector 2 h = vector3 l = vector 4 b = vector 5
  32+ 783D              ; performs (d*e + h*l) / b and puts the result in de where e is 0
  33+ 783D C5           TidyCalc:       push    bc
  34+ 783E CD 3E 6B                     call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 1 * vector 2
  35+ 7841 EB                           ex      hl,de                   ; get hl into de and save result of de
  36+ 7842 CD 3E 6B                     call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 2 * vector 3
  37+ 7845 CD 04 00                     call    AddDEtoHLSigned         ; BC = HL = HL + DE
  38+ 7848 D1                           pop     de                      ; DE = BC saved from earlier
  39+ 7849 7C                           ld      a,h                     ; check for result 0
  40+ 784A B5                           or      l                       ; .
  41+ 784B CA 6C 78                     jp      z,.ZeroResult           ; .
  42+ 784E 44 4D                        ld      bc,hl                   ; .
  43+ 7850 7A                           ld      a,d                     ; check for divide by zero
  44+ 7851 A7                           and     a                       ; .
  45+ 7852 CA 63 78                     jp      z,.MaxedResult          ; .
  46+ 7855 5A                           ld      e,d                     ; now de = 0b (i.e. b register not hex value)
  47+ 7856 16 00                        ld      d,0                     ;
  48+ 7858 CD 9C 71                     call    Floor_DivQSigned        ; TO BE TESTED should do BC = BC / DE
  49+ 785B 78                           ld      a,b                     ; sign bit from b
  50+ 785C E6 80                        and     $80                     ; .
  51+ 785E B1                           or      c                       ; bring in the value
  52+ 785F 57                           ld      d,a                     ; de = c0 (i.e. c register not hex value)
  53+ 7860 1E 00                        ld      e,0                     ; .
  54+ 7862 C9                           ret
  55+ 7863 78           .MaxedResult:   ld      a,b                     ; make result signed unity (i.e. 1 or 96 in our case)
  56+ 7864 EE 80                        xor     $80
  57+ 7866 F6 60                        or      $60
  58+ 7868 57                           ld      d,a
  59+ 7869 1E 00                        ld      e,0
  60+ 786B C9                           ret
  61+ 786C 11 00 00     .ZeroResult:    ld      de,0
  62+ 786F C9                           ret
  63+ 7870              ; as per tidy calc except
  64+ 7870              ; d = vector 1 e = vector 2 h = vector3 l = vector 4
  65+ 7870              ; performs (d*e - h*l) / 96 and puts the result in de where e is 0
  66+ 7870
  67+ 7870 CD 3E 6B     TidySide:       call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 1 * vector 2
  68+ 7873 EB                           ex      de,hl                   ; get hl = vector 1 * vector 2
  69+ 7874 CD 3E 6B                     call    mulDbyESigned           ; de = vector 2 * vector 3
  70+ 7877 CD 00 00                     call    SubDEfromHLSigned       ; BC = HL = HL - DE
  71+ 787A 44 4D                        ld      bc,hl                   ; .
  72+ 787C 11 60 00                     ld      de,$60                  ; now de = 96
  73+ 787F CD 9C 71                     call    Floor_DivQSigned        ; TO BE TESTED should do BC = BC / DE
  74+ 7882 78                           ld      a,b                     ; sign bit from b
  75+ 7883 E6 80                        and     $80                     ; .
  76+ 7885 B1                           or      c                       ; bring in the value
  77+ 7886 57                           ld      d,a                     ; de = c0 (i.e. c register not hex value)
  78+ 7887 1E 00                        ld      e,0                     ; .
  79+ 7889 C9                           ret
  80+ 788A
  81+ 788A              ;; orthonormalise vector for UBnK ship vector uses IX IT
  82+ 788A                  DISPLAY "TidyVectorsIX"
  83+ 788A DD 21 35 C0  TidyVectorsIX:  ld      ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  84+ 788E CD 31 74                     call    NormaliseIXVector       ; initially we normalise the nose vector
  85+ 7891 3A 36 C0     .CheckNoseXSize:ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)  ; a = nose x
  86+ 7894 E6 30                        and     %00110000                ; if bits 7 and 6 are clear the work with nosey
  87+ 7896 CA CA 78                     jp      z, .NoseXSmall
  88+ 7899              ;-- When nosex is large ------------------------  roofv_x =-(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
  89+ 7899 3A 38 C0     .NoseXLarge:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)  ; a = nose x
  90+ 789C 57                           ld      d,a
  91+ 789D 3A 32 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)  ; hl = nosev_y * roofv_y
  92+ 78A0 5F                           ld      e,a                     ; we already have d so only need roofY
  93+ 78A1 3A 3A C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)  ; de = nosev_z * roofv_z
  94+ 78A4 67                           ld      h,a                     ; .
  95+ 78A5 3A 34 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)  ; .
  96+ 78A8 6F                           ld      l,a                     ; .
  97+ 78A9 3A 36 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  98+ 78AC 47                           ld      b,a
  99+ 78AD CD 3D 78                     call    TidyCalc
 100+ 78B0 7A                           ld      a,d
 101+ 78B1 B3                           or      e
 102+ 78B2 CA B9 78                     jp      z,.NoRoofXFlip
 103+ 78B5 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
 104+ 78B7 AA                           xor     d
 105+ 78B8 57                           ld      d,a
 106+ 78B9 ED 53 2F C0  .NoRoofXFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de   ; write roofvx
 107+ 78BD C3 25 79                     jp      .NormaliseRoofv
 108+ 78C0 11 00 E0     .MaxedRoofX:    ld      de,$E000                ; TEST if sign is correct for all of these if was divide by zero make it -1
 109+ 78C3 ED 53 2F C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de   ; write roofvx
 110+ 78C7 C3 25 79                     jp      .NormaliseRoofv
 111+ 78CA              ;-- When noseX is small ------------------------ determine if we are doign roofz or roof y
 112+ 78CA 3A 37 C0     .NoseXSmall:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
 113+ 78CD E6 60                        and     %01100000
 114+ 78CF CA FD 78                     jp      z,.NoseYSmall
 115+ 78D2              ;-- When noseY is large ------------------------ roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 116+ 78D2 3A 36 C0     .NoseYLarge:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 117+ 78D5 57                           ld      d,a
 118+ 78D6 3A 30 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 119+ 78D9 5F                           ld      e,a
 120+ 78DA 3A 38 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 121+ 78DD 67                           ld      h,a
 122+ 78DE 3A 32 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 123+ 78E1 6F                           ld      l,a
 124+ 78E2 3A 3A C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 125+ 78E5 47                           ld      b,a
 126+ 78E6 CD 3D 78                     call    TidyCalc
 127+ 78E9 7A                           ld      a,d
 128+ 78EA B3                           or      e
 129+ 78EB CA F6 78                     jp      z,.NoRoofZFlip
 130+ 78EE 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
 131+ 78F0 AA                           xor     d
 132+ 78F1 57                           ld      d,a
 133+ 78F2 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit
 134+ 78F4 AA                           xor     d
 135+ 78F5 57                           ld      d,a
 136+ 78F6 ED 53 33 C0  .NoRoofZFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),de   ; write roofvz
 137+ 78FA C3 25 79                     jp      .NormaliseRoofv
 138+ 78FD              ;-- When noseY is large ------------------------ roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 139+ 78FD 3A 36 C0     .NoseYSmall:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 140+ 7900 57                           ld      d,a
 141+ 7901 3A 30 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 142+ 7904 5F                           ld      e,a
 143+ 7905 3A 3A C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 144+ 7908 67                           ld      h,a
 145+ 7909 3A 34 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 146+ 790C 6F                           ld      l,a
 147+ 790D 3A 38 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 148+ 7910 47                           ld      b,a
 149+ 7911 CD 3D 78                     call    TidyCalc
 150+ 7914 7A                           ld      a,d
 151+ 7915 B3                           or      e
 152+ 7916 CA 21 79                     jp      z,.NoRoofYFlip
 153+ 7919 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit if not zero
 154+ 791B AA                           xor     d
 155+ 791C 57                           ld      d,a
 156+ 791D 3E 80                        ld      a,$80                   ; flip sign bit
 157+ 791F AA                           xor     d
 158+ 7920 57                           ld      d,a
 159+ 7921 ED 53 31 C0  .NoRoofYFlip:   ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de   ; write roofvy
 160+ 7925 DD 21 2F C0  .NormaliseRoofv:ld      ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX     ; now normalise roofv
 161+ 7929 CD 31 74                     call    NormaliseIXVector
 162+ 792C              ; -- sidev_x = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 163+ 792C 3A 3A C0     .CalcSidevX:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 164+ 792F 57                           ld      d,a
 165+ 7930 3A 32 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 166+ 7933 5F                           ld      e,a
 167+ 7934 3A 38 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 168+ 7937 67                           ld      h,a
 169+ 7938 3A 34 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 170+ 793B 6F                           ld      l,a
 171+ 793C CD 70 78                     call    TidySide
 172+ 793F ED 53 29 C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de   ; write sidevX
 173+ 7943              ; -- sidev_y = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 174+ 7943 3A 36 C0     .CalcSidevY:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 175+ 7946 57                           ld      d,a
 176+ 7947 3A 34 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 177+ 794A 5F                           ld      e,a
 178+ 794B 3A 3A C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 179+ 794E 67                           ld      h,a
 180+ 794F 3A 30 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 181+ 7952 6F                           ld      l,a
 182+ 7953 CD 70 78                     call    TidySide
 183+ 7956 ED 53 2B C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de   ; write sidevX
 184+ 795A              ; -- sidev_z = (nosev_y * roofv_x - nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 185+ 795A 3A 38 C0     .CalcSidevZ:    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 186+ 795D 57                           ld      d,a
 187+ 795E 3A 30 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 188+ 7961 5F                           ld      e,a
 189+ 7962 3A 36 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 190+ 7965 67                           ld      h,a
 191+ 7966 3A 32 C0                     ld      a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 192+ 7969 6F                           ld      l,a
 193+ 796A CD 70 78                     call    TidySide
 194+ 796D ED 53 2D C0                  ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),de   ; write sidevX
 195+ 7971 C9                           ret

 197+ 7972 ~            ;
 198+ 7972 ~            ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
 199+ 7972 ~
 200+ 7972 ~            ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
 201+ 7972 ~            ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
 202+ 7972 ~            ; TESTED OK
 203+ 7972 ~
 204+ 7972 ~
 205+ 7972 ~            NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
 206+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
 207+ 7972 ~            .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
 208+ 7972 ~                                    ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
 209+ 7972 ~            .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
 210+ 7972 ~                                    ld      e,a
 211+ 7972 ~                                    mul     de
 212+ 7972 ~                                    ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
 213+ 7972 ~            .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
 214+ 7972 ~            .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
 215+ 7972 ~                                    ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
 216+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,a
 217+ 7972 ~                                    ld      e,a
 218+ 7972 ~                                    mul     de
 219+ 7972 ~                                    ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
 220+ 7972 ~            .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
 221+ 7972 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
 222+ 7972 ~                                    ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
 223+ 7972 ~            .YSquared:              ld      e,a
 224+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,a
 225+ 7972 ~                                    mul     de                          ; de = y squared
 226+ 7972 ~                                    add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
 227+ 7972 ~                                    add     hl,bc                       ;
 228+ 7972 ~                                    ex      de,hl
 229+ 7972 ~                                    call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 230+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,l
 231+ 7972 ~                                    ld      iyl,d
 232+ 7972 ~            .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
 233+ 7972 ~                                    call    AequAdivDmul96Q8
 234+ 7972 ~                                    DISPLAY "TODO: ERROR if D is > 127 then it thinkgs its -ve number and falls appart"
 235+ 7972 ~                                   ;TODO : Need a divison routine where D is unsigned as its sqare rooted so will always be positive
 236+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,a
 237+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,(XX15VecX)
 238+ 7972 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 239+ 7972 ~                                    or      d
 240+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (XX15VecX),a
 241+ 7972 ~            .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
 242+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,l
 243+ 7972 ~                                    call    AequAdivDmul96Q8
 244+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,a
 245+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,(XX15VecY)
 246+ 7972 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 247+ 7972 ~                                    or      d
 248+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (XX15VecY),a
 249+ 7972 ~            .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
 250+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,l
 251+ 7972 ~                                    call    AequAdivDmul96Q8
 252+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,a
 253+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
 254+ 7972 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 255+ 7972 ~                                    or      d
 256+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (XX15VecZ),a
 257+ 7972 ~                                    ret
 258+ 7972 ~
 259+ 7972 ~            TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
 260+ 7972 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
 261+ 7972 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
 262+ 7972 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
 263+ 7972 ~                                    ENDM
 264+ 7972 ~            TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO
 265+ 7972 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
 266+ 7972 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 267+ 7972 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 268+ 7972 ~                                    ENDM
 269+ 7972 ~
 270+ 7972 ~
 271+ 7972 ~            TidyUbnK:               ;break
 272+ 7972 ~                                    TidyNormaliseNoseV
 273+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Now check and see which vector elemetn we are going to
 274+ 7972 ~                                    and     %01100000                   ; if X is not small then we go straigth to roofx
 275+ 7972 ~                                    jp      nz,.ProcessRoofX            ; .
 276+ 7972 ~            .TidyXIsSmall:          ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; Else we test Y on to using
 277+ 7972 ~                                    and     %01100000                   ; if Y is not small we process roofz
 278+ 7972 ~                                    jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .
 279+ 7972 ~            ;...roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 280+ 7972 ~            .ProcessRoofY:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 281+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 282+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 283+ 7972 ~                                    call	RSequQmulA
 284+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 285+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 286+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 287+ 7972 ~                                    call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 288+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 289+ 7972 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit
 290+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,a
 291+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 292+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (varQ),a
 293+ 7972 ~            .YTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 294+ 7972 ~                                    and     $7F
 295+ 7972 ~                                    or      e
 296+ 7972 ~                                    cp      0
 297+ 7972 ~                                    jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 298+ 7972 ~                                    ZeroA
 299+ 7972 ~                                    jp      .SetRoofZ
 300+ 7972 ~            .YTestDiv0:             cp      0
 301+ 7972 ~                                    jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest
 302+ 7972 ~            .YDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 303+ 7972 ~                                    or      d
 304+ 7972 ~                                    jp      .SetRoofZ
 305+ 7972 ~            .SkipYZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 306+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (varP),a
 307+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,d
 308+ 7972 ~                                    call    DVIDT
 309+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,b
 310+ 7972 ~            .SetRoofY:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a
 311+ 7972 ~                                    jp      .DoneRoof
 312+ 7972 ~            ;...roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 313+ 7972 ~            .ProcessRoofZ:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; Failing that we default to Z
 314+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a				    ; q = nosev_y
 315+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)	    ;roov z
 316+ 7972 ~                                    call	RSequQmulA
 317+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)	    ; nosev z
 318+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a				    ; b = regX for now
 319+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 320+ 7972 ~                                    call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 321+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 322+ 7972 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit
 323+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,a
 324+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 325+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (varQ),a
 326+ 7972 ~            .ZTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 327+ 7972 ~                                    and     $7F
 328+ 7972 ~                                    or      e
 329+ 7972 ~                                    cp      0
 330+ 7972 ~                                    jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 331+ 7972 ~                                    ZeroA
 332+ 7972 ~                                    jp      .SetRoofZ
 333+ 7972 ~            .ZTestDiv0:             cp      0
 334+ 7972 ~                                    jr      nz,.SkipZZeroTest
 335+ 7972 ~            .ZDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 336+ 7972 ~                                    or      d
 337+ 7972 ~                                    jp      .SetRoofZ
 338+ 7972 ~            .SkipZZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 339+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (varP),a
 340+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,d
 341+ 7972 ~                                    call    DVIDT
 342+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,b
 343+ 7972 ~            .SetRoofZ:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a
 344+ 7972 ~                                    jp      .DoneRoof
 345+ 7972 ~            ;...roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 346+ 7972 ~            .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y
 347+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 348+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; A = roofv Y
 349+ 7972 ~                                    call	RSequQmulA                  ; RS = NoseY & RoofY
 350+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 351+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 352+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 353+ 7972 ~                                    call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 354+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; flip sign bit
 355+ 7972 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit
 356+ 7972 ~                                    ld      d,a
 357+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 358+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (varQ),a
 359+ 7972 ~            .XTest0Div:             ld      a,d
 360+ 7972 ~                                    and     $7F
 361+ 7972 ~                                    or      e
 362+ 7972 ~                                    cp      0
 363+ 7972 ~                                    jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 364+ 7972 ~                                    ZeroA
 365+ 7972 ~                                    jp      .SetRoofZ
 366+ 7972 ~            .XTestDiv0:             cp      0
 367+ 7972 ~                                    jr      nz,.SkipXZeroTest
 368+ 7972 ~            .XDivideByZero:         ld      a,96
 369+ 7972 ~                                    or      d
 370+ 7972 ~                                    jp      .SetRoofX
 371+ 7972 ~            .SkipXZeroTest:         ld      a,e
 372+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (varP),a
 373+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,d
 374+ 7972 ~                                    call    DVIDT
 375+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,b
 376+ 7972 ~            .SetRoofX:              ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a
 377+ 7972 ~            .DoneRoof:              TidyNormaliseRoofV
 378+ 7972 ~            ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 379+ 7972 ~            .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 380+ 7972 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit
 381+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 382+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	     ;roov z
 383+ 7972 ~                                    call	RSequQmulA
 384+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)		; nosev z
 385+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 386+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 387+ 7972 ~                                    call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 388+ 7972 ~                                    call    BAequDEdiv96
 389+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,b
 390+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 391+ 7972 ~            ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 392+ 7972 ~            .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 393+ 7972 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit
 394+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 395+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z
 396+ 7972 ~                                    call	RSequQmulA                  ; rs = nosex * roofz
 397+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 398+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now
 399+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roofv y
 400+ 7972 ~                                    call	madDEequQmulAaddRS          ; DE = noseyz* roofz +
 401+ 7972 ~                                    call    BAequDEdiv96
 402+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,b
 403+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a         ;-(-nosev_y * roofv_x + nosev_x * roofv_y) / 96
 404+ 7972 ~            ;...sidez = ((nosey * roofx) - nosex * roofy) / 96
 405+ 7972 ~            .DoSidevZ:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ;
 406+ 7972 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit
 407+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 408+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 409+ 7972 ~                                    call	RSequQmulA
 410+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)		; nosev z
 411+ 7972 ~                                    ld		(varQ),a							; b = regX for now
 412+ 7972 ~                                    ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 413+ 7972 ~                                    call	madDEequQmulAaddRS
 414+ 7972 ~                                    call    BAequDEdiv96
 415+ 7972 ~                                    ld      a,b
 416+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 417+ 7972 ~                                    ZeroA
 418+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),a
 419+ 7972 ~                                    ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),a

 422+ 7972 ~
 423+ 7972 ~
 424+ 7972 ~            TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 425+ 7972 ~            		; b = regX on entry
 426+ 7972 ~            TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 427+ 7972 ~            		ex		af,af'
 428+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,b
 429+ 7972 ~            		ld		(varQ),a
 430+ 7972 ~            		ex		af,af'
 431+ 7972 ~            		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 432+ 7972 ~            		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 433+ 7972 ~            ; USES 				A BC E
 434+ 7972 ~            ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 435+ 7972 ~            Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 436+ 7972 ~            		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 437+ 7972 ~            		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 438+ 7972 ~            		ld		e,a							; ..
 439+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 440+ 7972 ~            		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 441+ 7972 ~            		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 442+ 7972 ~            TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 443+ 7972 ~            		sla		a
 444+ 7972 ~            		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 445+ 7972 ~            		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 446+ 7972 ~            		scf
 447+ 7972 ~            		rl		b							;  T1
 448+ 7972 ~            		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 449+ 7972 ~            TIS1KIPCont:
 450+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,b							;   T1
 451+ 7972 ~            		or		e							;   restore T sign
 452+ 7972 ~            		ret
 453+ 7972 ~            TIS1SkipSub:
 454+ 7972 ~            	or			a
 455+ 7972 ~            	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 456+ 7972 ~            	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 457+ 7972 ~            	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 458+ 7972 ~
 459+ 7972 ~            ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 460+ 7972 ~            ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz

 535+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y

 545+ 7972 ~            		ld		b,9
 546+ 7972 ~                    xor     a
 547+ 7972 ~            .ClearLoLoop:

 558+ 7972 ~
 559+ 7972 ~
 560+ 7972 ~            CalcRoofvX:
 561+ 7972 ~            Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 562+ 7972 ~            		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 563+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 564+ 7972 ~            		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 565+ 7972 ~            		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 566+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 567+ 7972 ~            		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 568+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,d
 569+ 7972 ~            		and 	$80
 570+ 7972 ~            		ld		iyh,a
 571+ 7972 ~            ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 572+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 573+ 7972 ~            		ld		c,a								; temp save
 574+ 7972 ~            		and		$80
 575+ 7972 ~            		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 576+ 7972 ~            		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 577+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,c								; recover a
 578+ 7972 ~            		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 579+ 7972 ~            		ld		b,d
 580+ 7972 ~            		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 581+ 7972 ~            		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 582+ 7972 ~            		ld		e,0
 583+ 7972 ~            		call	BC_Div_DE
 584+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 585+ 7972 ~            		xor		$80								; flip sign
 586+ 7972 ~            		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 587+ 7972 ~            		or		b
 588+ 7972 ~            		ret
 589+ 7972 ~
 590+ 7972 ~
 591+ 7972 ~            CalcRoofvY:
 592+ 7972 ~            Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y

 594+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)

 600+ 7972 ~            		and 	$80
 601+ 7972 ~            		ld		iyh,a
 602+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 603+ 7972 ~            		ld		c,a								; temp save
 604+ 7972 ~            		and		$80
 605+ 7972 ~            		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 606+ 7972 ~            		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 607+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,c								; recover a
 608+ 7972 ~            		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 609+ 7972 ~            		ld		b,d
 610+ 7972 ~            		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 611+ 7972 ~            		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 612+ 7972 ~            		ld		e,0
 613+ 7972 ~            		call	BC_Div_DE
 614+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,iyh

 618+ 7972 ~            		ret

 620+ 7972 ~            CalcRoofvZ:
 621+ 7972 ~            Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 622+ 7972 ~            		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 623+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 624+ 7972 ~            		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 625+ 7972 ~            		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 626+ 7972 ~            		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
