  26++CA69 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  27++CA6A E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  28++CA6B 31 35 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkrotmatNosevX ; Source                        ; 10
  29++CA6E E1                                   pop     hl                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevX              ; 10
  30++CA6F D1                                   pop     de                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevY              ; 10
  31++CA70 C1                                   pop     bc                  ; UBnkrotmatSidevZ              ; 10
  32++CA71 31 73 C0                             ld      sp,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+2                             ; 10
  33++CA74 C5                                   push    bc                                                  ; 10
  34++CA75 D5                                   push    de                                                  ; 10
  35++CA76 E5                                   push    hl                                                  ; 10
  36++CA77 DD F9                                ld      sp,ix               ; restore stack                 ; 10
  37++CA79                                  IFNDEF INTERRUPS_DISABLE
  38++CA79 ~                                    ei
  39++CA79                                  ENDIF
  40++CA79 C9                                   ret                                                         ; 10 Total 267 (LDI version is 318)
  41++CA7A
  42++CA7A
  43++CA7A
  44++CA7A              ;CopyRotmatToTransMat:
  45++CA7A              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  46++CA7A              ;                        ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  47++CA7A              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  48++CA7A              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  49++CA7A              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatRoofvX
  50++CA7A              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  51++CA7A              ;                        ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  52++CA7A              ;                        ld      de, UBnkTransmatNosevX
  53++CA7A              ;                        SixLDIInstrunctions
  54++CA7A              ;                        ret
  55++CA7A
  56++CA7A              CopyRotToTransMacro:    MACRO
  57++CA7A ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  58++CA7A ~                                    ld      de,UBnkTransmatSidevX
  59++CA7A ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  60++CA7A ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  61++CA7A ~                                    SixLDIInstrunctions
  62++CA7A                                      ENDM

# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/CopyRotmatToTransMat.asm
 379+ CA7A                                      INCLUDE "../../Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
   1++CA7A              TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15:
   2++CA7A 2A AC C0             ld		hl,(UBnkXX12xLo)					; get X into HL
   3++CA7D 7C           		ld		a,h			                        ; get XX12 Sign
   4++CA7E E6 80        		and		$80									; check sign bit on high byte
   5++CA80 47           		ld		b,a									; and put it in of 12xlo in b
   6++CA81                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
   7++CA81 7C                   ld      a,h
   8++CA82 E6 7F                and     $7F
   9++CA84 67                   ld      h,a
  10++CA85                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  11++CA85 ED 5B 20 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKxlo)						;
  12++CA89 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKxsgn)						; get Ship Pos (low,high,sign)
  13++CA8C E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  14++CA8E 4F           		ld		c,a									; and put sign of unkxsgn c
  15++CA8F CD 33 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; this will result in HL = result and A = sign
  16++CA92 B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H to give 15 bit signed (*NOT* 2's c)
  17++CA93 67           		ld		h,a
  18++CA94 22 A6 C0     		ld		(UBnkXScaled),hl					; now write it out to XX15 X pos
  19++CA97              ; ..................................
  20++CA97 2A AE C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12yLo)					; Repeat above for Y coordinate
  21++CA9A 7C           		ld		a,h
  22++CA9B E6 80        		and		$80
  23++CA9D 47           		ld		b,a
  24++CA9E                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  25++CA9E 7C                   ld      a,h
  26++CA9F E6 7F                and     $7F
  27++CAA1 67                   ld      h,a
  28++CAA2                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  29++CAA2 ED 5B 23 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKylo)
  30++CAA6 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKysgn)
  31++CAA9 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  32++CAAB 4F           		ld		c,a
  33++CAAC CD 33 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  34++CAAF B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  35++CAB0 67           		ld		h,a
  36++CAB1 22 A8 C0     		ld		(UBnkYScaled),hl
  37++CAB4              ; ..................................
  38++CAB4 2A B0 C0     		ld		hl,(UBnkXX12zLo)					; and now repeat for Z cooord
  39++CAB7 7C           		ld		a,h
  40++CAB8 E6 80        		and		$80
  41++CABA 47           		ld		b,a
  42++CABB                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  43++CABB 7C                   ld      a,h
  44++CABC E6 7F                and     $7F
  45++CABE 67                   ld      h,a
  46++CABF                      ;110921 debugld      h,0
  47++CABF ED 5B 26 C0  		ld		de,(UBnKzlo)
  48++CAC3 3A 28 C0     		ld		a,(UBnKzsgn)
  49++CAC6 E6 80        		and		$80									; make sure we only have bit 7
  50++CAC8 4F           		ld		c,a
  51++CAC9 CD 33 00     		call 	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC
  52++CACC B4           		or		h									; combine sign in A with H
  53++CACD 67           		ld		h,a
  54++CACE CB 7C        		bit		7,h                                 ; if sign if positive then we don't need to do the clamp so we ony jump
  55++CAD0 20 16        		jr		nz,ClampZto4                        ; result was negative so we need to clamp to 4
  56++CAD2 E6 7F                and     $7F                                 ; a = value unsigned
  57++CAD4 20 06                jr      nz,NoClampZto4                      ; if high byte was 0 then we could need to clamp still by this stage its +v but and will set z flag if high byte is zero
  58++CAD6 7D                   ld      a,l                                 ; get low byte now
  59++CAD7              		JumpIfALTNusng 4,ClampZto4					; if its < 4 then fix at 4
  59++CAD7 FE 04       >                        cp      4
  59++CAD9 DA E8 CA    >                        jp		c, ClampZto4
  60++CADC              NoClampZto4:
  61++CADC 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl					; hl = signed calculation and > 4
  62++CADF 7D           		ld		a,l									; in addition write out the z cooord to UT for now for backwards compat (DEBUG TODO remove later)
  63++CAE0 32 0C 67             ld      (varT),a
  64++CAE3 7C           		ld		a,h
  65++CAE4 32 EF 66             ld      (varU),a
  66++CAE7 C9           		ret
  67++CAE8              ClampZto4:											; This is where we limit 4 to a minimum of 4
  68++CAE8 21 04 00     		ld		hl,4
  69++CAEB 22 AA C0     		ld		(UBnkZScaled),hl; BODGE FOR NOW
  70++CAEE 7D           		ld		a,l
  71++CAEF 32 0C 67             ld      (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
  72++CAF2 7C           		ld		a,h
  73++CAF3 32 EF 66             ld      (varU),a 						; compatibility for now
  74++CAF6 C9           		ret
  75++CAF7
# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15.asm
 380+ CAF7                                      INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm
   1++CAF7              ScaleNodeTo8Bit:								; TODO make signed
   2++CAF7 ED 4B AA C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)
   3++CAFB 2A A6 C0     	ld			hl,(UBnkXScaled)
   4++CAFE ED 5B A8 C0  	ld			de,(UBnkYScaled)
   5++CB02              SetABSbc:
   6++CB02 78           	ld			a,b
   7++CB03 DD 67        	ld			ixh,a
   8++CB05 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
   9++CB07 47           	ld			b,a									; bc = ABS bc
  10++CB08              SetABShl:
  11++CB08 7C           	ld			a,h
  12++CB09 DD 6F        	ld			ixl,a
  13++CB0B E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  14++CB0D 67           	ld			h,a									; hl = ABS hl
  15++CB0E              SetABSde:
  16++CB0E 7A           	ld			a,d
  17++CB0F FD 67        	ld			iyh,a
  18++CB11 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit
  19++CB13 57           	ld			d,a									; de = ABS de
  20++CB14              ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop:
  21++CB14 78               ld          a,b		                            ; U	\ z hi
  22++CB15 B4           	or			h                                   ; XX15+1	\ x hi
  23++CB16 B2           	or			d                                   ; XX15+4	\ y hi
  24++CB17 28 0F            jr          z,ScaleNodeDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
  25++CB19                  ShiftHLRight1
  25++CB19 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  25++CB1B CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  26++CB1D                  ShiftDERight1
  26++CB1D CB 3A       >			   srl d
  26++CB1F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  27++CB21              	ShiftBCRight1
  27++CB21 CB 38       >			   srl b
  27++CB23 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  28++CB25 C3 14 CB         jp          ScaleNodeTo8BitLoop
  29++CB28              ScaleNodeDone:										; now we have scaled values we have to deal with sign
  30++CB28 DD 7C        	ld			a,ixh								; get sign bit and or with b
  31++CB2A E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  32++CB2C B0           	or			b
  33++CB2D 47           	ld			b,a
  34++CB2E              SignforHL:
  35++CB2E DD 7D        	ld			a,ixl								; get sign bit and or with b
  36++CB30 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  37++CB32 B4           	or			h
  38++CB33 67           	ld			h,a
  39++CB34              SignforDE:
  40++CB34 FD 7C        	ld			a,iyh								; get sign bit and or with b
  41++CB36 E6 80        	and			SignOnly8Bit
  42++CB38 B2           	or			d
  43++CB39 57           	ld			d,a
  44++CB3A              SignsDoneSaveResult:
  45++CB3A ED 43 AA C0  	ld			(UBnkZScaled),bc
  46++CB3E 22 A6 C0     	ld			(UBnkXScaled),hl
  47++CB41 ED 53 A8 C0  	ld			(UBnkYScaled),de
  48++CB45 78           	ld			a,b
  49++CB46 32 EF 66     	ld			(varU),a
  50++CB49 79           	ld			a,c
  51++CB4A 32 0C 67     	ld			(varT),a
  52++CB4D C9           	ret
  53++CB4E
# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Maths/Utilities/ScaleNodeTo8Bit.asm

 391+ CB5C AF                                   xor     a
 392+ CB5D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 393+ CB5E C9                                   ret

 396+ CB62 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 397+ CB64 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4  TODO add this into blueprint data for speed                                                           ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 398+ CB66 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 399+ CB67 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 400+ CB6A 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
 401+ CB6C              SetAllFacesVisibleLoop:
 402+ CB6C 77           EE30:                   ld      (hl),a
 403+ CB6D 23                                   inc     hl

 407+ CB71 3A 03 C4     SetAllFacesHidden:      ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)            ; (XX0),Y which is XX0[0C] or UBnkHullCopy+ShipHullFacesCount                           ;;; Faces count (previously loaded into b up front but no need to shave bytes for clarity
 408+ CB74 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; else do explosion needs all vertices                                                  ;;;
 409+ CB76 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ;  /=4                                                                                  ;;; For loop = 15 to 0
 410+ CB78 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; b = Xreg = number of normals, faces
 411+ CB79 06 10                                ld      b,16
 412+ CB7B 21 D2 C0                             ld      hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 413+ CB7E 3E 00                                ld      a,$00

 416+ CB82 10 FC                                djnz    SetAllFacesHiddenLoop

 418+ CB85              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 419+ CB85                                      include "../../Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
   1++CB85              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
   2++CB85 47           Norm256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
   3++CB86 0E 00                                ld      c,0
   4++CB88 16 00                                ld      d,0
   5++CB8A 3A F0 66                             ld      a,(varQ)
   6++CB8D 5F                                   ld      e,a
   7++CB8E              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
   8++CB8E              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
   9++CB8E 21 00 00     NormDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  10++CB91 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++CB92 06 10                                ld      b,16
  12++CB94 CB 31        NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll	    c		; unroll 16 times
  13++CB96 17                                   rla	    		; ...
  14++CB97 ED 6A                                adc	    hl,hl		; ...
  15++CB99 ED 52                                sbc	    hl,de		; ...
  16++CB9B 30 02                                jr	    nc,NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  17++CB9D 19                                   add	    hl,de		; ...
  18++CB9E 0D                                   dec	    c		; ...
  19++CB9F 10 F3        NormDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    NormDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  20++CBA1 79                                   ld      a,c
  21++CBA2 32 F1 66                             ld      (varR),a
  22++CBA5 C9                                   ret
  23++CBA6
  24++CBA6 FD 67        Norm256mulAdivQSignA:   ld      iyh,a
  25++CBA8                                      ClearSignBitA
  25++CBA8 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  26++CBAA CD 85 CB                             call    Norm256mulAdivQ              ; do 15 bit unsigned
  27++CBAD FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                       ; now correct R reg
  28++CBAF                                      SignBitOnlyA
  28++CBAF E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  29++CBB1 B1                                   or      c
  30++CBB2 32 F1 66                             ld      (varR),a
  31++CBB5 C9                                   ret
  32++CBB6
  33++CBB6              ; Tested OK
  34++CBB6              ;LL21
  35++CBB6              NormaliseTransMat:
  36++CBB6                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
  37++CBB6 ~                            ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1     ; initialise loop
  38++CBB6 ~                            ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  39++CBB6 ~                            MMUSelectMathsTables
  40++CBB6 ~            .LL21Loop:      ld      d,(hl)
  41++CBB6 ~                            dec     hl
  42++CBB6 ~                            ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  43++CBB6 ~                            ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  44++CBB6 ~                            ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  45++CBB6 ~                            push	hl
  46++CBB6 ~                            push	bc
  47++CBB6 ~                            call    AEquAmul256Div197Log        ; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  48++CBB6 ~                            ;ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  49++CBB6 ~                            pop		bc
  50++CBB6 ~                            pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  51++CBB6 ~                            ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  52++CBB6 ~                            dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  53++CBB6 ~                            djnz    .LL21Loop                   ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  54++CBB6 ~                            MMUSelectROM0
  55++CBB6 ~                            ret
  56++CBB6                      ELSE
  57++CBB6 21 72 C0                     ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevZ+1         ; initialise loop
  58++CBB9 0E C5                        ld      c,ConstNorm                 ; c = Q = norm = 197
  59++CBBB 79                           ld      a,c
  60++CBBC 32 F0 66                     ld      (varQ),a                    ; set up varQ
  61++CBBF 06 09                        ld      b,9                         ; total of 9 elements to transform
  62++CBC1 56           LL21Loop:       ld      d,(hl)
  63++CBC2 2B                           dec     hl
  64++CBC3 5E                           ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = hilo now   hl now = pointer to low byte
  65++CBC4                              ShiftDELeft1                        ; De = DE * 2
  65++CBC4 CB 23       >			   sla e
  65++CBC6 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  66++CBC8 7A                           ld      a,d                         ; a = hi byte after shifting
  67++CBC9 E5                           push	hl
  68++CBCA C5                           push	bc
  69++CBCB CD 85 CB                     call    Norm256mulAdivQ
  70++CBCE                              ;===call    RequAmul256divC				; R = (2(hi).0)/ConstNorm - LL28 Optimised BFRDIV R=A*256/Q = delta_y / delta_x Use Y/X grad. as not steep
  71++CBCE 79                           ld      a,c                         ; BFRDIV returns R also in l reg
  72++CBCF C1                           pop		bc
  73++CBD0 E1                           pop		hl							; bc gets wrecked by BFRDIV
  74++CBD1 77                           ld      (hl),a                      ; write low result to low byte so zlo = (zhl *2)/197, we keep hi byte in tact as we need the sign bit
  75++CBD2 2B                           dec     hl                          ; now hl = hi byte of pre val e.g z->y->x
  76++CBD3 10 EC                        djnz    LL21Loop                    ; loop from 2zLo through to 0xLo
  77++CBD5 C9                           ret
  78++CBD6                      ENDIF
# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/NormaliseTransMat.asm
 420+ CBD6              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 421+ CBD6                                      include "../../Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
   1++CBD6              ; TESTEDOK
   2++CBD6
   3++CBD6              ;ScaleOrientationXX16:                       ; DEBUG TODO will combine with inverse later
   4++CBD6              ;        ld      a,(XX17)
   5++CBD6              ;        ld      ixl,a
   6++CBD6              ;        ld      ixh,9
   7++CBD6              ;        ld      hl,UBnkTransInv0x
   8++CBD6              ;        ld      a,(hl)
   9++CBD6              ;ScaleNode:
  10++CBD6              ;        ld      b,ixl
  11++CBD6              ;ScaleNodeLoop:
  12++CBD6              ;        sla      a
  13++CBD6              ;        djnz    ScaleNodeLoop
  14++CBD6              ;        ld      (hl),a
  15++CBD6              ;        inc     hl
  16++CBD6              ;        inc     hl
  17++CBD6              ;        dec     ixh
  18++CBD6              ;        jr      nz,ScaleNode
  19++CBD6              ;        ret
  20++CBD6
  21++CBD6
  22++CBD6              InverseXX16:								; lead routine into .LL42	\ ->  &4B04 \ DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat
  23++CBD6              ; we coudl combine this with move to transmat later as an optimisation
  24++CBD6              ; INPUT - All Scaled
  25++CBD6              ;  They transmat has already been put into side, roof nose order
  26++CBD6              ;  XX16   = |sidev_x| |sidev_y| |sidev_z|  1  0  3  2  5  4 note each bytepair is Scaled value in low and high byte just for sign
  27++CBD6              ;  XX16   = |roofv_x| |roofv_y| |roofv_z|  7  6  8  9 11 10
  28++CBD6              ;  XX16   = |nosev_x| |nosev_y| |nosev_z| 13 12 15 14 17 16
  29++CBD6              ; OUTPUT
  30++CBD6              ;  XX16(1 0)   ( 3 2) ( 5 4 ) =  sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x
  31++CBD6              ;  XX16(7 6)   ( 8 9) (11 10) =  sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y
  32++CBD6              ;  XX16(13 12) (15 14)(17 16) =  sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z
  33++CBD6              ; First all side values become compoment 0 of each vector
  34++CBD6 2A 61 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevX)     ;
  35++CBD9 ED 5B 67 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvX)     ;
  36++CBDD ED 4B 6D C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevX)     ;
  37++CBE1 22 79 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x0),hl     ;
  38++CBE4 ED 53 7B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x1),de     ;
  39++CBE8 ED 43 7D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow0x2),bc     ;
  40++CBEC 2A 63 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevY)     ;
  41++CBEF ED 5B 69 C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvY)     ;
  42++CBF3 ED 4B 6F C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevY)     ;
  43++CBF7 22 81 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y0),hl     ;
  44++CBFA ED 53 83 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y1),de     ;
  45++CBFE ED 43 85 C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow1y2),bc     ;
  46++CC02 2A 65 C0             ld      hl,(UBnkTransmatSidevZ)     ;
  47++CC05 ED 5B 6B C0          ld      de,(UBnkTransmatRoofvZ)     ;
  48++CC09 ED 4B 71 C0          ld      bc,(UBnkTransmatNosevZ)     ;
  49++CC0D 22 89 C0             ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z0),hl     ;
  50++CC10 ED 53 8B C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z1),de     ;
  51++CC14 ED 43 8D C0          ld      (UbnkTransInvRow2z2),bc     ;
  52++CC18 C9                   ret
  53++CC19
  54++CC19
# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/InverseXX16.asm
 422+ CC19              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 423+ CC19              XX12DotOneRow:
 424+ CC19              XX12CalcX:              N0equN1byN2div256 varT, (hl), (UBnkXScaled)       ; T = (hl) * regXX15fx /256
 424+ CC19 3A A6 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)                        ;
 424+ CC1C 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 424+ CC1D 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 424+ CC1E 57          >                        ld      d,a
 424+ CC1F ED 30       >                        mul
 424+ CC21 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 424+ CC22 32 0C 67    >                        ld      (varT),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 425+ CC25 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 426+ CC26              XX12CalcXSign:          AequN1xorN2 UBnkXScaledSign,(hl)             ;
 426+ CC26 3A A7 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 426+ CC29 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 427+ CC2A 32 F2 66                             ld      (varS),a                            ; Set S to the sign of x_sign * sidev_x
 428+ CC2D 23                                   inc     hl
 429+ CC2E              XX12CalcY:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ, (hl),(UBnkYScaled)       ; Q = XX16 * XX15 /256 using varQ to hold regXX15fx
 429+ CC2E 3A A8 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)                        ;
 429+ CC31 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 429+ CC32 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 429+ CC33 57          >                        ld      d,a
 429+ CC34 ED 30       >                        mul
 429+ CC36 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 429+ CC37 32 F0 66    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 430+ CC3A                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = T =  |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256
 430+ CC3A 3A 0C 67    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 430+ CC3D 32 F1 66    >                        ld       (varR),a
 431+ CC40 23                                   inc     hl
 432+ CC41                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkYScaledSign,(hl)             ; Set A to the sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 432+ CC41 3A A9 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaledSign)
 432+ CC44 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 433+ CC45              ; (S)A = |sidev_x| * x_lo / 256  = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 434+ CC45 E5           STequSRplusAQ           push    hl
 435+ CC46 CD 01 77                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ 1byte add (subtract)
 436+ CC49 E1                                   pop     hl
 437+ CC4A 32 0C 67                             ld      (varT),a                            ; T = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 438+ CC4D 23                                   inc     hl
 439+ CC4E              XX12CalcZ:              N0equN1byN2div256 varQ,(hl),(UBnkZScaled)       ; Q = |sidev_z| * z_lo / 256
 439+ CC4E 3A AA C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                        ;
 439+ CC51 5F          >                        ld      e,a                         ; use e as var Q = value of XX15 [n] lo
 439+ CC52 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                        ; A = XX16 element
 439+ CC53 57          >                        ld      d,a
 439+ CC54 ED 30       >                        mul
 439+ CC56 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
 439+ CC57 32 F0 66    >                        ld      (varQ),a                      ; Q         ; result variable = XX16[n] * XX15[n]/256
 440+ CC5A                                      ldCopyByte varT,varR                        ; R = |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo
 440+ CC5A 3A 0C 67    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 440+ CC5D 32 F1 66    >                        ld       (varR),a
 441+ CC60 23                                   inc     hl
 442+ CC61                                      AequN1xorN2 UBnkZScaledSign,(hl)             ; A = sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 442+ CC61 3A AB C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 442+ CC64 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 443+ CC65              ; (S)A= |sidev_x| * x_lo + |sidev_y| * y_lo + |sidev_z| * z_lo
 444+ CC65 CD 01 77                             call    baddll38                            ; JSR &4812 \ LL38   \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 445+ CC68              ; Now we exit with A = result S = Sign
 446+ CC68 C9                                   ret
 447+ CC69
 448+ CC69
 449+ CC69                  DISPLAY "Tracing 4", $
 450+ CC69
 451+ CC69              ;-- LL51---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 452+ CC69              ;TESTED OK
 453+ CC69              ;XX12EquScaleDotOrientation:                         ; .LL51 \ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z
 454+ CC69              XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16:
 455+ CC69 01 00 00                             ld      bc,0                                ; LDX, LDY 0
 456+ CC6C 21 61 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX
 457+ CC6F CD 19 CC                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 458+ CC72 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a
 459+ CC75 3A F2 66                             ld      a,(varS)
 460+ CC78 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a
 461+ CC7B 21 67 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX
 462+ CC7E CD 19 CC                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 463+ CC81 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a
 464+ CC84 3A F2 66                             ld      a,(varS)
 465+ CC87 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a
 466+ CC8A 21 6D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX
 467+ CC8D CD 19 CC                             call    XX12DotOneRow
 468+ CC90 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
 469+ CC93 3A F2 66                             ld      a,(varS)
 470+ CC96 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a
 471+ CC99 C9                                   ret
 472+ CC9A              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 473+ CC9A                                      INCLUDE "../../Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ScaledToXX18.asm
   1++CC9A              CopyXX12ScaledToXX18:
   2++CC9A              CopyResultToDrawCam:
   3++CC9A                      ldCopyByte XX12         ,XX18             ; XX12+0 => XX18+0  Set XX18(2 0) = dot_sidev
   3++CC9A 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12)
   3++CC9D 32 9A C0    >                        ld       (XX18),a
   4++CCA0                      ldCopyByte XX12+1       ,XX18+2           ; XX12+1 => XX18+2
   4++CCA0 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+1)
   4++CCA3 32 9C C0    >                        ld       (XX18+2),a
   5++CCA6                      ldCopyByte XX12+2       ,XX18+3           ; XX12+2 => XX18+3  Set XX12+1 => XX18+2
   5++CCA6 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   5++CCA9 32 9D C0    >                        ld       (XX18+3),a
   6++CCAC                      ldCopyByte XX12+3       ,XX18+5           ; XX12+3 => XX18+5
   6++CCAC 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+3)
   6++CCAF 32 9F C0    >                        ld       (XX18+5),a
   7++CCB2                      ldCopyByte XX12+4       ,XX18+6           ; XX12+4 => XX18+6  Set XX18(8 6) = dot_nosev
   7++CCB2 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   7++CCB5 32 A0 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+6),a
   8++CCB8                      ldCopyByte XX12+5       ,XX18+8           ; XX12+5 => XX18+8
   8++CCB8 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+5)
   8++CCBB 32 A2 C0    >                        ld       (XX18+8),a
   9++CCBE C9                   ret

   1++CD09 2A 20 C0     LoadCraftToCamera:      ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)            ; UBnKxlo, UBnKxhi
   2++CD0C ED 5B 22 C0                          ld      de,(UBnKxsgn)           ; UBnKxsgn, UBnKylo
   3++CD10 ED 4B 24 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnKyhi)            ; UBnKyhi, UBnKysgn
   4++CD14 22 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl    ; UBnkDrawCam0xLo, UBnkDrawCam0xHi

   7++CD1F

  57++CD4F              LL94Z:
  58++CD4F 26 00                ld      h,0                                                     ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z
  59++CD51 16 00                ld      d,0                                                     ;
  60++CD53 3A AA C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)                                         ;
  61++CD56 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
  62++CD57 3A AB C0             ld      a,(UBnkZScaledSign)                                     ;
  63++CD5A 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  64++CD5B 3A A0 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)                                     ;
  65++CD5E 5F                   ld      e,a                                                     ;
  66++CD5F 3A A2 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)                                    ;
  67++CD62 4F                   ld      c,a                                                     ;
  68++CD63 CD 33 00             call    ADDHLDESignBC                                           ;
  69++CD66 47                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
  70++CD67 7C                   ld      a,h                                                     ;
  71++CD68 78                   ld      a,b                                                     ;           else  Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
  72++CD69 32 AB C0             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a                                     ;
  73++CD6C 7D                   ld      a,l                                                     ;
  74++CD6D 32 AA C0             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a                                         ;           endif

  79++CD77 6F                   ld      l,a                                                     ;
