 477+ CDB3                                      INCLUDE "../../Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++CDB3              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++CDB3              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++CDB3                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++CDB3 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++CDB6 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++CDB9                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++CDB9 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++CDBC 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++CDBF                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++CDBF 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++CDC2 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++CDC5 C9                   ret
   7++CDC6
# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 478+ CDC6              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 479+ CDC6                                      INCLUDE "../../Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++CDC6              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++CDC6              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++CDC6              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++CDC6              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++CDC6              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++CDC6              ;;; R = T
   7++CDC6              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++CDC6              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++CDC6              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++CDC6              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++CDC6              ;;; R = T
  12++CDC6              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++CDC6
  14++CDC6
  15++CDC6
  16++CDC6
  17++CDC6
  18++CDC6              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++CDC6 ~            						mul
  20++CDC6 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++CDC6              						ENDM
  22++CDC6              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++CDC6 3A AC C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++CDC9                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  24++CDC9 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  24++CDCA CA E7 CD    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  25++CDCD 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++CDCE 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++CDD1 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++CDD2                      JumpIfAIsZero dotxskipzero
  28++CDD2 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  28++CDD3 CA E7 CD    >                        jp	    z, dotxskipzero
  29++CDD6 ED 30        		mul
  30++CDD8 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++CDD9 3A AD C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++CDDC 21 A7 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++CDDF AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++CDE0 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++CDE2 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++CDE4 C3 EB CD             jp          dotmuly
  37++CDE7              dotxskipzero:
  38++CDE7 AF                   xor         a
  39++CDE8 47                   ld          b,a
  40++CDE9 FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++CDEB              dotmuly:
  42++CDEB              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++CDEB 3A AE C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++CDEE                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  44++CDEE A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  44++CDEF CA 0E CE    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  45++CDF2 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++CDF3 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++CDF6                      JumpIfAIsZero dotyskipzero
  47++CDF6 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  47++CDF7 CA 0E CE    >                        jp	    z, dotyskipzero
  48++CDFA 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++CDFB ED 30                mul
  50++CDFD 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++CDFE DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++CE00 3A AF C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++CE03 21 A9 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++CE06 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++CE07 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++CE09 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++CE0B C3 12 CE             jp          dotaddxy
  58++CE0E              dotyskipzero:
  59++CE0E AF                   xor         a
  60++CE0F 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++CE10 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++CE12              dotaddxy:
  63++CE12              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++CE12 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++CE14 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++CE15 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++CE17 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++CE18 FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++CE1A 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++CE1B CD 33 00             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++CE1E 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++CE1F 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++CE22                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  73++CE22 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  73++CE23 CA 48 CE    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  74++CE26 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++CE27 3A AA C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++CE2A                      JumpIfAIsZero dotzskipzero
  76++CE2A A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  76++CE2B CA 48 CE    >                        jp	    z, dotzskipzero
  77++CE2E 57                   ld          d,a
  78++CE2F ED 30                mul
  79++CE31 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++CE32 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++CE35 21 B1 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++CE38 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++CE39 E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++CE3B 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++CE3C E1                   pop         hl
  86++CE3D 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++CE3E 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++CE40 CD 33 00             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++CE43 32 F2 66             ld          (varS),a
  90++CE46 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++CE47 C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++CE48              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++CE48 78                   ld          a,b
  94++CE49 32 F2 66             ld          (varS),a
  95++CE4C 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++CE4D C9                   ret
  97++CE4E              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++CE4E              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++CE4E              ;;;;		mul
 104++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++CE4E              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++CE4E              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++CE4E              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++CE4E              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++CE4E              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++CE4E              ;;;;       mul
 117++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++CE4E              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++CE4E              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++CE4E              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++CE4E              ;;;;       mul
 132++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++CE4E              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++CE4E              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++CE4E              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++CE4E              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++CE4E              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++CE4E              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++CE4E
# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 480+ CE4E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 481+ CE4E              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 482+ CE4E              ; Not Used in code      include "Universe/Ships/ScaleNormal.asm"
 483+ CE4E              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 484+ CE4E                                      INCLUDE "../../Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++CE4E              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++CE4E              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++CE4E 3A 09 C4             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++CE51 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++CE52              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++CE52 3A A1 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++CE55 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++CE56                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++CE56 A7          >                        and     a
   8++CE57 C8          >                        ret     z
   9++CE58              LL90Loop:
  10++CE58              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++CE58 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++CE59                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++CE59 2A 9D C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++CE5C CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++CE5E CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++CE60 22 9D C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++CE63                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++CE63 2A 9A C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++CE66 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++CE68 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++CE6A 22 9A C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++CE6D                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++CE6D 2A A0 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++CE70 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++CE72 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++CE74 22 A0 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++CE77 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++CE78                      JumpIfAIsNotZero LL90Loop           ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++CE78 A7          >                        and     a
  16++CE79 C2 58 CE    >                        jp	    nz,LL90Loop
  17++CE7C C9                   ret
  18++CE7D
# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
 485+ CE7D              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 486+ CE7D
 487+ CE7D              ; Backface cull
 488+ CE7D              ; is the angle between the ship -> camera vector and the normal of the face as long as both are unit vectors soo we can check that normal z > 0
 489+ CE7D              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates
 490+ CE7D              ;
 491+ CE7D                                      INCLUDE "../../Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++CE7D 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++CE7E 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++CE7F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++CE81 32 A7 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++CE84 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++CE85 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++CE87 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++CE88 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++CE8A 32 A9 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++CE8D 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++CE8E CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++CE90 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++CE92 32 AB C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++CE95 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++CE96 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++CE97 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++CE9A 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++CE9B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++CE9C 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++CE9F 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++CEA0 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++CEA1 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
  23++CEA4 C9                                   ret
  24++CEA5
# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
 492+ CEA5                                      INCLUDE "../../Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++CEA5 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++CEA6 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++CEA7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   4++CEA9 32 AD C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++CEAC 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++CEAD CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++CEAF 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++CEB0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   9++CEB2 32 AF C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++CEB5 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++CEB6 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++CEB8 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  13++CEBA 32 B1 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++CEBD 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++CEBE 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++CEBF 32 AC C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++CEC2 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++CEC3 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  19++CEC4 32 AE C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  20++CEC7 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  21++CEC8 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;
  22++CEC9 32 B0 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a
  23++CECC C9                                   ret
  24++CECD
# file closed: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 493+ CECD              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 494+ CECD              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 495+ CECD                                      INCLUDE "../../ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++CECD              ;    DEFINE DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE 1
   2++CECD                  DEFINE CHECKDOTSHIPDATA  1
   3++CECD               ;   DEFINE DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW 1
   4++CECD 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   5++CECE              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   6++CECE              ; EE29:
   7++CECE
   8++CECE              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   9++CECE              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
  10++CECE              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
  11++CECE              ;       Where [x y z] =
  12++CECE              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  13++CECE              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  14++CECE              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  15++CECE              ;
  16++CECE              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  17++CECE              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  18++CECE              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  19++CECE              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  20++CECE              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  21++CECE              ;
  22++CECE              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  23++CECE              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  24++CECE              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  25++CECE              ;
  26++CECE              ; so
  27++CECE              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  28++CECE              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  29++CECE              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  30++CECE              ;
  31++CECE              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  32++CECE              ;
  33++CECE              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  34++CECE              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  35++CECE              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  36++CECE              ;
  37++CECE
  38++CECE
  39++CECE
  40++CECE 3A A1 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  41++CED1                                      JumpIfAIsZero .ScaleDone            ;
  41++CED1 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
  41++CED2 CA FE CE    >                        jp	    z, .ScaleDone
  42++CED5 2A 9A C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  43++CED8 ED 5B 9D C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  44++CEDC ED 4B A0 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  45++CEE0 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  46++CEE2                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  46++CEE2 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  46++CEE4 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  47++CEE6                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  47++CEE6 CB 3A       >			   srl d
  47++CEE8 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  48++CEEA                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  48++CEEA CB 38       >			   srl b
  48++CEEC CB 19       >			   rr  c
  49++CEEE 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  50++CEEF                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  50++CEEF A7          >                        and     a
  50++CEF0 C2 E0 CE    >                        jp	    nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  51++CEF3 22 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  52++CEF6 ED 53 9D C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  53++CEFA ED 43 A0 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  54++CEFE FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  55++CF00 32 F7 66                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  56++CF03 C9                                   ret
  57++CF04
  58++CF04 3A 28 C0     CheckVisible:           ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                 ; Is the ship behind us
  59++CF07 E6 80        .CheckBehind:           and     SignOnly8Bit                 ; which means z sign is negative
  60++CF09 20 2A                                jr      nz,.ShipNoDraw               ; .
  61++CF0B 2A 26 C0     .CheckViewPort:         ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                 ; now check to see if its within 90 degree arc
  62++CF0E 7C                                   ld      a,h
  63++CF0F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng ShipMaxDistance, .ShipNoDraw
  63++CF0F FE C0       >                        cp     ShipMaxDistance
  63++CF11 D2 35 CF    >                        jp		nc,.ShipNoDraw
  64++CF14 ED 5B 20 C0  .CheckXAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKxlo)                 ; if abs x > abx z then its out side of view port
  65++CF18 CD 15 74                             call    compare16HLDE
  66++CF1B 38 18                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  67++CF1D ED 5B 23 C0  .CheckYAxis:            ld      de,(UBnKylo)                ; if abs y > abx z then its out side of view port
  68++CF21 CD 15 74                             call    compare16HLDE
  69++CF24 38 0F                                jr      c,.ShipNoDraw               ; ship is too far out on the X Axis
  70++CF26                                      IFDEF   CHECKDOTSHIPDATA
  71++CF26 3A 04 C4     .CheckDotV2:                ld      a,(DotAddr)
  72++CF29                                          JumpIfAGTENusng h, .DrawFull
  72++CF29 BC          >                        cp     h
  72++CF2A D2 30 CF    >                        jp		nc,.DrawFull
  73++CF2D C3 39 CF                                 jp      .ShipIsADot
  74++CF30 CD 2C C6     .DrawFull:                  call    UnivVisibleNonDot           ;
  75++CF33                                          ClearCarryFlag
  75++CF33 B7          >                        or a
  76++CF34 C9                                       ret
  77++CF35                                      ELSE
  78++CF35 ~            .CalculateXX4:              ShiftHLRight1                       ; hl = z pos / 8
  79++CF35 ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  80++CF35 ~                                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; .
  81++CF35 ~                                        ld      a,h
  82++CF35 ~                                        srl     a                           ; if a / 16 <> 0 then ship is a dot
  83++CF35 ~            .DrawAsDotCheck:            JumpIfNotZero   .ShipIsADot
  84++CF35 ~                                        ; Check visbility distance
  85++CF35 ~            .SetXX4Dist:                ;break
  86++CF35 ~                                        ld      a,l
  87++CF35 ~                                        rra                                 ; l may have had bit 0 of h carried in
  88++CF35 ~                                        srl     a                           ; so move it to bit 4 giving A as distance $000xxxxx
  89++CF35 ~                                        srl     a
  90++CF35 ~                                        srl     a
  91++CF35 ~                                        ld      (UBnkDrawAllFaces),a        ; XX4 = "all faces" distance
  92++CF35 ~                                        call    UnivVisibleNonDot               ;
  93++CF35 ~                                        ClearCarryFlag
  94++CF35 ~                                        ret
  95++CF35                                      ENDIF
  96++CF35 CD 40 C6     .ShipNoDraw:            call    UnivInvisible
  97++CF38 C9                                   ret
  98++CF39              .ShipIsADot:            IFDEF DEBUGDRAWDISTANCE
  99++CF39 ~                                        call    UnivVisible  ;
 100++CF39                                      ELSE
 101++CF39 CD 37 C6                                 call    UnivVisibleDot
 102++CF3C                                      ENDIF
 103++CF3C C9                                   ret
 104++CF3D
 105++CF3D                                                  DISPLAY "TODO:remove all teh processing of rotmat to load craft to camera as its already been done"
 106++CF3D              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 106++CF3D 3A 03 C4    >                        ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 106++CF40 A7          >                        and a
 106++CF41 C8          >                        ret    z
 107++CF42                                      ;break
 108++CF42 CD 50 CA                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 109++CF45 CD 48 65                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 110++CF48 CD 09 CD                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 111++CF4B                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 112++CF4B 3A 09 C4     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 113++CF4E FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 114++CF50              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 115++CF50 CD CE CE                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 116++CF53 CD 2D CD                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 117++CF56 CD DB 64     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 118++CF59 CD 9A CC                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 119++CF5C 21 C9 C5     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 120++CF5F 22 F6 65                             ld      (varV),hl
 121++CF62 3A 03 C4                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 122++CF65 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 123++CF67 CB 3F                                srl     a                                              ;
 124++CF69 47                                   ld      b,a                                            ;
 125++CF6A AF                                   xor     a
 126++CF6B 32 CD CE                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                          ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 127++CF6E E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 128++CF6F C5                                   push    bc
 129++CF70 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                         ; Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 130++CF71 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                            ; if normal visibility range  < XX4
 131++CF73 E5                                   push    hl
 132++CF74 21 52 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkDrawAllFaces
 133++CF77 BE                                   cp      (hl)
 134++CF78 E1                                   pop     hl
 135++CF79                                      IFDEF DEBUGFORCEFACEDRAW
 136++CF79 ~                                        jp      .FaceVisible
 137++CF79                                      ELSE
 138++CF79 DA BE D0                                 jp      c,.FaceVisible              ; then we always draw
 139++CF7C                                      ENDIF
 140++CF7C              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 141++CF7C CD A5 CE     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 142++CF7F 3A F7 66                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 143++CF82 47                                   ld      b,a
 144++CF83                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 144++CF83 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 144++CF85 DA C0 CF    >                        jp		c, .ScaleNormByXX17
 145++CF88 CD E4 CC     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 146++CF8B C3 4F D0                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 147++CF8E 3A 9A C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 148++CF91 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 149++CF93 32 9A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 150++CF96 3A A0 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 151++CF99 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 152++CF9B 32 A0 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 153++CF9E 3A 9D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 154++CFA1 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 155++CFA3 32 9D C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 156++CFA6 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 157++CFA8                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 157++CFA8 3A A6 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 157++CFAB CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 157++CFAD 32 A6 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 158++CFB0                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 158++CFB0 3A A8 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 158++CFB3 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 158++CFB5 32 A8 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 159++CFB8                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 159++CFB8 3A AA C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 159++CFBB CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 159++CFBD 32 AA C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 160++CFC0              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 161++CFC0              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 162++CFC0 CD BF CC                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 163++CFC3 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 164++CFC4 FA E3 CF                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 165++CFC7              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 165++CFC7 3A A6 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 165++CFCA CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 165++CFCC 32 A6 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 166++CFCF                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 166++CFCF 3A A8 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 166++CFD2 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 166++CFD4 32 A8 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 167++CFD7                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 167++CFD7 3A AA C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 167++CFDA CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 167++CFDC 32 AA C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 168++CFDF 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 169++CFE0 F2 C7 CF                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 170++CFE3              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 171++CFE3              ; Add normal to XX15
 172++CFE3              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 173++CFE3              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 174++CFE3              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 175++CFE3              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 176++CFE3              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 176++CFE3 3A AA C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 176++CFE6 32 F1 66    >                        ld       (varR),a
 177++CFE9                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 177++CFE9 3A B1 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 177++CFEC 32 F2 66    >                        ld       (varS),a
 178++CFEF                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 178++CFEF 3A A0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 178++CFF2 32 F0 66    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 179++CFF5 3A A2 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 180++CFF8 CD 01 77                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 181++CFFB DA 8E CF                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 182++CFFE 32 AA C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 183++D001                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 183++D001 3A F2 66    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 183++D004 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 184++D007                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 184++D007 3A A6 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 184++D00A 32 F1 66    >                        ld       (varR),a
 185++D00D                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 185++D00D 3A AD C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 185++D010 32 F2 66    >                        ld       (varS),a
 186++D013                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 186++D013 3A 9A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 186++D016 32 F0 66    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 187++D019 3A 9C C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 188++D01C CD 01 77                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 189++D01F DA 8E CF                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 190++D022 32 A6 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 191++D025                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 191++D025 3A F2 66    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 191++D028 32 A7 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 192++D02B                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 192++D02B 3A A8 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 192++D02E 32 F1 66    >                        ld       (varR),a
 193++D031                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 193++D031 3A AF C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 193++D034 32 F2 66    >                        ld       (varS),a
 194++D037                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 194++D037 3A 9D C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 194++D03A 32 F0 66    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 195++D03D 3A 9F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 196++D040 CD 01 77                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 197++D043 DA 8E CF                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 198++D046 32 A8 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 199++D049                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 199++D049 3A F2 66    >                        ld       a,(varS)
 199++D04C 32 A9 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 200++D04F              ; calculate dot product LL89
 201++D04F              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 201++D04F 3A AC C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 201++D052 32 F0 66    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 202++D055 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 203++D058 CD C9 76                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 204++D05B 32 0C 67                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 205++D05E 3A AD C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 206++D061 21 A7 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 207++D064 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 208++D065 32 F2 66                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 209++D068                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 209++D068 3A AE C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 209++D06B 32 F0 66    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 210++D06E 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 211++D071 CD C9 76                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 212++D074 32 F0 66                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 213++D077                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 213++D077 3A 0C 67    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 213++D07A 32 F1 66    >                        ld       (varR),a
 214++D07D 3A AF C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 215++D080 21 A9 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 216++D083 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 217++D084 CD 01 77                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 218++D087 32 0C 67                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 219++D08A                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 219++D08A 3A B0 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 219++D08D 32 F0 66    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 220++D090 3A AA C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 221++D093 CD C9 76                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 222++D096 32 F0 66                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 223++D099                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 223++D099 3A 0C 67    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 223++D09C 32 F1 66    >                        ld       (varR),a
 224++D09F 3A AB C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 225++D0A2 21 B1 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 226++D0A5 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 227++D0A6 CD 01 77                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 228++D0A9 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 229++D0AB 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 230++D0AD 3A F2 66                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 231++D0B0 ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 232++D0B3 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 233++D0B5 3A CD CE     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 234++D0B8 CD 57 CB                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 235++D0BB C3 C4 D0                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 236++D0BE 3A CD CE     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 237++D0C1 CD 4E CB                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 238++D0C4 21 CD CE     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 239++D0C7 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 240++D0C8 C1                                   pop         bc
 241++D0C9 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 242++D0CA 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 243++D0CC ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 244++D0CE 22 F6 65                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 245++D0D1 05                                   dec         b
 246++D0D2 C2 6E CF                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 247++D0D5 C9                                   ret
 248++D0D6

 496+ D0D6              ;--LL52 to LL55-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 498+ D0D6              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:
 499+ D0D6                      ldCopyByte  UBnKxsgn,UbnkXPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 499+ D0D6 3A 22 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKxsgn)
 499+ D0D9 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UbnkXPointSign),a
 500+ D0DC ED 4B AC C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 501+ D0E0 A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 502+ D0E1 FA F7 D0             jp          m,NodeNegativeX                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 503+ D0E4              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 504+ D0E4              NodeXPositiveX:
 505+ D0E4 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 506+ D0E5 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 507+ D0E7 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 508+ D0EA 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 509+ D0EC 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 510+ D0ED 22 A6 C0             ld          (UbnkXPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 511+ D0F0 AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 512+ D0F1 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 513+ D0F4 C3 13 D1             jp          FinishedThisNodeX
 514+ D0F7              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 515+ D0F7              NodeNegativeX:
 516+ D0F7              LL52X:                                                 ;
 517+ D0F7 2A 20 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKxlo)                       ; Coord
 518+ D0FA ED 4B AC C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; XX12
 519+ D0FE 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 520+ D100 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 521+ D102 F2 10 D1             jp          p,SetAndMopX                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 522+ D105              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
 523+ D105              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 524+ D105 CD 18 6E             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 525+ D108 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 526+ D10B EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 527+ D10D 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 528+ D110              SetAndMopX:
 529+ D110 22 20 C0             ld          (UBnKxlo),hl                       ; XX15+0
 530+ D113              FinishedThisNodeX:
 531+ D113
 532+ D113              LL53:
 533+ D113
 534+ D113                      ldCopyByte  UBnKysgn,UbnkYPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 534+ D113 3A 25 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnKysgn)
 534+ D116 32 AB C0    >                        ld       (UbnkYPointSign),a
 535+ D119 ED 4B AE C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 536+ D11D A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 537+ D11E FA 34 D1             jp          m,NodeNegativeY                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 538+ D121              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 539+ D121              NodeXPositiveY:
 540+ D121 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 541+ D122 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 542+ D124 2A 23 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 543+ D127 26 00                ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 544+ D129 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 545+ D12A 22 A9 C0             ld          (UbnkYPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 546+ D12D AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 547+ D12E 32 A8 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 548+ D131 C3 50 D1             jp          FinishedThisNodeY
 549+ D134              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 550+ D134              NodeNegativeY:
 551+ D134              LL52Y:                                                 ;
 552+ D134 2A 23 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; Coord
 553+ D137 ED 4B AE C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; XX12
 554+ D13B 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 555+ D13D ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 556+ D13F F2 4D D1             jp          p,SetAndMopY                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 557+ D142              NodeXNegSignChangeY:
 558+ D142              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 559+ D142 CD 18 6E             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 560+ D145 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
 561+ D148 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
 562+ D14A 32 AB C0             ld          (UbnkYPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
 563+ D14D              SetAndMopY:
