 569+ D150              TransposeZ:
 570+ D150              LL55:                                                   ; Both y signs arrive here, Onto z                                          ;;;
 571+ D150 3A B1 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zSign)                   ; XX12+5    \ rotated znode hi                                              ;;;
 572+ D153                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeNodeZ                    ; LL56 -ve Z node                                                           ;;;
 572+ D153 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 572+ D155 C2 69 D1    >                        jp      nz,NegativeNodeZ
 573+ D158 3A B0 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)                     ; XX12+4 \ rotated znode lo                                                 ;;;
 574+ D15B 2A 26 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6    \ zorg lo                                                       ;;;
 575+ D15E ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; hl = INWKZ + XX12z                                                        ;;;
 576+ D160 7D                   ld          a,l
 577+ D161 32 0C 67             ld          (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
 578+ D164 7C                   ld          a,h
 579+ D165 32 EF 66             ld          (varU),a                            ; now z = hl or U(hi).T(lo)                                                 ;;;
 580+ D168 C9                   ret                                             ; LL57  \ Node additions done, z = U.T                                      ;;;
 581+ D169              ; Doing additions and scalings for each visible node around here                                                                    ;;;
 582+ D169              NegativeNodeZ:
 583+ D169              LL56:                                                   ; Enter XX12+5 -ve Z node case  from above                                  ;;;
 584+ D169 2A 26 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6 \ z org lo                                                         ;;;
 585+ D16C ED 4B B0 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12zLo)                    ; XX12+4    \ rotated z node lo                                                 ......................................................
 586+ D170 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; upper byte will be garbage
 587+ D172                      ClearCarryFlag
 587+ D172 B7          >                        or a
 588+ D173 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
 589+ D175 7D                   ld          a,l
 590+ D176 32 0C 67             ld          (varT),a                            ; t = result low
 591+ D179 7C                   ld          a,h
 592+ D17A 32 EF 66             ld          (varU),a                            ; u = result high
 593+ D17D E2 8A D1             jp          po,MakeNodeClose                    ; no overflow to parity would be clear
 594+ D180              LL56Overflow:
 595+ D180 FE 00                cp          0                                   ; is varU 0?
 596+ D182 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
 597+ D184 3A 0C 67             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo
 598+ D187                      ReturnIfAGTENusng 4                              ; >= 4 ? zlo big enough, Enter Node additions done.
 598+ D187 FE 04       >                        cp    4
 598+ D189 D0          >                        ret	 nc
 599+ D18A              MakeNodeClose:
 600+ D18A              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
 601+ D18A AF                   xor         a                                   ; hi This needs tuning to use a 16 bit variable
 602+ D18B 32 EF 66             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
 603+ D18E 3E 04                ld          a,4                                 ; lo
 604+ D190 32 0C 67             ld          (varT),a                            ; T
 605+ D193 C9                   ret
 606+ D194              ;--LL49-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 607+ D194              ProcessVisibleNode:
 608+ D194              RotateNode:                                                                                                                         ;;;
 609+ D194 CD 69 CC             call        XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16                                                                                       ;;;           call      XX12=XX15.XX16
 610+ D197              LL52LL53LL54LL55
 611+ D197              TransposeNode:
 612+ D197 CD D6 D0             call        TransposeXX12NodeToXX15
 613+ D19A
 614+ D19A              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
 615+ D19A              NodeAdditionsDone:
 616+ D19A              Scale16BitTo8Bit:
 617+ D19A              LL57:                                                   ; Enter Node additions done, z=T.U set up from LL55
 618+ D19A 3A EF 66             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
 619+ D19D 21 A7 C0             ld          hl,UbnkXPointHi
 620+ D1A0 B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+1    \ x hi
 621+ D1A1 21 AA C0             ld          hl,UbnkYPointHi
 622+ D1A4 B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+4    \ y hi
 623+ D1A5              AreXYZHiAllZero:
 624+ D1A5 28 2B                jr          z,NodeScalingDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
 625+ D1A7              DivideXYZBy2:
 626+ D1A7                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkXPoint                  ; XX15[0,1]
 626+ D1A7 2A A6 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkXPoint)
 626+ D1AA CB 3C       >                    srl   h
 626+ D1AC CB 1D       >                    rr    l
 626+ D1AE 22 A6 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkXPoint),hl
 627+ D1B1                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkYPoint                  ; XX15[3,4]
 627+ D1B1 2A A9 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkYPoint)
 627+ D1B4 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
 627+ D1B6 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
 627+ D1B8 22 A9 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkYPoint),hl
 628+ D1BB 3A EF 66             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
 629+ D1BE 67                   ld          h,a
 630+ D1BF 3A 0C 67             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ z lo
 631+ D1C2 6F                   ld          l,a
 632+ D1C3                      ShiftHLRight1
 632+ D1C3 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 632+ D1C5 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 633+ D1C7 7C                   ld          a,h
 634+ D1C8 32 EF 66             ld          (varU),a
 635+ D1CB 7D                   ld          a,l
 636+ D1CC 32 0C 67             ld          (varT),a                            ; T \ z lo
 637+ D1CF C3 9A D1             jp          Scale16BitTo8Bit                    ; loop U
 638+ D1D2              NodeScalingDone:
 639+ D1D2              LL60:                                                   ; hi U rolled to 0, exited loop above.
 640+ D1D2              ProjectNodeToScreen:
 641+ D1D2                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; T =>  Q   \ zdist lo
 641+ D1D2 3A 0C 67    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 641+ D1D5 32 F0 66    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 642+ D1D8 3A A6 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointLo)                    ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
 643+ D1DB 21 F0 66             ld          hl,varQ
 644+ D1DE BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
 645+ D1DF                      JumpIfALTusng DoSmallAngle                      ; LL69 if xdist < zdist hop over jmp to small x angle
 645+ D1DF DA E8 D1    >                        jp		c,DoSmallAngle
 646+ D1E2 CD 78 77             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ visit up  R = A/Q = x/z
 647+ D1E5 C3 F0 D1             jp          SkipSmallAngle                      ; LL65  \ hop over small xangle
 648+ D1E8              DoSmallAngle:                                           ; small x angle
 649+ D1E8              LL69:
 650+ D1E8              ; TODO check if we need to retain BC as this trashes it
 651+ D1E8              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 652+ D1E8              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 653+ D1E8 47                   ld      b,a
 654+ D1E9 CD 98 70             call    DIV16UNDOC
 655+ D1EC 79                   ld      a,c
 656+ D1ED 32 F1 66             ld      (varR),a
 657+ D1F0               ;;;       call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
 658+ D1F0              SkipSmallAngle:
 659+ D1F0              ScaleX:
 660+ D1F0              LL65:                                                   ; both continue for scaling based on z
 661+ D1F0 3A A8 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                  ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 662+ D1F3                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeXPoint                 ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 662+ D1F3 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 662+ D1F5 C2 08 D2    >                        jp      nz,NegativeXPoint
 663+ D1F8              ; ......................................................
 664+ D1F8              PositiveXPoint:
 665+ D1F8 3A F1 66             ld          a,(varR)
 666+ D1FB 6F                   ld          l,a
 667+ D1FC 3A EF 66             ld          a,(varU)
 668+ D1FF 67                   ld          h,a
 669+ D200 3E 80                ld          a,ScreenCenterX
 670+ D202 ED 31                add         hl,a
 671+ D204 EB                   ex          de,hl
 672+ D205 C3 18 D2             jp          StoreXPoint
 673+ D208              NegativeXPoint:
 674+ D208              LL62:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
 675+ D208 3A F1 66             ld          a,(varR)
 676+ D20B 6F                   ld          l,a
 677+ D20C 3A EF 66             ld          a,(varU)
 678+ D20F 67                   ld          h,a
 679+ D210 0E 80                ld          c,ScreenCenterX
 680+ D212 06 00                ld          b,0
 681+ D214                      ClearCarryFlag
 681+ D214 B7          >                        or a
 682+ D215 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
 683+ D217 EB                   ex          de,hl
 684+ D218              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 685+ D218 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
 686+ D21B FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
 687+ D21E FD 23                inc         iy
 688+ D220 FD 23                inc         iy
 689+ D222              ; ......................................................
 690+ D222              LL66:
 691+ D222              ProcessYPoint:
 692+ D222 AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
 693+ D223 32 EF 66             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
 694+ D226                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
 694+ D226 3A 0C 67    >                        ld       a,(varT)
 694+ D229 32 F0 66    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 695+ D22C 3A A9 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
 696+ D22F 21 F0 66             ld          hl,varQ
 697+ D232 BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
 698+ D233                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
 698+ D233 DA 3C D2    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
 699+ D236              SmallYPoint:
 700+ D236 CD 78 77             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
 701+ D239 C3 3F D2             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
 702+ D23C              SmallYHop:
 703+ D23C              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
 704+ D23C CD 55 77             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
 705+ D23F              SkipYScale:
 706+ D23F              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
 707+ D23F 3A AB C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
 708+ D242 CB 7F                bit         7,a
 709+ D244 C2 57 D2             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 710+ D247              PositiveYPoint:
 711+ D247 3A F1 66             ld          a,(varR)
 712+ D24A 6F                   ld          l,a
 713+ D24B 3A EF 66             ld          a,(varU)
 714+ D24E 67                   ld          h,a
 715+ D24F 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
 716+ D251 ED 31                add         hl,a
 717+ D253 EB                   ex          de,hl
 718+ D254 C3 67 D2             jp          LL50
 719+ D257              NegativeYPoint:
 720+ D257              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
 721+ D257 3A F1 66             ld          a,(varR)
 722+ D25A 6F                   ld          l,a
 723+ D25B 3A EF 66             ld          a,(varU)
 724+ D25E 67                   ld          h,a
 725+ D25F 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
 726+ D261 06 00                ld          b,0
 727+ D263                      ClearCarryFlag
 727+ D263 B7          >                        or a
 728+ D264 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
 729+ D266 EB                   ex          de,hl
 730+ D267              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 731+ D267 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
 732+ D26A FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
 733+ D26D FD 23                inc         iy
 734+ D26F FD 23                inc         iy
 735+ D271 C9                   ret
 736+ D272              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 737+ D272              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
 738+ D272              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
 739+ D272              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
 740+ D272              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
 741+ D272              CopyNodeToXX15:
 742+ D272                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
 742+ D272 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
 742+ D273 32 A6 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
 743+ D276 23                   inc         hl
 744+ D277                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
 744+ D277 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
 744+ D278 32 A8 C0    >                        ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
 745+ D27B 23                   inc         hl
 746+ D27C                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
 746+ D27C 7E          >                        ld       a,(hl)
 746+ D27D 32 AA C0    >                        ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
 747+ D280 23                   inc         hl
 748+ D281              PopulateXX15SignBits:
 749+ D281              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
 750+ D281 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
 751+ D282 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
 752+ D283 47                   ld          b,a
 753+ D284 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
 754+ D286 32 A7 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 755+ D289 78                   ld          a,b
 756+ D28A E6 40                and         $40
 757+ D28C CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 758+ D28E 32 A9 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 759+ D291 78                   ld          a,b
 760+ D292 E6 20                and         $20
 761+ D294 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 762+ D296 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 763+ D298 32 AB C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
 764+ D29B 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
 765+ D29C E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
 766+ D29E 32 0C 67             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
 767+ D2A1 C9                   ret
 768+ D2A2
 769+ D2A2              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
 770+ D2A2              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
 771+ D2A2              ;..............................................................................................................................
 772+ D2A2              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
 773+ D2A2              LL48GetScale:
 774+ D2A2 3A E1 65             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
 775+ D2A5 5F                   ld          e,a
 776+ D2A6 CD 72 D2             call        CopyNodeToXX15
 777+ D2A9              LL48GetVertices:
 778+ D2A9              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
 779+ D2A9                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
 779+ D2A9 BB          >                        cp      e
 779+ D2AA DA E7 D2    >                        jp		c, NodeIsNotVisible
 780+ D2AD              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
 781+ D2AD                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
 781+ D2AD 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
 781+ D2AE 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
 781+ D2AF 32 F0 65    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
 782+ D2B2 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
 783+ D2B3 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
 784+ D2B5 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
 785+ D2B6                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
 785+ D2B6 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 785+ D2B9 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
 785+ D2BB 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
 786+ D2BC E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
 787+ D2BD                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
 787+ D2BD A7          >                        and     a
 787+ D2BE C2 ED D2    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
 788+ D2C1              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
 789+ D2C1 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
 790+ D2C2 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
 791+ D2C4 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
 792+ D2C6                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
 792+ D2C6 A7          >                        and     a
 792+ D2C7 C2 ED D2    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
 793+ D2CA              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
 794+ D2CA                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
 794+ D2CA 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
 794+ D2CB 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
 794+ D2CC 32 F0 65    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; SunXX15+2 = (V),Y
 795+ D2CF 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
 796+ D2D0 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
 797+ D2D2 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
 798+ D2D3                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
 798+ D2D3 21 D2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
 798+ D2D6 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
 798+ D2D8 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
 799+ D2D9 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
 800+ D2DA                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
 800+ D2DA A7          >                        and     a
 800+ D2DB C2 ED D2    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
 801+ D2DE              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
 802+ D2DE 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
 803+ D2DF ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
 804+ D2E1 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
 805+ D2E3                      JumpIfAIsNotZero NodeIsVisible                  ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
 805+ D2E3 A7          >                        and     a
 805+ D2E4 C2 ED D2    >                        jp	    nz,NodeIsVisible
 806+ D2E7              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
 807+ D2E7 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
 808+ D2EA FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
 809+ D2EC                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
 810+ D2EC C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
 811+ D2ED              NodeIsVisible:
 812+ D2ED              LL49:
 813+ D2ED CD 94 D1             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
 814+ D2F0 C9                   ret
 815+ D2F1
 816+ D2F1                  DISPLAY "Tracing 6", $
 817+ D2F1
 818+ D2F1              ProjectNodeToEye:
 819+ D2F1 ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
 820+ D2F5 79               ld          a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
 821+ D2F6 32 F0 66         ld          (varQ),a                            ; VarQ = z
 822+ D2F9 3A A6 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo which is signed
 823+ D2FC CD 81 70         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
 824+ D2FF 3A A7 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 825+ D302                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 825+ D302 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 825+ D304 C2 0F D3    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
 826+ D307              EyePositiveXPoint:                                  ; x was positive result
 827+ D307 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX                     ;
 828+ D309 26 00            ld          h,0
 829+ D30B 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre + X
 830+ D30C C3 16 D3         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
 831+ D30F              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 832+ D30F 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 833+ D311 26 00            ld          h,0
 834+ D313                  ClearCarryFlag
 834+ D313 B7          >                        or a
 835+ D314 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 836+ D316              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 837+ D316 EB               ex          de,hl
 838+ D317 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
 839+ D31A FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
 840+ D31D              EyeProcessYPoint:
 841+ D31D ED 4B AA C0      ld          bc,(UBnkZScaled)                    ; Now process Y co-ordinate
 842+ D321 79               ld          a,c
 843+ D322 32 F0 66         ld          (varQ),a
 844+ D325 3A A8 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
 845+ D328 CD 81 70         call        DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC                 ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
 846+ D32B 3A A9 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 847+ D32E                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 847+ D32E CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 847+ D330 C2 3B D3    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
 848+ D333              EyePositiveYPoint:                                  ; Y is positive so above the centre line
 849+ D333 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 850+ D335                  ClearCarryFlag
 850+ D335 B7          >                        or a
 851+ D336 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 852+ D338 C3 40 D3         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
 853+ D33B              EyeNegativeYPoint:                                  ; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 854+ D33B 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 855+ D33D 26 00            ld          h,0
 856+ D33F 09               add         hl,bc                               ; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 857+ D340              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 858+ D340 EB               ex          de,hl
 859+ D341 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
 860+ D344 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
 861+ D347 C9               ret
 862+ D348              ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 863+ D348                          INCLUDE "../../Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/ApplyMyRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D348
   2++D348              ; Full version
   3++D348              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
   4++D348              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
   5++D348              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
   6++D348              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
   7++D348
   8++D348                  IFDEF USE_24BIT_ROLL_AND_PITCH
   9++D348 ~            UBnK24BitAlphaMulX      DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  10++D348 ~            UBnK24BitAlphaMulY      DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  11++D348 ~            UBnK24BitAlphaMulZ      DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  12++D348 ~            UBnK24BitBetaMulZ       DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  13++D348 ~            UBnK24BitBetaMulY       DB $00,$00, $00, $00
  14++D348 ~            UBnK24BitK2             DS 3
  15++D348 ~
  16++D348 ~            ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
  17++D348 ~            .CheckForRoll:          and		a
  18++D348 ~            						call	nz,UBnKRoll_24Bit
  19++D348 ~            .CheckForPitch:			ld		a,(BETA)
  20++D348 ~            						and		a
  21++D348 ~            						call	nz,UBnKPitch_24Bit
  22++D348 ~            .ApplySpeed:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
  23++D348 ~                                    and     a
  24++D348 ~                                    jp      z,.ApplyOrientation
  25++D348 ~            						;ReturnIfAIsZero
  26++D348 ~            						ld      c,0                         ;
  27++D348 ~            						ld      h,a                         ;
  28++D348 ~            						ld      b,$80                       ;
  29++D348 ~            						ld      de,(UBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
  30++D348 ~            						ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
  31++D348 ~            						ld      l,a                         ; .
  32++D348 ~            						call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
  33++D348 ~            						ld      (UBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
  34++D348 ~            						ld      a,l
  35++D348 ~                                    ld      (UBnKzlo),a                ;
  36++D348 ~            .ApplyOrientation:      ld      a,(ALPHA)
  37++D348 ~                                    ld      hl,BETA
  38++D348 ~                                    or      (hl)
  39++D348 ~                                    ret     z
  40++D348 ~                                    ;break
  41++D348 ~            PitchBreak:             ld      ix,UBnkrotmatSidevX
  42++D348 ~                                    call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
  43++D348 ~                                    ld      ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
  44++D348 ~                                    call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
  45++D348 ~                                    ld      ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
  46++D348 ~                                    call    ApplyRollAndPitchToIX
  47++D348 ~                                    ret
  48++D348 ~
  49++D348 ~            UBnKRoll_24Bit:			ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  50++D348 ~            						and 	$7F
  51++D348 ~            						ld      d,a                         ; .
  52++D348 ~            						ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  53++D348 ~            						ld      e,a                         ; .
  54++D348 ~            						ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
  55++D348 ~            						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  56++D348 ~            						ld		a,l
  57++D348 ~            						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulY),a			; save result
  58++D348 ~            						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulY+1),de		; save result
  59++D348 ~            						ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
  60++D348 ~            						and 	$7F
  61++D348 ~            						ld      d,a                         ; .
  62++D348 ~            						ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  63++D348 ~            						ld      e,a                         ; .
  64++D348 ~            						ld      hl,(UBnKxhi)               ; .
  65++D348 ~            						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  66++D348 ~            						ld		a,l
  67++D348 ~            						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulX),a			; save result
  68++D348 ~            						ld		(UBnK24BitAlphaMulX+1),de		; save result
  69++D348 ~            						ld		a,(ALPHA)
  70++D348 ~            						and		$80
  71++D348 ~            						jp		z,.RollingRight
  72++D348 ~            .RollingLeft:			ld		ix,UBnKxlo
  73++D348 ~            						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulY
  74++D348 ~            						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  75++D348 ~            						ld		ix,UBnKylo
  76++D348 ~            						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulX
  77++D348 ~            						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  78++D348 ~            						ret
  79++D348 ~            .RollingRight:			ld		ix,UBnKxlo
  80++D348 ~            						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulY
  81++D348 ~            						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  82++D348 ~            						ld		ix,UBnKylo
  83++D348 ~            						ld		iy,UBnK24BitAlphaMulX
  84++D348 ~            						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
  85++D348 ~            						ret
  86++D348 ~
  87++D348 ~            UBnKPitch_24Bit:		ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
  88++D348 ~            						and 	$7F
  89++D348 ~            						ld      d,a                         ; .
  90++D348 ~            						ld      a,(UBnKylo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
  91++D348 ~            						ld      e,a                         ; .
  92++D348 ~            						ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)               ; .
  93++D348 ~            						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
  94++D348 ~            						ld		a,l
  95++D348 ~            						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulY),a			; save result
  96++D348 ~            						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulY+1),de		; save result
  97++D348 ~            						ld      a,(BETA)                   ; get roll value
  98++D348 ~            						and 	$7F
  99++D348 ~            						ld      d,a                         ; .
 100++D348 ~            						ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 101++D348 ~            						ld      e,a                         ; .
 102++D348 ~            						ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)               ; .
 103++D348 ~            						call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * -alpha / 256
 104++D348 ~            						ld		a,l
 105++D348 ~            						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulZ),a			; save result
 106++D348 ~            						ld		(UBnK24BitBetaMulZ+1),de		; save result
 107++D348 ~            						ld		a,(BETA)
 108++D348 ~            						and		$80
 109++D348 ~            						jp		z,.Climbing
 110++D348 ~            .Diving:				ld		ix,UBnKylo
 111++D348 ~            						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulZ
 112++D348 ~            						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 113++D348 ~            						ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 114++D348 ~            						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulY
 115++D348 ~            						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 116++D348 ~            						ret
 117++D348 ~            .Climbing:		     	ld		ix,UBnKylo
 118++D348 ~            						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulZ
 119++D348 ~            						call	SubAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 120++D348 ~            						ld		ix,UBnKzlo
 121++D348 ~            						ld		iy,UBnK24BitBetaMulY
 122++D348 ~            						call	AddAtIXtoAtIY24Signed
 123++D348 ~            						ret
 124++D348 ~
 125++D348                  ELSE
 126++D348              APPequPosPlusAPP:       MACRO    Position, PositionSign
 127++D348 ~                                    push    bc
 128++D348 ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
 129++D348 ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
 130++D348 ~                                    ld      b,a
 131++D348 ~                                    ld      a,c
 132++D348 ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
 133++D348 ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
 134++D348 ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
 135++D348 ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
 136++D348 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
 137++D348 ~                                    add     hl,de
 138++D348 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
 139++D348 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
 140++D348 ~                                    pop     bc
 141++D348 ~                                    ret
 142++D348 ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
 143++D348 ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
 144++D348 ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
 145++D348 ~                                    or      a
 146++D348 ~                                    sbc     hl,de
 147++D348 ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
 148++D348 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
 149++D348 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
 150++D348 ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
 151++D348 ~                                    pop     bc
 152++D348 ~                                    ret
 153++D348 ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
 154++D348 ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
 155++D348 ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
 156++D348 ~                                    pop     bc
 157++D348 ~                                    ret
 158++D348                                      ENDM
 159++D348
 160++D348
 161++D348              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
 161++D348 C5          >                        push    bc
 161++D349 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
 161++D34A 3A 22 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 161++D34D 47          >                        ld      b,a
 161++D34E 79          >                        ld      a,c
 161++D34F A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
 161++D350 FA 61 D3    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
 161++D353             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
 161++D353 ED 5B F1 65 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
 161++D357 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 161++D35A 19          >                        add     hl,de
 161++D35B 22 F1 65    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
 161++D35E 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
 161++D35F C1          >                        pop     bc
 161++D360 C9          >                        ret
 161++D361             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
 161++D361 ED 5B F1 65 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
 161++D365 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 161++D368 B7          >                        or      a
 161++D369 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
 161++D36B 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
 161++D36D 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
 161++D36E 22 F1 65    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
 161++D371 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
 161++D373 C1          >                        pop     bc
 161++D374 C9          >                        ret
 161++D375             >.MV51:                  NegHL
 161++D375 AF          >                    xor a
 161++D376 95          >                    sub l
 161++D377 6F          >                    ld l,a
 161++D378 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 161++D379 94          >                    sub h
 161++D37A 67          >                    ld h,a
 161++D37B 22 F1 65    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
 161++D37E 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
 161++D37F C1          >                        pop     bc
 161++D380 C9          >                        ret
 162++D381
 163++D381              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
 163++D381 C5          >                        push    bc
 163++D382 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
 163++D383 3A 25 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 163++D386 47          >                        ld      b,a
 163++D387 79          >                        ld      a,c
 163++D388 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
 163++D389 FA 9A D3    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
 163++D38C             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
 163++D38C ED 5B F1 65 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
 163++D390 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 163++D393 19          >                        add     hl,de
 163++D394 22 F1 65    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
 163++D397 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
 163++D398 C1          >                        pop     bc
 163++D399 C9          >                        ret
 163++D39A             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
 163++D39A ED 5B F1 65 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
 163++D39E 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 163++D3A1 B7          >                        or      a
 163++D3A2 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
 163++D3A4 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
 163++D3A6 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
 163++D3A7 22 F1 65    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
 163++D3AA EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
 163++D3AC C1          >                        pop     bc
 163++D3AD C9          >                        ret
 163++D3AE             >.MV51:                  NegHL
 163++D3AE AF          >                    xor a
 163++D3AF 95          >                    sub l
 163++D3B0 6F          >                    ld l,a
 163++D3B1 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 163++D3B2 94          >                    sub h
 163++D3B3 67          >                    ld h,a
 163++D3B4 22 F1 65    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
 163++D3B7 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
 163++D3B8 C1          >                        pop     bc
 163++D3B9 C9          >                        ret
 164++D3BA
 165++D3BA              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
 165++D3BA C5          >                        push    bc
 165++D3BB 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
 165++D3BC 3A 28 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 165++D3BF 47          >                        ld      b,a
 165++D3C0 79          >                        ld      a,c
 165++D3C1 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
 165++D3C2 FA D3 D3    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
 165++D3C5             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
 165++D3C5 ED 5B F1 65 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
 165++D3C9 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 165++D3CC 19          >                        add     hl,de
 165++D3CD 22 F1 65    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
 165++D3D0 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
 165++D3D1 C1          >                        pop     bc
 165++D3D2 C9          >                        ret
 165++D3D3             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
 165++D3D3 ED 5B F1 65 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
 165++D3D7 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 165++D3DA B7          >                        or      a
 165++D3DB ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
 165++D3DD 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
 165++D3DF 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
 165++D3E0 22 F1 65    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
 165++D3E3 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
 165++D3E5 C1          >                        pop     bc
 165++D3E6 C9          >                        ret
 165++D3E7             >.MV51:                  NegHL
 165++D3E7 AF          >                    xor a
 165++D3E8 95          >                    sub l
 165++D3E9 6F          >                    ld l,a
 165++D3EA 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 165++D3EB 94          >                    sub h
 165++D3EC 67          >                    ld h,a
 165++D3ED 22 F1 65    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
 165++D3F0 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
 165++D3F1 C1          >                        pop     bc
 165++D3F2 C9          >                        ret
 166++D3F3
 167++D3F3              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
 168++D3F3 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
 169++D3F6              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
 170++D3F6              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
 171++D3F6              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
 172++D3F6
 173++D3F6              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 174++D3F6              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
 175++D3F6 3A 0A 66     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 176++D3F9 21 FE 65                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
 177++D3FC B6                                   or      (hl)
 178++D3FD CA BB D4                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
 179++D400              ; If the xsgn,ysng or zsng are not 0 or $80 then we use 24 bit routines
 180++D400              ; else we can just continue to use 16 bit
 181++D400                                     ;jp      ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit
 182++D400
 183++D400 3A 22 C0     .CheckFor24Bit:         ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 184++D403 21 25 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKysgn
 185++D406 B6                                   or      (hl)
 186++D407 21 28 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKzsgn
 187++D40A B6                                   or      (hl)
 188++D40B E6 7F                                and     $7F
 189++D40D C2 45 D5                             jp      nz,ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit
 190++D410                                      ;break
 191++D410              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
 192++D410 5F           .Not24BitCalcs:         ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
 193++D411 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
 194++D414 CD CC 6B                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
 195++D417 32 F2 65                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
 196++D41A 22 F0 65                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
 197++D41D              ; A = Flip sign
 198++D41D 3A 0B 66                             ld      a,(ALP2)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
 199++D420 21 22 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
 200++D423 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
 201++D424              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
 202++D424 CD 81 D3                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
 203++D427              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
 204++D427 32 F5 D3                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
 205++D42A 22 F3 D3                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
 206++D42D              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
 207++D42D 3A FE 65                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
 208++D430 5F                                   ld      e,a
 209++D431 CD CC 6B                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
 210++D434 32 F2 65                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
 211++D437 22 F0 65                             ld      (varP),hl
 212++D43A              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
 213++D43A 3A F5 D3                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
 214++D43D 5F                                   ld      e,a
 215++D43E 3A FF 65                             ld      a,(BET2)
 216++D441 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
 217++D442              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
 218++D442 CD BA D3                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
 219++D445 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
 220++D448 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
 221++D44B              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
 222++D44B 3A FE 65                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
 223++D44E 5F                                   ld      e,a
 224++D44F CD CC 6B                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
 225++D452 32 F2 65                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
 226++D455 22 F0 65                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
 227++D458              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
 228++D458 3A F5 D3                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
 229++D45B 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
 230++D45E 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
 231++D45F 3A FF 65                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
 232++D462 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
 233++D463 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
 234++D464 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
 235++D467 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
 236++D468 F2 77 D4                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
 237++D46B 2A F1 65                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
 238++D46E ED 5B F3 D3                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
 239++D472 B7                                   or      a
 240++D473 19                                   add     hl,de
 241++D474 C3 91 D4                             jp      .MV44
 242++D477 2A F3 D3     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
 243++D47A ED 5B F1 65                          ld      de,(varPp1)
 244++D47E B7                                   or      a
 245++D47F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
 246++D481 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
 247++D483                                      NegHL
 247++D483 AF          >                    xor a
 247++D484 95          >                    sub l
 247++D485 6F          >                    ld l,a
 247++D486 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 247++D487 94          >                    sub h
 247++D488 67          >                    ld h,a
 248++D489 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit TODO, we may have to remove xor as planets and Univs are sign + 23 bit xpos
 249++D48C EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
 250++D48E 32 25 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
 251++D491              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
 252++D491 22 23 C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
 253++D494 3A 0A 66                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
 254++D497 5F                                   ld      e,a
 255++D498 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 256++D49B CD CC 6B                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 257++D49E 32 F2 65                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
 258++D4A1 22 F0 65                             ld      (varP),hl
 259++D4A4 3A 0C 66                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)
 260++D4A7 5F                                   ld      e,a
 261++D4A8 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 262++D4AB AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
 263++D4AC CD 48 D3                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
 264++D4AF 32 22 C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
 265++D4B2 22 20 C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
 266++D4B5                                      ;break
 267++D4B5 CD D4 D4                             call    ApplyMyRollToOrientation
 268++D4B8 CD 03 D5                             call    ApplyMyPitchToOrientation
 269++D4BB                                      ; if its not a Univ then apply to local orientation
 270++D4BB 3A EA 66     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
 271++D4BE 16 00                                ld      d,0
 272++D4C0 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
 273++D4C1 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
 274++D4C4 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
 275++D4C7 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
 276++D4C8 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
 277++D4CA CD 33 00                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
 278++D4CD 22 26 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
 279++D4D0 32 28 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
 280++D4D3 C9                                   ret
 281++D4D4
 282++D4D4                             DISPLAY "TODO: Looks like pitch is always being applied as positive"
 283++D4D4              ApplyMyRollToOrientation:MMUSelectMathsBankedFns
 283++D4D4 ED 91 50 66 >                     nextreg MathsBankedFnsMMU, BankMathsBankedFns
 284++D4D8 3A 09 66                             ld      a,(ALPHA)
 284++D4DB DD 21 35 C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 284++D4DF FD 21 37 C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatNosevY
 284++D4E3 CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToNosev:
 285++D4E6 3A 09 66                             ld      a,(ALPHA)
 285++D4E9 DD 21 29 C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatSidevX
 285++D4ED FD 21 2B C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatSidevY
 285++D4F1 CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToSidev:
 286++D4F4 3A 09 66                             ld      a,(ALPHA)
 286++D4F7 DD 21 2F C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvX
 286++D4FB FD 21 31 C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
 286++D4FF CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyRollToRoofv:
 287++D502 C9                                   ret
 288++D503
 289++D503              ApplyMyPitchToOrientation:
 290++D503 3A FC 65                             ld      a,(BETA)
 290++D506 DD 21 39 C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatNosevZ
 290++D50A FD 21 37 C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatNosevY
 290++D50E CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToNosev:
 291++D511 3A FC 65                             ld      a,(BETA)
 291++D514 DD 21 2D C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 291++D518 FD 21 2B C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatSidevY
 291++D51C CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToSidev:
 292++D51F 3A FC 65                             ld      a,(BETA)
 292++D522 DD 21 33 C0    ld ix,UBnkrotmatRoofvZ
 292++D526 FD 21 31 C0    ld iy,UBnkrotmatRoofvY
 292++D52A CD 8B 02       call ApplyMyAngleAToIXIY ; ApplyMyPitchToRoofv:
 293++D52D C9                                   ret
 294++D52E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 295++D52E              ; 24 bit version of pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 296++D52E              ; Need to write a test routine for roll and pitchs
 297++D52E              ; Minsky Roll       Minsky Pitch
 298++D52E              ;  y -= alpha * x    y -= beta * z
 299++D52E              ;  x += alpha * y    z += beta * y
 300++D52E              ; or once combined
 301++D52E              ;   1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 302++D52E              ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
 303++D52E              ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
 304++D52E              ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 305++D52E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 306++D52E              ; Based on non optimised version of Planet pitch and roll is a 24 bit calculation 1 bit sign + 23 bit value
 307++D52E              ; Now at least rolls the correct direction
 308++D52E 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulX               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 309++D532 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulY               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 310++D536 00 00 00 00  UnivAlphaMulZ               DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 311++D53A 00 00 00 00  UnivBetaMulZ                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 312++D53E 00 00 00 00  UnivBetaMulY                DB $00,$00, $00, $00
 313++D542 00 00 00     UnivK2                      DS 3
 314++D545
 315++D545 3A 09 66     ApplyMyRollAndPitch24Bit: 	 ld     a,(ALPHA)                   ; no roll or pitch, no calc needed
 316++D548 21 FC 65                                  ld     hl,BETA
 317++D54B B6                                        or     (hl)
 318++D54C C4 70 D5                                  call   nz, Univ_Roll_And_Pitch
 319++D54F              ;.CheckForRoll:              and		a
 320++D54F              ;							call	nz,Univ_Roll
 321++D54F              ;.CheckForPitch:				ld		a,(BETA)
 322++D54F              ;							and		a
 323++D54F              ;							call	nz,Univ_Pitch
 324++D54F 3A EA 66     .ApplySpeed:            	ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; BCH = - Delta
 325++D552              							ReturnIfAIsZero
 325++D552 A7          >                        and     a
 325++D553 C8          >                        ret     z
 326++D554 0E 00        							ld      c,0                         ;
 327++D556 67           							ld      h,a                         ;
 328++D557 06 80        							ld      b,$80                       ;
 329++D559 ED 5B 27 C0  							ld      de,(UBnKzhi)                ; DEL = z position
 330++D55D 3A 26 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 331++D560 6F           							ld      l,a                         ; .
 332++D561 CD 14 01     							call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; update speed
 333++D564 ED 53 27 C0  							ld      (UBnKzhi),DE                ; write back to zpos
 334++D568 7D           							ld      a,l
 335++D569 32 26 C0     							ld      (UBnKzlo),a                ;
 336++D56C C9           							ret
 337++D56D
 338++D56D              ; Performs minsky rotation
 339++D56D              ; Joystick left          Joystick right
 340++D56D              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 341++D56D              ; x :=  x      + y / 64  x :=  x -  y / 64  so rather than /64  is z * alpha / 256
 342++D56D              ; y :=  y      - x /64   y :=  y +  x / 64
 343++D56D              ;
 344++D56D              ; Joystick down          Joystick up
 345++D56D              ; ---------------------  ---------------------
 346++D56D              ; y :=  y      + z / 64  y :=  y - z / 64
 347++D56D              ; z :=  z      - y / 64  z :=  z + y / 64
 348++D56D              ;
 349++D56D              ; get z, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 350++D56D              ; get x, multiply by alpha, pick top 3 bytes with sign
 351++D56D              ; if alpha +ve subtract x = x - z adj, z =z + x adj , else x += z adj z -= z adj
 352++D56D              ; so we can assume 24 bit maths and just do 16 bit multiply of say HL = nosev x [sgn][hi] and de = [0][alpha] by calling AHLequHLmulE
 353++D56D              ; for roll
 354++D56D              ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
 355++D56D              ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
 356++D56D              ; and for pitch
 357++D56D              ; nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
 358++D56D              ; nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
 359++D56D              ;  1. K2 = y - alpha * x
 360++D56D              ;   2. z = z + beta * K2
 361++D56D              ;   3. y = K2 - beta * z
 362++D56D              ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 363++D56D              ;
 364++D56D              ;   1a. K [3 2 1 0] = -alpha * (x sign hi lo)
 365++D56D              ;   1b. K [3 2 1]   = y sign hi lo + K [321] (in effect y minus (alpha * x / 256)
 366++D56D              ;   1c. K2 [3 2 1]  = k [3 2 1 ]
 367++D56D              ;   2a. K[3 2 1 0]  = k2 [3 2 1] * beta
 368++D56D              ;   2b. z sign hi lo += K[3 2 1] ( in effect z += (beta * K2)/256
 369++D56D              ;   3a. K [3 2 1 0] = z sign hi lo * -beta
 370++D56D              ;   3b. y sign hi lo = K2 [3 2 1] - K [3 2 1] ( in effect K2 - (beta * z) /256
 371++D56D              ;
 372++D56D              ;   4. x = x + alpha * y
 373++D56D
 374++D56D
 375++D56D
 376++D56D              ;-- Q = - ALPHA
 377++D56D              ;-- A P[1 0] = xsign xhi xlo
 378++D56D              ;-- call K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q which means  K(3 2 1) = (A P+1 P) * Q / 256 = x * -alpha / 256 = - alpha * x / 256
 379++D56D              ;-- call K[3 2 1] = ysign hi lo + K[3 2 1] (= y - alpha * x / 256)
 380++D56D              ;-- K2 [3 2 1 ] = K [ 3 2 1 ]
 381++D56D              ;-- A P [1 0]   = K [3 2 1]
 382++D56D              ;-- Q = BETA
 383++D56D              ;-- K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q
 384++D56D              ;-- K3[3 2 1] = z sign hi lo + K[3 2 1]
 385++D56D              ;-- A P [1 0] = -K [3 2 1]
 386++D56D              ;-- z sign hi lo = K[3 2 1]
 387++D56D              ;-- K[3 2 1 0] = A P[1 0] * Q
 388++D56D              ;-- T = K[3] sign bit
 389++D56D              ;-- A = K[3] sign bit xor K2[3]
 390++D56D              ;-- if positive A yhi lo - = K [3 2 1 0] + K2[3 2 1 0] so A yhi ylo = K + K2 /256 as we abandon low byte
 391++D56D              ;-- if negative A yhi lo = (K - k2 )/256
 392++D56D              ;-- A = A xor T
 393++D56D              ;-- y sign = A
 394++D56D              ;-- Q = alpha
 395++D56D              ;-- A P(1 0) = y sign hi lo
 396++D56D              ;-- K[3 2 1 0 ] A P[1 0] * Q
 397++D56D              ;-- x sign hi lo = K[3 2 1] = xsign hi lo * K[3 2 1]
 398++D56D
 399++D56D 00 00 00     K2      DS  3
 400++D570
 401++D570 3A 09 66     Univ_Roll_And_Pitch:	    ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 402++D573              ;** 1. K2 = y - alpha * x **************************************
 403++D573              ;-- DEL = alpha * (x sign hi lo) /256
 404++D573 57           							ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha
 405++D574 3A 20 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                 ; HLE = x sgn, hi, lo
 406++D577 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 407++D578 2A 21 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKxhi)                ; hl = UBnKchi sgn
 408++D57B CD 9B 6C     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = x * alpha, so DEL = X * alpha / 256
 409++D57E              ;-- DEL = K2 = y - alpha * x
 410++D57E 42 4B                                    ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 411++D580 65                                       ld      h,l
 412++D581 ED 5B 24 C0                              ld      de,(UBnKyhi)
 413++D585 3A 23 C0                                 ld      a,(UBnKylo)
 414++D588 6F                                       ld      l,a
 415++D589 CD 10 01                                 call    SubBCHfromDELsigned
 416++D58C ED 53 6E D5                              ld      (K2+1),de
 417++D590 7D                                       ld      a,l
 418++D591 32 6D D5                                 ld      (K2),a
 419++D594              ;** 2. z = z + beta * K2 ***************************************
 420++D594              ;-- HLE = DEL ..................................................
 421++D594 EB                                       ex      de,hl                       ; will set hl to de and e to l in one go
 422++D595              ;-- DELC = beta * HLE, i.e. beta * K2
 423++D595 3A FC 65                                 ld      a,(BETA)
 424++D598 57                                       ld      d,a
 425++D599 CD 9B 6C                                 call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = beta * K2
 426++D59C              ;-- DEL = z + DEL, i.e. z + Beta * K2 /256
 427++D59C ED 4B 27 C0                              ld      bc,(UBnKzhi)                ; BCH = z
 428++D5A0 3A 26 C0                                 ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; .
 429++D5A3 67                                       ld      h,a                         ; .
 430++D5A4 CD 14 01                                 call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; DEL =z + (beta * K2)/256
 431++D5A7 ED 53 27 C0                              ld      (UBnKzhi),de                ; and save to Z
 432++D5AB 7D                                       ld      a,l                         ; .
 433++D5AC 32 26 C0                                 ld      (UBnKzlo),a                 ; .
 434++D5AF              ;** 3. y = K2 - beta * z ***************************************
 435++D5AF              ;-- DEL = beta * z / 256
 436++D5AF 3A FC 65                                 ld      a,(BETA)                    ; get pitch value
 437++D5B2 57           							ld      d,a                         ; d = pitch
 438++D5B3 3A 26 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKzlo)                 ; HLE = z sgn, hi, lo
 439++D5B6 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 440++D5B7 2A 27 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKzhi)                ; hl = UBnKchi sgn
 441++D5BA CD 9B 6C     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = z * beta, so DEL = z * beta / 256
 442++D5BD              ;-- BCH = DEL ..................................................
 443++D5BD 42 4B                                    ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 444++D5BF 65                                       ld      h,l
 445++D5C0              ;-- y = DEL = K2 - beta * z = DEL - BCH
 446++D5C0 ED 5B 6E D5                              ld      de,(K2+1)                   ; del = K2
 447++D5C4 3A 6D D5                                 ld      a,(K2)                      ; .
 448++D5C7 6F                                       ld      l,a                         ; .
 449++D5C8 CD 10 01                                 call    SubBCHfromDELsigned         ; .
 450++D5CB ED 53 24 C0                              ld      (UBnKyhi),de                ; and save to y
 451++D5CF 7D                                       ld      a,l                         ; .
 452++D5D0 32 23 C0                                 ld      (UBnKylo),a                 ; .
 453++D5D3              ;** 4. x = x + alpha * y ***************************************
 454++D5D3              ;-- DEL = alpha * y
 455++D5D3 3A 09 66                                 ld      a,(ALPHA)                   ; get roll value
 456++D5D6              ;-- DEL = alpha * (y sign hi lo) /256
 457++D5D6 57           							ld      d,a                         ; d = alpha
 458++D5D7 3A 23 C0     							ld      a,(UBnKylo)                 ; HLE = y sgn, hi, lo
 459++D5DA 5F           							ld      e,a                         ; .
 460++D5DB 2A 24 C0     							ld      hl,(UBnKyhi)                ; hl = UBnKyhi sgn
 461++D5DE CD 9B 6C     							call    mulHLEbyDSigned             ; DELC = y * alpha, so DEL = Y * alpha / 256
 462++D5E1              ;-- DEL = x + alpha * y
 463++D5E1 42 4B                                    ld      bc,de                       ; transfer to BCH for now
 464++D5E3 65                                       ld      h,l                         ; .
 465++D5E4 ED 5B 21 C0                              ld      de,(UBnKxhi)                ; del = x
 466++D5E8 3A 20 C0                                 ld      a,(UBnKxlo)                 ; .
 467++D5EB 6F                                       ld      l,a                         ; .
 468++D5EC CD 14 01                                 call    AddBCHtoDELsigned           ; del = del + bch = x + alpha * y
 469++D5EF ED 53 21 C0                              ld      (UBnKxhi),de                ; and save to x
 470++D5F3 7D                                       ld      a,l                         ; .
 471++D5F4 32 20 C0                                 ld      (UBnKxlo),a                 ; .
 472++D5F7              .ApplyRollToRight:          ;call    ApplyMyRollToOrientation
 473++D5F7 CD 03 D5     .ApplyPitchToClimb:         call    ApplyMyPitchToOrientation
 474++D5FA                                        ;  call    TidyVectorsIX ; doesn't work
 475++D5FA C9           							ret
 476++D5FB                  ENDIF
 477++D5FB

 864+ D5FB                          INCLUDE "../../Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm"
# file opened: ../../Tests/3DTest/../../Universe/Ships/ApplyShipRollAndPitch.asm
   1++D5FB
   2++D5FB              ; A = value for rotation
   3++D5FB              ; HL = address of value for rotation
   4++D5FB              ; TODO logic for permanent spin, I thik this it -127??
   5++D5FB              SplitAndDampenZ:        MACRO
   6++D5FB ~                                    ld      b,a
   7++D5FB ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; if abs (Rotz) is 0 then skip
   8++D5FB ~                                    jp      z,.ProcessRoll
   9++D5FB ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; b = rotate counter S7
  10++D5FB ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; a = sign rat2 = c = sign
  11++D5FB ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  12++D5FB ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  13++D5FB ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  14++D5FB ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  15++D5FB ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  16++D5FB ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  17++D5FB ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  18++D5FB ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
  19++D5FB                                      ENDM
  20++D5FB
  21++D5FB              SplitAndDampenX:        MACRO
  22++D5FB ~                                    ld      b,a
  23++D5FB ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; exit early is ABS = 0
  24++D5FB ~                                    and     a                       ; .
  25++D5FB ~                                    ret     z                       ; .
  26++D5FB ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = rotate counter S7
  27++D5FB ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit            ; rat2 = c = sign
  28++D5FB ~                                    ld      c,a                     ; .
  29++D5FB ~                                    ld      (univRAT2),a            ; .
  30++D5FB ~                                    ld      a,b                     ; a = abs b
  31++D5FB ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit            ; .
  32++D5FB ~                                    dec     a                       ; dampen
  33++D5FB ~                                    ld      (univRAT2Val),a
  34++D5FB ~                                    or      c                       ; make S7 again after dampening
  35++D5FB ~                                    ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
  36++D5FB                                      ENDM

  65++D651 A7          >                        and     a                       ; .
  65++D652 C8          >                        ret     z                       ; .
